teacher_info.intro: Hi everyone, I am Rosie , I am from Guangdong Province, China. I have  three   years of teaching experience.  I can speak Chinese, Cantonese, English .  I love learning languages, so I really understand how hard for foreigners to a new language, I want to help you to learn Chinese or  Cantonese  in a fun and engaging way!  I have relatives in my family who work as teachers, so I know a lot about teaching methods.
teacher_info.short_signature: Three   years of teaching  Chinese  and  Cantonese experience.

I have relatives in my family who work as teachers, so I know a lot about teaching methods.
teacher_info.about_teacher: After I graduated from high  school , I have been a part-time teacher for more than four years. I am a very patient and talkative person and I have also helped many foreigners who are interested in Cantonese . No matter you are beginners or advanced level learners, I am glad to help you to  learn fluent and authentic Cantonese.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
All levels are welcome!

Conversation Course: You will need to tell me your level, your hobbies, your goals before class begins, and I will prepare related materials such as videos and articles for our class;

Pronunciation Course: You also need to let me know your level and your goal, then I will prepare pinyin and  I will correct your tones(normal, light, modified) and your prosody.

I  am patient and fun.I will help you when you tell me your questions .I hope that once you choose to learn a language, don't give up so easily, do enough practice, complete the homework, and keep going on to approach your goal.

pro_course_detail.description:

アクセント、表現などが学べます。
間違えても、言葉を思い出せなくても　大丈夫！！どんな話題でも　OKです。
毎日のできごと・音楽・映画やドラマ・文化・旅行・仕事・
お悩み事・家族・友達　etc..ゆっくりでもOK！

In this lesson, you will learn vocabulary, pronunciation, 
accent, expressions,  etc., while choosing a topic and 
having a general conversation. We will work together to improve

pro_course_detail.title: Fun and easy conversation for Beginners　A1～A2
pro_course_detail.description:
このレッスンは　やさしい会話(かいわ)から　練習(れんしゅう)します。
テキストをもとに　たくさん練習(れんしゅう)します。
あなたは　テキストは必要(ひつよう)ありません。
あなたにあわせて　えカードやイラスト・写真(しゃしん)など　を　使(つか)います。
たのしみながら　日本語(にほんご)・にほんのぶんかに　たくさん触(ふ)れよう！
◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽

These are the topics we will practice.

unit 1 　 watashi wa Ken desu.わたしは　けん　です。
unit 2 　 konohenni ,ATM arimasuka.このへんに　ATM　ありますか？
unit 3 　 korewa ikuradesuka.これは　いくらですか？
unit 4    mochikaeride.　もちかえりで。
unit 5    kādo de ii desuka?かーど　で　いいですか？
unit ６    Chotto matte kudasai.　ちょっと　まってください。
unit ７    Kore, Yokohama ni ikimasu ka?　これ、よこはまに　いきますか？
unit 8    Bijutsykan ni ikimasu.　びじゅつかん　に　いきます。
unit 9    Nihon no seikatsu wa dō desu ka?　にほん　の　せいかつ　は　どうですか？
unit 10  Sore,donna aji desuka?　それ　どんな　あじ　ですか？
unit 11  Kyō wa ii tenki desune.　きょう　は　いいてんき　ですね。
unit 12  Ocha wo nomimasen ka?　おちゃ　を　のみません　か？

◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽◽

In this lesson, we will start with easy conversation.
We practice a lot based on the textbook.
You don't need a textbook.
We will use picture cards, illustrations, photos, etc. according to your needs.
Continuous lessons are recommended.
Let's have a lot of fun while learning Japanese and culture.

 I have a master's degree in teaching Chinese to speakers of other languages.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
我用中文教中文。不要担心，用中文学习中文是最好的方法！
I use CHINESE to teach Chinese (and a little English according to your Chinese level), but don't worry about it! I will help you.
一般来讲，我们会学习生词、语法和课文，然后做一些练习。
Generally speaking, we will learn vocabulary, grammar and texts, and then do some exercises.
对于初学者来说，我会更注意你的发音和语法。
For beginners, I would pay more attention to your pronunciation and grammar. 
如果你更想提高别的技能，比如说或写，我也会帮助你。
If you want to improve other skills, such as speaking or writing, I'll help you with that as well.

课程COURSE
-口语课 Oral Chinese

-Free Talk

pro_course_detail.title: 汉语口语 Oral Chinese
pro_course_detail.description:

                           If you want to use Zoom, please send me your id and password.

这门课程为初级到高级的学生开设。
This course is for students from beginner to advanced levels.

我们会讨论你感兴趣的话题，也可以选择一本教科书进行学习。
We will discuss a topic that interests you or we can choose a textbook to study.

对于初级的学生，我们会集中学习词汇和语法，然后进行练习。
For beginners, we will concentrate on vocabulary and grammar, and then practice.

对于中级和高级的学生，我们可以选择一本口语教材进行学习，也可以讨论你感兴趣的话题。我们也可以选择一个电视节目、播客等进行讨论。
For intermediate and advanced students, we can choose a speaking textbook to study or we can discuss topics that interest you. We can also choose a TV show, podcast to discuss.

*如果你想和你的朋友一起上团体课，请联系我。

pro_course_detail.description:
PLEASA NOTE:   If you want to use Zoom, please send me your id and password.

这是非正式的辅导课，不需要课前准备。
This is an informal tutoring session, we don't need to prepare for  the class.

我们可以讨论你你感兴趣的话题或者你的日常生活，我会让你的中文更自然、地道。
We can discuss your favorite topics or your daily life. And I will help you to make your Chinese more natural and authentic.

我会改正你发音和语法中的错误，并且扩展你的词汇，也会给你一些建议。
I will correct errors in your pronunciation and grammar, and expand your vocabulary, as well as give you some advice.

我们将学习一些重要的词汇和语法，进行练习、讨论。

pro_course_detail.title: 校对/写作修改 Proofreading/ Writing Correction (NOT A CLASS)
pro_course_detail.description:
请注意：这不是线上课程。你发给我需要校对的文件，我在校对好之后发给你。
Please note: This is not an online course. You send me the file that needs to be proofread and I will send it to you after I proofread it.

我会校对你的文章中的语法、标点、汉字错误，一般情况下我不会改变你的文章的内容。我不会重写句子，但是会让你的文章看起来更地道、自然。
I will proofread your writing for grammar, punctuation, and character errors, but I will not normally change the content of your writing. I will not rewrite sentences, but I will make your writing look more authentic and natural.

价格取决于文件的长度和难度。请先告诉我文章的字数，然后我会报价。我会以正确的价格发送课时邀请给你。
*1-500字 12美元
*500-800字 17美元
*800-1000字 20美元

* 1-500 words costs $12
*500-800 words costs $17 
*800-1000 words costs $20

一般情况下，我会在48小时内发回文件。

teacher_info.about_me: Hi everyone, I am Juby, a Native speaker of Thai and Burmese. I am currently living in Thailand. I have a passion for learning languages and especially the culture of different countries. I think learning languages helps you get closer to people when you speak to them with their native tongue.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I am an easy going type of individual. I can adapt to your learning needs and preferences. Please consider me as your language partner where we can have conversations on experience sharing using Thai.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I believe that learning a language is most effective when you use it. Therefore, the lessons are highly communicative. We will focus on conversations. I will help you with the pronunciation and correction to make your Thai perfect if you are already an intermediate speaker.

course_info.trial_description: I am currently offering Thai Conversation practice class focusing on speaking and listening. Let's get to know each other!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Thai
pro_course_detail.description:
This class is designed for learners who aim to practice Thai conversation. The learning is practical based where learners will be encouraged to express themselves in Thai or having discussion on a particular topic in Thai.
*Note: Learners should have some basis Thai proficiency.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello, my name is April and I am a friendly and adventurous person. I have lived all over the western U.S. and have traveled a lot throughout the US as well as in Canada and Mexico (also Hawaii).

I am interested in watching nature, and enjoy hiking in the mountains. I paint pictures of animals and flowers and like to grow a garden. Finally, I designed and helped build my own house.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello, my name is April and I am a friendly and adventurous person. I have lived all over the western U.S. and have traveled a lot throughout the US as well as in Canada and Mexico (also Hawaii).

I am interested in watching nature, and enjoy hiking in the mountains. I paint pictures of animals and flowers and like to grow a garden. Finally, I designed and helped build my own house.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I enjoy meeting people who want to learn by exploring a new language/culture. I have taught science and nature in museum, state and national park and classrooms in the U.S. to people of all ages from all over the world. Therefore I have many skills for helping you learn English. I have a TESOL certificate as well as a Master's Degree in Education from the University of Arizona.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I have "just chat" lessons for you, discussions of the news or general topics (with videos or articles as materials), and can even proofread your paper! I will adjust my teaching style to meet your needs, but I will start somewhat informal with everyone. I will keep it slow and simple if you are a beginner, and will go faster and/or use a more formal tone if you are more advanced and prefer that style. I will assign homework if you wish this.

course_info.trial_description:
Light conversation about you and your community, the fun things you do, world events, traveling or whatever you would like!  I will correct grammar, pronunciation and vocabulary, helping you build confidence in speaking and listening. 
At the end we will review for a few minutes. I will take notes and send them to you afterward.

pro_course_detail.title: Chat with April
pro_course_detail.description:
Light conversation about you and your community, the fun things you do, world events, traveling or whatever you would like!  I will correct grammar, pronunciation and vocabulary, helping you with your accuracy as you speak. 
At the end we will review for a few minutes. I will take notes and send them to you afterward if you'd like.

pro_course_detail.title: News and Views
pro_course_detail.description:
Learn and talk about new topics by watching videos or reading news articles in this 30 minute class.

1. Choose topic you like and send it to me when you make the request. (Social relationships, technology, science, education, language learning, etc.)
2. I will choose a video or article for you and send it to you when I confirm your request. I will also send you vocabulary, discussion questions to think about as you watch. (Videos are on Youtube such as Ted Talks)
2. Watch video or read article before class. 
3. In class, use the vocabulary to discuss the topic and video or article with me. I will prompt you with the questions provided and correct your errors.
4. I will send feedback after class: reviewing vocabulary, grammar and main points.

I will offer suggestions and make it just right for you!
Best for intermediate and advanced students.
See you in class!

pro_course_detail.title: Proofreading with Me!
pro_course_detail.description:
I will edit your document with you!

We will work together to correct any errors in spelling, grammar, syntax, punctuation and more. I will also help you with sentence flow so that it sounds smooth!

For up to 250 words, please choose a 30 or 45 minute time.
For up to 500 words, please choose either the 45 or 60 minute time.

**Please send your text at least 12 hours before your requested lesson time

cert_info.description:
TESOL: Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages
Training in TESOL methodology is generally recommended for teachers who plan to work with learners who are non-native English speakers living in an English speaking country.

Teachers help students to use English to communicate in their daily life in an English speaking country. This includes things like going shopping, ordering food at a restaurant, interviewing for a job, how to make small talk with coworkers, and so on.

teacher_info.intro:
你們好，我叫 Jiayun，我來自台灣。Hi! I'm Jiayun from Taiwan. I'm a native Mandarin speaker and a certified Mandarin teacher. I've been teaching Mandarin for over 3 years. 

From 2017 to 2019, I taught Mandarin in a language school in Mexico. From 2019 to 2020, I lived in BC, Canada. Recently I'm in the U.S..

Despite my college major being medical imaging and radiological sciences, and I started out teaching English, I ended up spending my last year in college taking a Mandarin teaching program on the side, to become a professional Mandarin teacher. Because for me, teaching Chinese is something I enjoy doing more.
teacher_info.about_me:
你們好，我叫 Jiayun，我來自台灣。Hi! I'm Jiayun from Taiwan. I'm a native Mandarin speaker and a certified Mandarin teacher. I've been teaching Mandarin for over 3 years. 

From 2017 to 2019, I taught Mandarin in a language school in Mexico. From 2019 to 2020, I lived in BC, Canada. Recently I'm in the U.S..

Despite my college major being medical imaging and radiological sciences, and I started out teaching English, I ended up spending my last year in college taking a Mandarin teaching program on the side, to become a professional Mandarin teacher. Because for me, teaching Chinese is something I enjoy doing more.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I create learning content on Youtube (Jiayun Mandarin) and IG (jiayunmandarin), such as video lessons for beginners using Comprehensible Input, Intermediate Chinese stories, and some lyrics translation videos. As a language learner myself, I enjoy creating content to help Mandarin learners in a diverse way, in this seemingly long journey.

I speak rather fluent English, so we'll be able to communicate clearly during lessons. My lessons can be fully in Chinese too, depending on your preference.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
What we can work on is different for each student, based on your level, preference and goal. We’ll work out a plan for you during the first lesson. 

Materials that my students often find helpful, to name a few: simply conversation practice, storybooks such as graded reader, Integrated Chinese, HSK 4 textbook, real-life materials such as Youtu.be videos, discussion platforms in Taiwan and China, etc.

There are multiple tools and resources that I can share with you as well, to help with your learning along the way.

exp_info.description: I find it helpful to speak rather fluent English when teaching Chinese. It allows me to communicate with my students clearly. It can be to explain grammar, to answer questions, to discuss learning goals, expectations, etc.

course_info.trial_description:
In the trial lesson you'll be able to learn about the lesson style, layout, and how we could work together to help you with your Mandarin in the future.

Please let me know in advance if you're a complete beginner or if the lesson is for your children, thank you.

pro_course_detail.title: Structured Conversational Course (All Level)
pro_course_detail.description:
Study guide and plan provided. For students of all level. Steadily increase your vocabulary and grammar through structured course plan with an emphasis on practical conversations.

Please let me know in advance if you're a complete beginner or if the lesson is for your children, thanks in advance.

Lesson Cancellation Policy:
Rescheduling has to be done 24 HOURS in advance through the website, otherwise the lesson will be considered as completed, (with no rescheduling nor refund).

By booking the lesson, you agree to the terms. 

There's a possibility that we could reschedule within 24 hours if something very urgent comes up and you absolutely have to. I am only more flexible in the situations when it's a regular student, who has had quite a few lessons with me, enough for me to know that they respect my time. Ultimately the decision will be up to the teacher. Please also keep in mind that I can't really fill the hour at late notice. Thanks for your understanding.

pro_course_detail.title: Pronunciation Course (Intermediate/ Advanced)
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is for learners who feel that they are struggling with speaking, whether tones or certain syllables. 

Recommended for intermediate or advanced level students. (since for beginners, it's normal that it takes some time first before your speaking becomes more smooth and natural.)

Lesson content:
In this course, you'll be asked to read out several texts and we will focus on correcting your pronunciation. We can correct them by doing certain tone or pinyin drills, whichever is needed. It's also possible that I will ask you to read out a paragraph and record it between lessons, and I will make notes for you so we know which tones or syllables are needed for more practices.

teacher_info.intro: Greetings! My name is Dwayne, and I was born and raised in South Africa. I'm an active individual who enjoys working out and leading a healthy lifestyle. I'm an outgoing person that enjoys spending time on adventures
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified TESOL teacher with 5 years experience!
teacher_info.about_me: Greetings! My name is Dwayne, and I was born and raised in South Africa. I'm an active individual who enjoys working out and leading a healthy lifestyle. I'm an outgoing person that enjoys spending time on adventures
teacher_info.about_teacher: I've been teaching for about four years and have experience in a number of settings, including online, onsite, and at various language centers. I've also worked with students of many ages, including kindergarten, primary school, high school, and seniors.  As a teacher, I love being able to implement characteristics that will benefit my students in terms of confidence and to be outgoing no matter where they are. I always look at the best possible ways to convey lessons and experiences to my students. Education is fun and it's a journey that everyone deserves to be a part of.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I usually start my lessons by having a short conversation with my students, a series of questions will be asked to get to know their interests and their dislikes, this allows me to create a successful class but it also allows me to look at their strengths and their weaknesses. Educational games will be introduced to induce enthusiasm in my students and to get them to be comfortable rather than shy. I encourage my students to speak more throughout the class, which allows me to work on their pronunciation and listening skills. I usually give homework but i also try to get them to work on an interactive pdf before the class ends, that would confirm their understanding of what has been taught.

teacher_info.intro:
🔻 🇨🇳 🇰🇷 🇯🇵 🔻   *Scroll down for 汉语/ 한국어/日本語/عربي* 

*我不教儿童和12岁以下的青少年 

I am from the United Kingdom and work as a Journalist and Editor. I am ESL-qualified and teach Conversational, Communicative, IELTS, and Business English. I have taught over 15,000 classes and have 100s of happy students. I have been teaching English for over a decade to a wide variety of age groups. 

I enjoy teaching in a fun and casual manner. My lessons are mainly based on reading comprehension and conversation. 

As a Journalist and Editor, I can also help with essay correction, resumés/CV's and applications to university.
teacher_info.short_signature: ❗ 新年促销动 • Journalist • IELTS Coaching • University Support
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello, I'm Ismail. I live in London, in the United Kingdom. I am a native English speaker and specialise in copywriting, proofreading, essay writing, conversation practice, pronunciation and business. 

I currently work as a journalist and editor at a national newspaper, as well as a regular part-time English teacher. I also teach Business English both online and in-person and focus on conversation/free talk, the digital economy, interview skills and much more. 

I have taught English for over a decade to a wide variety of age groups, from young children to adults. Having studied at British schools and universities, I have an excellent written and spoken knowledge of the language.

Is your pronunciation bad? Do other people seem confused when you speak English? Don't worry, I am here to help. As a journalist and editor, I can also help with your essay writing, university application and resumes (approximate rate is 400 words per half-hour). 

I have, by sharing my expertise throughout the application process, helped a number of foreign students attain places at some of the best British universities. 

My lessons are different depending on what you want to focus on; - New vocabulary - Discussions of breaking news articles - Writing Improvement 

★What is my teaching style? I enjoy teaching in a fun, friendly and casual manner! I like talking about everyday subjects, learning more about my students and teaching through role-play. My lessons are mainly based on conversations and getting you to do most of the speaking, so If you enjoy learning using casual subjects; please try a lesson with me! 

★Conversational English: Are you going to an English speaking country for studies, work or even just a short trip? You can learn how to converse with others better, make friends and make your stay a little easier!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
🇨🇳 我的名字是 以实玛利。我是一名以英语为母语的新闻编辑、记者。目前在一家全国性的报社工作。同时，我也是一名可靠的兼职英语教师。我具备英语教学资格，已有超过15,000课时的授课经验且学生数量数以百计。无论是线上线下我都有授课，目前主要教授英语会话、雅思以及商务英语。
        在我的课堂上，我会更关注英语会话、自由交谈，数字经济以及面试技巧等内容。我曾受过英国的高等教育，对英语方面有着颇深的造诣。在我10年的教学经验中，我的教授对象包括从儿童到成年等广泛年龄群体。这些丰富的经验使我的课堂更加生动有趣。

🇰🇷  안녕하세요, 저는 이스마엘 입니다. 저는 영국 런던에서 왔으며 현재 태국 방콕에 거주하고 있습니다. 영어 원어민이며 카피 라이팅, 첨삭, 에세이 쓰기, 회화 연습, 발음과 비지니스 영어가 전문입니다. 현재 신문사에서 저널리스트이자 에디터로 활동하고 있으며 파트타임 영어강사로 활동하고 있습니다. 영어를 배우고 싶은 수강생을 만나길 기대하며 그들의 실력이 향상될 수 있도록 도와주고 싶습니다. 곧 여러분을 만나길 기대합니다.

🇯🇵 こんにちは、イシュマエルといいます。イギリスのロンドン在住です。英語のネイティブスピーカーでコピーライティング、校正、エッセイライティング、会話練習、発音、ビジネスが専門です。 私は現在、全国紙のジャーナリスト兼編集者として働いており、定期的にパートタイムの英語講師もしています。英文学について造詣が深く、シェイクスピア.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
أعمل في صحيفة وطنية، وكذلك مدرس لغة إنجليزية بدوام جزئي. 
أقوم بتدريس اللغة الإنجليزية عبر الإنترنت وشخصيًا وأركز على المحادثة، التحدث الحر والأعمال والاقتصاد الرقمي ومهارات المقابلة والمزيد من المجالات.

🗣️ 💬  Is your pronunciation bad? Do other people seem confused when you speak? Don't worry, I am here to help.  Are you going to the UK or any English speaking country for studies, work or even just a short trip? You can learn how to converse, make friends and make your stay a little easier.

exp_info.description:
I am a professional journalist writing for a number of publications both online and in print. I complete contract work, single pieces or regular assignments for newspapers, magazines, companies and other organisations. I often sell their services by the piece, by the hour or by the day—or sometimes by the word.

I curate information and news to inform or entertain readers. I have exceptionally strong writing skills paying attention to grammar, syntax and tone.
This was my first experience teaching solely in the target language. I worked around 20 teaching hours per week.

Part of a small-team covering the Toyota Mekong Club Championship, a regional football tournament initiated by Toyota Pacific, covering some of the regions premier football clubs. 

Responsible for writing match previews, reports and conducting interviews with players and coaches of some of Southeast Asia’s biggest teams.

cert_info.description: The course offered a comprehensive overview of English literature in its various manifestations. I learnt the development of literary culture in English, from its early stages to its fragmentation into multiple international literatures.

The programme provided sound foundations of history as a discipline by introducing central approaches and theories in historical analysis. Particularly, the programme encourages students to develop their understanding of the regional histories of Africa, Asia, and the Middle East.

pro_course_detail.title: A) Phone English │ 纯语音教学 │ 通話のみの英会話 │ 영어 회화를 위한 전화 영어 클래스  CONVERSATION🗣️ + READING📰 + LISTENING👂+PRONUNCIATION🎤 + google slides + written feedback + recording (if requested)
pro_course_detail.description:
⬇🇨🇳 🇰🇷 🇯🇵 ⬇

This is an Audio-Only class so no webcam will be used - although there can be screen-sharing to facilitate class material. Many students like to use their cellphone or iPad for this class although you are welcome to use a computer/notebook if you'd prefer.

For more structured classes, I will use news articles to help students read, understand, comprehend and discuss a variety of topics.

CONVERSATION 🗣️ + READING 📰 + LISTENING 👂+PRONUNCIATION 🎤 + News Articles + Written Feedback (if requested) + recording (if requested)

*The lesson is 40, 55, 85 mins to allow time for my next class.*

--

*纯语音教学* 日常英文-练就流利口语


纯语音课程，不开启摄像头。我发现一些学生更喜欢这种形式，因为这样压力更小，也可能他们刚开始用英语和外国人对话会有点不好意思。在你尝试更高级的课程之前，这种形式会帮助你更快适应。不过，我仍会使用屏幕共享功能来展示课件

** 
通話のみの英会話レッスン

こんにちは、イシュマエルといいます。私は英語教師として10年以上の経験があり、オンライン英会話スクールを5年間運営しています。生徒の皆様がストレスなく英語を学ぶために、革新的である『通話のみの英会話レッスン』を提供しています。

授業を円滑に進めるために、レッスンで使用する教材を画面上でシェアはしますが、基本的にウェブカメラは使用しません。パソコンを使用してのレッスンでも構いませんが、生徒の皆様からはスマートフォンやiPadを使用してのレッスンが好まれています。

もし計画的なレッスンを希望される場合には、読解力を上げて内容を理解したり、様々な題材でディスカッションができるようにするために、ニュース記事を使用します。

***

영어 회화를 위한 전화 영어 클래스

저는 10년 넘게 영어 교사로 일해 왔으며 지난 5년간 온라인 클래스로 영어를 가르쳤습니다. 

학생들이 스트레스 받지 않고, 부담 없이 영어를 배우며 연습할 수 있는 혁신적인 '전화 영어 클래스'를 운영하고 있습니다.

이 수업은 웹캠을 별도로 사용하지 않고, 화면 공유를 통해 수업 자료를 보면서 진행됩니다.

학생이 원한다면 컴퓨터나 노트북을 사용해도 괜찮지만, 많은 학생들이 핸드폰이나 태블릿PC를 이용한 수업을 선호하는 편입니다.

조금 더 체계적인 다방면의 수업을 선호한다면, 저는 학생들이 다양한 주제에 대해 읽고, 이해하고, 토론하는 것을 도울 수 있도록 뉴스 기사 등을 사용할 것입니다.

pro_course_detail.title: B) Webcam-Video Class 🎥 General English │ Reading │ Conversation │ Pronunciation (25/40/55 mins) + News Articles + Written Feedback (If requested)
pro_course_detail.description:
⬇🇨🇳⬇  *Scroll down for 汉语

This is a general English course that will guide you on your path to fluency! One-on-one instruction is the best way to quickly and thoroughly improve your English. 

From your very first lesson with me, you will be speaking English in a relaxed environment. We will focus primarily on listening and speaking, and with that comes vocabulary, grammar, and pronunciation.

CONVERSATION 🗣️ + READING 📰 + LISTENING 👂+PRONUNCIATION 🎤 + News Articles + Written Feedback (if requested) + recording (if requested)

The topics will differ thematically to provide you with the ability to fully grow your vocabulary. The topics are customisable according to your needs and interests. All levels welcome!

--

* 每节课时间为25、40或55分钟，以便我为下一节课做准备。 *

* 在线视频教学 * 日常英文-练就流利口语
这是一门通用英语课程，它将帮助你练就一口流利的英文。从我们的第一堂课开始，你将会在轻松愉快的情境下开口说英语。我们将主要练习听力和口语，并学习这一过程中遇到的词汇、语法和发音知识。

为了充分扩展你的词汇量，每节课的话题会在主题上有所不同。我也可以根据你的需要和兴趣来定制主题。

You are supposed to prepare your textbook by your self. "Genki" or "みんなの日本語"
I recommend you to remember how to read Hiragana before taking this lesson. 

<During my lesson>

teacher_info.intro:
Hola ¿qué tal?
My name's Jorge.  I'm living in Japan right now but I was born in Salamanca (Spain). I graduated in French philology at Salamanca University. Salamanca is well known for its university and a lot of students from all over the world come every year to study Spanish. When I was a student I was very interested in languages and in different cultures. In my free time I love to stay with my family, but also, I enjoy playing the guitar (although I'm not very good) and reading literature in Spanish and French. I really love authors as Cervantes, Galdós, Modiano and Delibes.
teacher_info.short_signature: Spanish native teacher based in Japan. Over 10 years of experience
teacher_info.about_me:
Hola ¿qué tal?
My name's Jorge.  I'm living in Japan right now but I was born in Salamanca (Spain). I graduated in French philology at Salamanca University. Salamanca is well known for its university and a lot of students from all over the world come every year to study Spanish. When I was a student I was very interested in languages and in different cultures. In my free time I love to stay with my family, but also, I enjoy playing the guitar (although I'm not very good) and reading literature in Spanish and French. I really love authors as Cervantes, Galdós, Modiano and Delibes.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I have a Master's Degree in Teaching Spanish as a Foreign Language.  I've got more than ten years of experience. In the past 10 years I've been working at some universities in Japan. Before, I've been also teaching in France and in some language schools at Salamanca and at Kyoto. I really love my job and I like to get fun in my classes, so I always try to select interesting materials. In addition, I remember when I was 16 years old, I spent a month learning French with native teachers, I really really enjoyed that time and I learnt a lot. And that’s my goal, I try to help my students to learn Spanish and get fun at the same time.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I like to prepare my classes in advance, and choose the right materials according to your level and your interests.  I’m very patient and I always try to speak slowly and clearly. I could use French, some English or even some Japanese but I prefer make an effort and use only Spanish in my classes. I’ll give you a lot of examples, I’ll make you a lot of questions, etc. because my goal is to make you speak, is to make you used to a new language. And then, help you to improve your level.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish for Beginners: A1 and A2 level
pro_course_detail.description: Do you want to learn Spanish from zero? In this course You will learn the grammar and the vocabulary you need to make yourself understood in a basic level: talking about you, about your family, about your interest, etc.  You're going to have a lot of practice, and you're going to speak in Spanish from the first day.

pro_course_detail.title: Intermediate Spanish: B1 and B2 level
pro_course_detail.description: We will focus on grammar, vocabulary, colloquial expressions, etc. using a manual or my own materials. Estudiaremos gramática, vocabulario, expresiones idiomáticas, etc. Usando un manual o materiales creados por mí.

pro_course_detail.title: Clase de lectura - Reading class
pro_course_detail.description: In this class, we're going to read some books or stories. The material will be according to your level and to your interests. We're going to read together and I'm going to help you to sound natural, and also, I'm going to help you if you have some difficulties with the grammar or the vocabulary. Reading a book is a good moment to work on the comprehension, on the grammar, and also it's a great starting point to have a conversation about an interesting topic. Sometimes, if you agree, or if you’re brave enough, for the next class we can write the next chapter or an alternative end to the story.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish through the comics (Leyendo tebeos)
pro_course_detail.description: En esta clase vas a practicar el español leyendo tebeos tradicionales editados en España. Vas a conocer muchos personajes entrañables que han leído jóvenes (y no tan jóvenes) españoles durante generaciones: Anacleto, el Capitán Trueno, Mortadelo y Filemón, El Jabato, etc.  Aprenderás además nuevos aspectos de la cultura española, cómo es el sentido del humor español, modismos o frases coloquiales, juegos de palabras, etc.

teacher_info.about_teacher: As a teacher, it's important to connect with learners.  In this case, we know the objective is to use English, so I must engage with the learner at his or her level.  The best thing for connecting with each other is to find out the interests of the learner.  I'm able to help guide the learning process with friendly and inquiring conversation.  My past teaching experience will be helpful in suggesting tools, and activities for the learner.
teacher_info.teaching_style: As a Community Tudor, I would follow what I stated in 'Me as a Teacher'.  My conversations will be guided by the learner.  I have a very good grasp of most career, and/or hobbies, and can bring forth topics and a suitable level of language to encourage the learner to engage easily with me.  It often surprises me, and the learner, how much they can speak in English about things that really interest them.  Leading questions, and natural discourse are great tools to encourage success in conversation.

course_info.trial_description:
Introductions: 'Hi! I'm Jeannie from Canada.  Can you tell me your name?  ...'Hello (name), where are you from? '  'I'm going to be taking notes so I can keep track of our conversation.'
'Are you presently working or are you a student?'

'Let's brainstorm some themes you may be interested in discussing.' 
'How often do you wish to have a lesson, and for how much time do you prefer each lesson to be?'
'It was great to meet you, and I look forward to working with you!'

pro_course_detail.title: Creating confidence in using English - Camping.
pro_course_detail.description:
The student can expect to become comfortable with English vocabulary with items she is familiar with in her life.  
This lesson is focused on a normal activity she has done before.
The focus of the lesson is vocabulary, emphasizing pronunciation - intonation
Teaching method: visually seeing pictures or handling items involved in planning and going on a camping trip.  It's likely the student will know the English names of some items, yet unsure of the pronunciation/intonation, and how to use the words in conversation.  Use of the chat function to share vocabulary knowledge, correct spelling and intonation.  Writing and speaking sentences to help the student become comfortable with explaining the use of different items. Here is an opportunity for the student to begin expressing some past camping experiences in English by explaining in a safe learning environment.

teacher_info.intro:
日本（にほん）に生（う）まれ、育（そだ）った日本人（にほんじん）です。
猫（ねこ）が好（す）きで、２匹（ひき）飼（か）っています。
動物（どうぶつ）と接（せっ）していると　いやされます。
趣味（しゅみ）は音楽（おんがく）で、ジャンルを問（と）わず　ききます。
最近（さいきん）は、若（わか）いときに　きいていた、ダンスミュージック、パンクを懐（なつ）かしく　きいて楽（たの）しんでいます。

teacher_info.about_teacher:
私（わたし）は今（いま）、日本（にほん）で働（はた）く外国人（がいこくじん）の方（かた）たちに日本語（にほんご）を教（おし）えています。日本語教師（にほんごきょうし）の資格（しかく）も　もっていますので、くわしく教（おし）えることができます。授業中（じゅぎょうちゅう）、わからないことがあったら、なんでも聞（き）いてください。何度（なんど）でも聞（き）いてください。わかるまで丁寧（ていねい）に説明（せつめい）します。
また、日本の会社（かいしゃ）で長（なが）く働いていましたので、ビジネス会話（かいわ）についても教えることができます。そのほか、みなさんの希望（きぼう）をお聞（き）きして授業をしますので、なんでもリクエストしてください。
teacher_info.teaching_style:
日本語（にほんご）で授業（じゅぎょう）をします。英語（えいご）で　すこし補足（ほそく）することもできます。
①文法（ぶんぽう）・・初級（しょきゅう）・中級（ちゅうきゅう）・上級（じょうきゅう）
　教科書（きょうかしょ）「みんなの日本語」「げんき」「中級から学ぶ日本語」「中級へ行こう」を　　
　使（つか） います。
　※ほかに使（つか）いたい教科書があれば、言（い）ってください。
②会話（かいわ）・・自由（じゆう）に楽（たの）しく、いろいろな話（はなし）をしながら勉強しま 
   す。会話の中（なか）の文法（ぶんぽう）、言葉（ことば）の意味（いみ）、発音（はつおん）の勉 
   強もします。
③JLPT対策（たいさく）・・N1～N４の合格（ごうかく）を目指（めざ）します。
　教科書（きょうかしょ）「新完全マスター 」「日本語総まとめ」を使います。
　※ほかに使いたい教科書があれば、言ってください。
④EJU対策・・過去問等を使って記述と読解の勉強をします。
　記述については、出題テーマについて議論→書く→添削という流れです。
　読解については、スピードと正確さを備えるために、文章のどこに着目すべきかを確認します。
　文章中の語彙・文法も勉強します。
⑤文章の添削・・レポート、大学の課題、研究計画書、その他　文章の添削をします。授業前に文章を　
　送信してもらい、授業のときに話し合いながら直していきます。
　４００字以内（４５分授業）、８００字以内（６０分授業）、１２００字以内（９０分授業）

どの国の人にも日本語で指導をすることができます。

teacher_info.intro:
¡Hola! Mi nombre es María, Soy Chilena, pero actualmente vivo en Nueva Zelanda. Estoy constantemente aprendiendo cosas nuevas y una de ellas es adquirir un idioma extranjero como segunda lengua. Esto ha requerido mucha dedicación y tiempo, pero he experimentado alegría y satisfacción en mi viaje de aprendizaje al observar mi avance.

Me encanta enseñar y me hace feliz ver a la gente mejorar su español. Mi pasión es viajar, he realizado viajes de cicloturismo por el sur de Chile, Bolivia y Perú, como también he recorrido gran parte de Nueva Zelanda. Me encanta bailar, practique biodanza por alrededor de 3 años y soy feliz aprendiendo cosas nuevas acerca de las culturas.

Me encanta enseñar y me hace feliz ver a la gente mejorar su español. Me encanta bailar, practique biodanza por alrededor de 3 años y soy feliz aprendiendo cosas nuevas acerca de las culturas.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Es importante tener en cuenta que les enseño a mis alumnos con respeto y cortesía y aprecio cuando me tratan de la misma forma, los objetivos siempre estarán enfocados en que puedas comunicarte con confianza en situaciones cotidianas, discutir temas de actualidad y demostrar un vocabulario y gramática para la meta que te propongas.

Aprender cualquier idioma debería ser divertido. Puede haber días en los que te sientas desanimado o desmotivado, pero eso nunca debería impedirte lograr tu sueño.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Basado en lo que es mejor para cada uno de mis estudiantes, utilizo una variedad de métodos de enseñanza, materiales y experiencia personal.

Cada persona aprende de manera diferente y está dotada de sus propias formas únicas, por lo que si eres un aprendiz rápido o lento, si estás decidido, ¡aprenderás! Soy paciente y comprensiva con mis alumnos.

En todas mis lecciones, habrá correcciones de gramática y pronunciación. Está bien cometer errores porque eso es parte del aprendizaje, pero no queremos crear malos hábitos.

La mejor forma de mejorar tus habilidades es practicando. La práctica hace la perfección.

course_info.trial_description:
Las clases de prueba son una gran oportunidad para conocernos y revisar si mi estilo de enseñanza conecta con tu estilo de aprendizaje. 

En una clase de prueba tendrás la oportunidad de hablar Español y realizar las preguntas relevantes que ayudarán a adaptar su necesidad de aprendizaje.

pro_course_detail.title: Práctica de Conversación · Let's talk in Spanish.
pro_course_detail.description:
Esta clase es perfecta para adultos y adolescentes que quieran practicar su español.

¿Quieres ganar confianza al hablar español? ¿ O quieres practicar español pero tienes poco tiempo libre? ¿O simplemente desea practicar sus habilidades de conversación con comentarios constructivos sobre su idioma, gramática y pronunciación? ¡Esta es la clase para ti!. Elegiremos un tema en cada clase y te daré comentarios sobre el idioma a medida que lo hablas.

pro_course_detail.title: Clase de Español · Grammar, Reading, Writing, and Speaking
pro_course_detail.description:
Esta clase es perfecta si quieres estudiar en profundidad el Español.

Una vez que reserve la clase, le preguntaré sobre su nivel de español y sus objetivos para poder preparar el plan de lección perfecto para usted.

¡El aprendizaje de idiomas no tiene por qué ser aburrido! Habrá actividades y lecciones planeadas para ayudarlo a aprender español.

¿Qué haremos en clases?
· Conversaciones
· Mejorar tu vocabulario
· Puntos gramaticales
· Leer y discutir artículos
· Escuchar audios
· Escribir
· Test que demuestren su avance 

Si decide continuar reservando lecciones conmigo, crearé una carpeta compartida de Google Drive donde encontrará tareas y material adicional para practicar.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello, I'm HY. I'm also a language learner like you. I've been studying English for my whole life, and also I began to learn Chinese and Spanish these days. Since I have many experiences of learning another language, I can totally understand how you feel about learning Korean. Korean is very tricky to learn since it's a totally different language from another one.
     I really love an informal style of and fun class. So I want you to express your opinion very freely. I'm a good listener and I will be trying a lot of efforts to improve your speaking korean in a very fun way. 
     I really want to see you in our class! ^_^
teacher_info.short_signature: Korean adventure with also a language learner! Hola, Ni hao, Hello, 안녕하세요!

     I really want to see you in our class! ^_^
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I've been teaching korean informally to my foreign friends. I was in US for a year and some of my friends really wanted to learn korean. So I taught them korean whatever it's small or big whenever we hung out. 
     Also, when I was in a lab, my lab-mates were usually from South-East Asia. Since they have to talk in korean when communicating, I always helped them. They usually took a grammar class, but learning a grammar and communicating is totally different as you know. I want to level up your speaking skills!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I mostly want to improve you korean communication skills, but not in a boring way. 
     I want to make use of media or korean drama to teach a conversational korean. And that is what I'm using when I learn another language.
     If you find an energetic tutor and wanna have a fun korean class, please book my trial lesson. We can talk about your experience, how you started learning korean, and in what way you wanna learn korean.
     I'll listen up your opinion and fit into your style.
     This class is for you! I want to meet you very soon! ^_^

course_info.trial_description: Hello, there! Here, in my lesson, I wanna talk about what part of the korean are you attracted. From it, I wanna use it in my real class. I wanna get to know you in trial lesson so that it can be more effective in our next lesson! I look forward to seeing you! -Hyeyoung

pro_course_detail.title: Focusing on pronunciation and intonation for real conversation!

Hello, there! 
I personally see conversational skill as the most important thing in real world.
I want to correct you as much as possible.
Also, if you have your own style of learning, please let me know.
I will fit into your class style so that it will become yours!
Let's see in class! ^_^

Hyeyoung.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
"The capacity to learn is a gift; the ability to learn is a skill; the willingness to learn is a choice."

As someone who grew up in a multicultural society learning three different languages from young and who is learning currently learning languages, I know the joy and the challenges that comes with learning a new language.

My interests include travel, music, science, culture, psychology, theology, business ideas, food, films, finance, fitness, languages, law and literature.

I am a friendly, patient and easy-going person who can give you the encouragement and confidence to succeed. My teaching is versatile and I am able to adapt to your learning needs and preferred style.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
~ 1 free lesson after every 100 lessons ~
~ Contact me to book packages of 5, 10 and 20 :) ~
~ May 2022 slots are now open! ~

Our lessons will be fun and relaxed, so you can enjoy practicing in your new language.   

Although all lessons are unique, a 'typical' lesson may have a focus on speaking and listening, with grammar, pronunciation and vocabulary to flow from there.

We can also do reading comprehension and writing, or I can correct any exercises you have done.  Lessons can be customized to cater to any request you may have.

We can also use the comprehensible input and TPRS (teaching proficiency through reading, songs and storytelling) method.

I look forward to meeting you! :)

course_info.trial_description:
We can get to know each other in this lesson, gauge your level and discuss goals, learning targets or specific topics related to language acquisition.

Feel free to send me a message and ask me questions.

I look forward to meeting you in class!  :)

- Please note that it is not possible to cancel or reschedule the lesson 24 hours before the lesson begins.

- According to italki policy, booking a 30 and 60 minutes means a 25-minute and 55-minute lesson for administration purposes and reasons.

pro_course_detail.title: Kopitiam Chat - Vocabulary, Grammar and Pronunciation & Unstructured General Course
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is designed to help you develop communicative competency and improve your vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation based on freestyle conversation.

You can choose some topics you're interested in or let me decide.  We can also use materials such as articles, pictures, videos, poems, songs, recipes and more!  :)

We can also talk about all things Malaysian: food, culture, sports and more, all done as though you're sitting in a busy coffeeshop (known as kopitiam) in pre-Covid times!

Teaching not based on structured material is also available.

>	Get 5%-10% off by purchasing a package of 5, 10 or 20 lessons.  Please ask for unlisted packages as italki only allows one type to be shown.

- Please note that it is not possible to cancel or reschedule the lesson 24 hours before the lesson begins.

- According to italki policy, booking a 30 and 60 minutes means a 25-minute and 55-minute lesson for administration purposes and reasons of necessity.

pro_course_detail.title: Malay Language Course (Including General, Kids, Business, Test Preparation & TPRS/CI)
pro_course_detail.description:
Note:  Please specify the course of your choice, or the General Course will automatically be chosen.  The different courses are put together as italki only allows tutors to put up three types of courses.

This course is designed for you to approach the the Malay language in a relaxed atmosphere.  All levels welcomed.

We can focus on colloquial and/or formal Malay, and I will use a variety of materials to tailor a program according to your objectives and learning style.

Te enseñaré a hablar el idioma español con impacto, con estrategia, con poder. Nunca más volverás a pasar desapercibido.
Estoy completamente seguro de que después de estas clases tu nivel de español no volverá a ser el mismo. (Serán clases muy prácticas) donde también aprenderás: pronunciación, expresión corporal, tono de voz, postura, seguridad, contacto visual, ¡y mucho más! ¿Qué estas esperando? ¡Te veo dentro!

teacher_info.intro:
Me llamo Bryan, soy nacido y criado en Montevideo, la capital de Uruguay. Amo el aprendizaje de los idiomas, en este momento tengo un nivel B1 en italiano, y un nivel A2 en inglés y en portugués, los cuales aún estoy estudiando con mis respectivos profesores para seguir mejorando. 
Hablo "Español Rioplatense" como pueden ver en el video.
Me encanta jugar al fútbol, andar en bicicleta, mirar series y películas (sobre todo de terror), también me gusta leer mucho, y amo la comida, siempre busco algún lugar nuevo donde comer, así como también probar comida de otros países. Amo el chocolate :D También amo escuchar música, conozco música en muchos idiomas y mucha variedad de géneros.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Tengo muchos años de experiencia ayudando a extranjeros a aprender español y a mejorarlo, he ayudado a muchas personas de Brasil, Italia, Estados Unidos, entre otros.
No estudié para ser profesor, por lo cual siempre he enseñado a base de mi experiencia. Enseño de la misma manera que me gustaría que me enseñaran a mi.
MUY A MENUDO ACTIVO LAS CLASES INSTANTANEAS, ESO SIGNIFICA QUE PODÉS COMPRAR UNA CLASE Y A LOS 5 MINUTOS TENERLA, ASÍ QUE ESTÉN ATENTOS 😁
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Por el momento solo estoy brindando clases de conversación para quien quiera mejorar su español obteniendo una mejor pronunciación, así como también fluidez al hablarlo. NO ENSEÑO ESPAÑOL DESDE CERO. Prefiero que una persona más capacitada que yo, la cual haya estudiado para ser profesor los pueda ayudar, pero si lo que quieren es practicar teniendo una conversación, estoy disponible para ustedes.
Esto lo podemos hacer de manera libre, que es a elección del alumno, o a base de artículos elegidos por el alumno o por mi.

course_info.trial_description:
Lo que ofrezco son clases de conversación para personas que ya tengan una noción, es decir, un pequeño conocimiento sobre el español.
La idea es que con la práctica puedas mejorar tu fluidez, así como aprender léxico nuevo, y también poder aclara cualquier duda que te pueda surgir.

pro_course_detail.title: TOMEMOS UN CAFÉ O UN MATE MIENTRAS CONVERSAMOS UN RATO 😃☕🧉
pro_course_detail.description:
Esta clase es ideal para quien quiera practicar el español de una manera muy distendida, como si estuviera hablando con un amigo.
De esta manera vas a poder mejorar tu fluidez en el idioma, corregir errores, así como aprender léxico nuevo.

pro_course_detail.title: ¿ENTENDÉS PERO NO TE ANIMÁS A HABLAR? ¡ESTA CLASE ES PERFECTA PARA VOS!
pro_course_detail.description:
¿Entendés el español pero aún no te animás a hablarlo? ¡Esta clase es perfecta para vos!
Como muy bien sabemos antes de hablar hay que aprender a escuchar, para entender y poder repodrucir los sonidos de la mejor manera posible, por eso, en esta clase te voy a hablar todo el tiempo en español, y vos vas a poder hablarme en el idioma que te sientas más cómodo entre los otros idiomas que yo sé (inglés, portugués e italiano). La idea es que con el tiempo te animes a hablar cada vez más el español :)

pro_course_detail.title: ¿Y SI LEEMOS JUNTOS?  🤔📕📗📘📚
pro_course_detail.description:
Si querés practicar tu lectura, podríamos analizar juntos artículos y noticias del momento.
Así como también empezar a leer un libro juntos, o podríamos analizar canciones en español de tu artista favorito.

30분 뿐만 아니라 45분 혹은 1시간을 줌으로써 여러분이 더 편안하고 더 많은 것을 배울 수 있는 시범 수업입니다! 이 수업이 끝나면 기존 수업을 신청해야 합니다.^^ 저는 보통 학생 발전에 전념하기 위해 집에 있습니다. 그래서 즉각적인 수업도 가능하니 메시지 주세요! 또한, 수강 신청 전에 리뷰를 모두 읽으세요. 리뷰가 저에 대한 모든 것을 증명해 줍니다!

저는 여러분에게 단어와 표현만 던져주는 것이 아닌, 한국어를 배울 수 있는 많은 조언, 기술, 능력을 주고 싶어요! 저와 함께 수업한 후에는, 설 힘을 기를 수 있고 결국 자신만의 길을 만들 수 있습니다. 저는 최선을 다해 우리의 수업에 임할 것입니다.

저는 학생들이 한국어에 얼마나 관심이 있고 열심히 공부하려고 노력하는지 알고 있기에 한국어를 가장 효율적이고 효과적으로 가르칠 것을 약속하고, 소중한 시간과 수업을 낭비하지 않을 것입니다.

선택과 집중이 저의 수업 모토입니다. 학생이 원하는 것을 모든 것을 듣고 수업에 적극적으로 반영합니다!

시범 수업에서는 서로에 대해 소개하고 알아가고 파일에 다양한 단어와 문법을 제공해 줄 겁니다! 여러분의 장점과 단점에 대해 이야기하면서 수업을 진행하는 방법에 대해서도 이야기하고 최선의 해결책도 생각해 낼 것입니다.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! 

My name is Isabella and I’m a Swedish native speaker from Stockholm. I love languages and have been learning foreign languages for a long time. Except language learning, I also enjoy travelling and mountainbiking.
teacher_info.introduction: Hello everyone! My name is Isabella and I come from Stockholm, Sweden. I’ve been very interested in languages as long as I can remember. Apart from English, I’m also learning Spanish and German. I enjoy travelling a lot. It’s quite fascinating to me how learning foreign languages and getting to know other cultures makes me learn more about my own language and culture. I would be really happy to help you improve your language skills and teach you more about Swedish culture and customs. If you’re a Swedish beginner I’ll help you get started and get “the feeling” of the language and if you are already more advanced we will focus on more complex topics. Either way we will speak about things that are interesting to you. I hope to see you soon!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello! 

My name is Isabella and I’m a Swedish native speaker from Stockholm. I love languages and have been learning foreign languages for a long time. Except language learning, I also enjoy travelling and mountainbiking.
teacher_info.about_teacher: In 2014 I started teaching Swedish to people from across the world. My teaching approach varies depending on the students personal goals and level.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I offer structured lessons for all levels, A1-C2. However, I also offer conversational classes if that is what you are looking for. 
I have an educational background in language and culture studies and I studied teaching Swedish as a second language at university. 
Please feel free to book your first lesson with me. I can’t wait to help you learn / improve your Swedish!

edu_info.major: Teaching Swedish as a Second Language

cert_info.certificate: Teaching Swedish as a Second Language

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description:
Informal English Conversation Practice:
This course is good for you if you wish to improve your English conversation skills.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description:
Informal Swedish Conversation Practice:
This course is good for you if you wish to improve your Swedish conversation skills.

pro_course_detail.title: Structured Lessons A1 - C2
pro_course_detail.description: I offer structured lessons from level A1 to C2, including speaking, listening, reading, writing, grammar, homework and pronunciation practice. Structured lessons are good for you if you want to improve your Swedish / learn Swedish following a more structured approach, and / or - if you are preparing for taking a Swedish language exam.

teacher_info.intro:
Hey there! My name is Abril! I'm Currently 23 years old (My ultimate goal is to live 100 more). I like cinema (even more if the piece is animated) I enjoy learning about palmistry, psychology, biology, history, music, basically everything but economy (I just can't fathom how that works)
I'm a graphic designer, a pharmacy student and a burden to my family. Jk.
In my free time I like to paint, cook, read, and play fall guys.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hey there! My name is Abril! I'm Currently 23 years old (My ultimate goal is to live 100 more). I like cinema (even more if the piece is animated) I enjoy learning about palmistry, psychology, biology, history, music, basically everything but economy (I just can't fathom how that works)
I'm a graphic designer, a pharmacy student and a burden to my family. Jk.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
As a teacher I like to challenge my students. 
Let them see how far they've come, and push them to get better after every lesson.
Honesty is my way. This means that I will be completely honest with you as a student.
If your vocabulary has improved, I will make sure you're aware of this to boost your confidence. On the other hand,  if you're having trouble with pronunciation, I will also point that out so we can fix that.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lessons will be highly interactive, full of challenging activities so you can engage and stay interested in every lesson.
These activities can seem fun but actually demand analyzing, reading, listening, debating and writing, since these are important efficiency parameters.
Beware, we will talk a lot.
But not everything can be fun. In between every lesson we will have a "study section" here we’ll discuss grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, doubts you may have, basically anything that's needed for you to speak accurately and improve faster.

course_info.trial_description:
¡Hola, Me llamo Abril y me encantaría ayudarte con tu español!

En esta breve clase vamos a identificar cual es tu nivel y cómo podemos mejorarlo!
Por lo tanto esta será una clase mixta, algo de conversación, lectura, escritura, pronunciación, etc…

Conversaremos de tus objetivos personales con el español y de tus intereses en general para así poder planear clases que sean ideales PARA TI.

pro_course_detail.title: ¡Hablando y anotando!
pro_course_detail.description:
En esta clase prepárate para hablar, conversar, charlar, discutir, argumentar, consultar, compartir y ser tú mismo! 
Si, será algo muy tranquilo, pero no te olvides de tener tu cuaderno cerca porque te aseguro que al terminar habrás aprendido algo nuevo!

pro_course_detail.title: ¿Te gusta leer?
pro_course_detail.description:
Si te gusta leer ¡esta es tu clase!
Si en realidad leer no es de tus actividades favoritas, ¡tranquilo! te aseguro que será entretenido.

Podemos leer artículos, noticias o libros (cortos preferiblemente, NADA DE GOT, ¿ok?)

Mi abuelo siempre dice que leer es vida, como profesora, yo pienso algo similar; Leer es VITAL. 
Si quieres aprender un idioma bien, leer es indispensable.
Así que.....
¡Calienta tus cuerdas vocales y ve a buscar tus lentes, vamos a leer!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation is coming...
pro_course_detail.description:
Conversation is coming but don't worry, this won't kill you! I swear!
It'll be fun, you'll get to test your knowledge and in the meantime you'll gain even more! Get ready to expand your vocabulary and boost your confidence when speaking.
Don't forget your notebook and pen though!

pro_course_detail.title: Shall we practice your reading?
pro_course_detail.description:
If you like to read, this is your class! And if not, well… you still need this so don't leave, please! I assure you it will be entertaining.

We can read articles, news or books (preferably short, NO GOT, ok?)

Remember that reading is an essential part of any language
so.....
Warm up your vocal cords and go get your glasses, let's read!

teacher_info.intro:
I'm brazilian and majored in Portuguese. I'm passionate about teaching languages. I can also speak English and Spanish (and a bit French).

Sou brasileira, graduada em Letras e apaixonada pelo ensino de línguas. Também falo inglês e espanhol (e um pouco de francês).
teacher_info.short_signature: Portuguese and English teacher, majored in Portuguese / Professora de PT e ING, graduada em Letras.
teacher_info.about_me:
I'm brazilian and majored in Portuguese. I'm passionate about teaching languages. I can also speak English and Spanish (and a bit French).

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I've been teaching Portuguese and English for 5 years.

Eu ministro aulas de português e inglês há 5 anos.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Conversation is the basis of my teaching, carried out in a relaxed and patient way, and with the help of slide presentations, for example. I also use materials with important language content to be learned.

A conversação é a base do ensino, realizando de maneira descontraída e paciente, e com o auxílio de apresentações em slides, por exemplo. Também utilizo materiais com conteúdos da língua importantes de serem aprendidos.

course_info.trial_description:
Portuguese - begginer to advanced. Come learn my mother language and get to know more about my culture!
English lessons - specifically based on your goals and knowledge level.

pro_course_detail.title: Portuguese - begginer to advanced. Come learn my mother language and get to know more about my culture!
pro_course_detail.description:
Hi! My name is Bruna. I'm 28 years old and I'm Brazilian. 
I'm majored in Portuguese and passionate about teaching.
I'm here to make you learn Portuguese in a relaxed way. I believe that learning from the conversation is the best way, so we will have classes based on the conversation, along with entertaining contents to help your understanding. 
As a bonus, I will make you immerse yourself in Brazilian culture and fall in love with it! Let's go!

pro_course_detail.title: English lessons specifically based on your goals and knowledge level.
pro_course_detail.description:
Hi! My name is Bruna. I'm 28 years old and I'm Brazilian. 
I'm majored in Portuguese and passionate about teaching.
I'm here to make you learn English in a relaxed way. I believe that learning from the conversation is the best way, so we will have classes based on the conversation, along with entertaining contents to help your understanding.

teacher_info.intro:
I am a 35 year old Australian born native speaker of English that has lived in Japan and is currently living in Malaysia. I am TEFL (Teaching English as a Foreign Language) and IELTS certified.

My hobbies include travelling, hiking, music, reading, outdoor activities, basketball and food. I enjoy spending time with my friends and doing hobby activities together.
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified IELTS and English as a Foreign Language Educator
teacher_info.about_me:
I am a 35 year old Australian born native speaker of English that has lived in Japan and is currently living in Malaysia. I am TEFL (Teaching English as a Foreign Language) and IELTS certified.

My hobbies include travelling, hiking, music, reading, outdoor activities, basketball and food. I enjoy spending time with my friends and doing hobby activities together.
teacher_info.about_teacher: As a learner of a language and as a teacher of English, I understand some of the struggles and successes of learning a new language. I think speaking is an important part of learning a new language so I’m excited to speak with you! Seeing my students improve and be able to communicate in a new language is exciting for me and for them. Sharing language knowledge and seeing a student progress forward is one of my main motivations as a teacher.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
In our first lesson I like to introduce myself and check your English level. I like to hear what your goals for learning English are and what you want to learn from me. I like to keep my lessons casual and fun.

For IELTS lessons I will use current materials that are used in the actual exams.

Conversation lessons will be speaking and listening based. I will help you with sentences and vocabulary. Lessons can be freestyle conversation or they can be more structured. Many of my students like me to send them articles for class discussion. As with all my lessons, I will use the chat function to type out corrections and important words.

***I don't teach children on italki

exp_info.description:
I worked a rotation of 3 junior high schools for the span of 1 year. On average, I would teach 15 English classes per week to students between the ages of 12 and 15. Some of my daily tasks included:

Creating lesson plans and activities
Grading and evaluating students
Creating, preparing and conducting tests
Providing additional assistance (such as coaching students for speech contests)

cert_info.description: 120 hours TEFL course undertaken through the TEFL Academy (https://www.theteflacademy.com/).

course_info.trial_description: In my trial lesson we will discuss what you want to improve and some difficulties you may have in the English language. For students interested in conversation classes, we will have time to do a small conversation class in this lesson. Please send me a message before our trial lesson to tell me if you are interested in IELTS lessons or conversation lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice (any English level is ok!)
pro_course_detail.description:
Want to improve your confidence in listening and speaking? In conversation practice we will talk about many topics. It is like talking with a friend. You are welcome to speak about any topic. We can choose a news article or video to discuss before our lesson or we can talk casually with no topic decided.

I will help you with your pronunciation, sentences, vocabulary and more. I will type important parts of our conversation to help you.

NOTE: 10 LESSON PACKAGE IS FOR CURRENT STUDENTS ONLY.

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS Speaking Exam Preparation
pro_course_detail.description:
This course will prepare students for the IELTS speaking exam. I will cover all 3 parts of the speaking exam using the official topics used in the actual IELTS examination. I will teach you useful idioms, sentence starters and provide model answers for the official topics. Additionally, we will focus on the 4 IELTS assessment criteria and work on getting you the IELTS band you deserve! My focus will be on improving: 

•	fluency and flow of speech
•	pronunciation and word stress 
•	appropriate use of vocabulary, phrasal verbs and paraphrasing
•	grammar structures and complex sentences

We will also do timed practice of all parts of the exam to best prepare you. I will provide you with feedback and corrections throughout our lessons. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me.

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS Writing Editing and Feedback Service (Offline)
pro_course_detail.description:
In these lessons I will edit your writing for task 1 and 2 of the IELTS writing exam. I will provide you with corrections, improvements and feedback. In my feedback, I will give you an explanation of how you can improve your score for the IELTS writing exam so that you can achieve the IELTS band you want.

These lessons are done OFFLINE. We do not meet for a 1 on 1 lesson. You will send me your writing and I will do the editing offline. I will complete the editing within 72 hours of you sending me your writing. I will give you instructions on how to send me your writing once you have booked a lesson.

You can book a 60 minute lesson or a 30 minute lesson.

A 60 minute lesson:
Two task 1 writing tasks
OR
One task 1 and one task 2 essay
OR
Two task 2 essays

A 30 minute lesson:
One task 1 writing task
OR
One task 2 essay

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everybody! I’m Keisuke. I have been to 25 countries so far. I really like talking to people who speak another language and have a different culture. I know how hard learning second language because  I'm learning  seocond language too!  Yes, I'm a language learning freak too!

¡Hola todos! Me llamo Keisuke. He viajado por 25 países hasta ahora. Me gusta mucho hablar con los extranjeros . Me puedo imaginar que te cueste aprender japonés ya que estoy aprendiendo segundo idioma también.

みなさん、こんにちわ！私は日本の横浜に住んでいます。旅行が大好きで、今まで２５の国を旅しました。私も外国語を勉強しているので、みなさんの日本語の勉強が大変な事を理解していますよ：）そう、わたしもあなたと同じ、語学学習者なんです！
teacher_info.short_signature: Learning a language is like running a marathon. It is a long way but also fun 😉
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello everybody! I’m Keisuke. I have been to 25 countries so far. I really like talking to people who speak another language and have a different culture. I know how hard learning second language because  I'm learning  seocond language too!  Yes, I'm a language learning freak too!

¡Hola todos! Me llamo Keisuke. He viajado por 25 países hasta ahora. Me gusta mucho hablar con los extranjeros . Me puedo imaginar que te cueste aprender japonés ya que estoy aprendiendo segundo idioma también.

みなさん、こんにちわ！私は日本の横浜に住んでいます。旅行が大好きで、今まで２５の国を旅しました。私も外国語を勉強しているので、みなさんの日本語の勉強が大変な事を理解していますよ：）そう、わたしもあなたと同じ、語学学習者なんです！
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am a curious person and have a lot of experience through traveling and various jobs :)  As a professional teacher, I will make sure you learn Japanese well while having a fun conversation with lots of materials!

Soy curioso y tengo mucha experiencia a través de viajes y diferentes trabajos:) Como profesor profesional, me aseguraré de que aprendas bien el japonés, con mucho material didáctico y conversaciones divertidas. Tengo el nivel B1 de DELE por lo cual ayudará su aprendizaje del estudio de Japonés.

私は好奇心が強くて、旅行やいろいろな仕事を通じてたくさんの経験があります：）
たくさんの教材をつかって楽しい会話をしながら、プロの講師としてあなたがしっかり日本語を勉強できるようにします！

語学学習はマラソンのように、長い道のりを自分のペースで走っていくことによく似ていると私は思います。あなたの語学学習と言う長い道のりに、長く寄り添っていけたら嬉しいです🌸
teacher_info.teaching_style:
For beginners:
The course starts from simple grammar studies using textbooks.

For intermediate and advanced students: Lessons will focus on your output and communication skills" in Japanese.

Para principiantes:
El curso se empieza a partir de estudios gramaticales sencillos utilizando libros de texto.

Para estudiantes de nivel intermedio y avanzado:
Las lecciones se centrarán en tu 'output' y competencia comunicativa" en japonés

初心者(しょしんしゃ)
教科書（きょうかしょ）を使った（つかった）簡単（かんたん）な文法学習（ぶんぽうがくしゅう）からスタートします。

中級・上級者
レッスンでは、あなたの「アウトプット」と日本語による「コミュニケーション能力」に焦点を当てます。

私は日本語教師ですが、同時に、語学が大好きな「一人の学習者」でもあります。語学学習はマラソンのように長い道のりをゆっくり、自分のペースで走っていくこととよく似ていると私は思います。あなたの、語学学習と言う長い道のりに長く寄り添っていけたら良いな、と思っています。

cert_info.certificate: The 420 hour Japanese Teacher Training Course
CERTIFICACIÓN DE CALIFICACIÓN DELE NIVEL B1

course_info.trial_description: まずは私（わたし）がどんな先生（せんせい）か知って（しって）もらいたいと思います（おもいます）ので、自己紹介（じこしょうかい）をしたりしながら、相性（あいしょう）が合うか（あうか）どうかお試し（おためし）になってはいかがでしょうか？

pro_course_detail.title: にほんごかいわれんしゅうクラス【Conversation practice class】【La clase de practica de conversacion 】
pro_course_detail.description:
Listening to podcasts, watching videos, reading books, and writing a diary can be done by yourself, but "conversation" is the most important thing in learning a language that cannot be done alone.

Why don't you output what you have studied by yourself while having a "conversation". Let's talk about your favorite theme! Stop studying, start communicating!

Escuchar podcasts, ver videos, leer libros y escribir un diario puede hacerlo una sola persona, pero la "conversación" es lo más importante en el aprendizaje de un idioma que no puede hacerlo en si mismo.

¿Por qué no sacas lo que has estudiado por ti mismo mientras platiquemos en mi clase de conversación?  ¡Hablemos de tu tema favorito! !Más vale acostumbrarse que estudias¡


ポッドキャストを聞く（きく）・ビデオを見る（みる）・本を読む（ほんを読む）・日記を書く（にっきをかく）事（こと）は1人（ひとり）でも出来るけど（できるけど）、「会話（かいわ）」は1人では出来ない（できない）語学（ごがく）を学ぶ（まなぶ）時に（ときに）一番重要な事（いちばんじゅうようなこと）です。

今まで（いままで）あなたが一人で勉強した事を（べんきょうしたことを）「会話（かいわ）」をしながら、アウトプットしてみませんか？

あなたの好きな（すきな）テーマでお話しましょう（おはなししましょう）！

pro_course_detail.title: 🌸For beginers clase☆ ☆Para la clase de principiantes🌸
pro_course_detail.description:
[ENG] You can study in the text book you want to study. If you don't have a textbook you can study with my original textbook. 😉

※ I would like to recommend lessons with the CEFR-based Marugoto and Irodori texts. I want beginners and intermediate learners to increase the number of things they "can do" in Japanese. In other words, I want you to know the pleasure of communicating using Japanese rather than grammatical correctness.

[ESP] Puede estudiar este curso en cualquier libro de texto que desee. Si no tienes un libro de texto puedes estudiar con mi libro de texto original.😉

※me gustaría recomendarles lecciones con los textos Marugoto e Irodori, basados en el MCER. Quiero que los principiantes y los alumnos de nivel intermedio aumenten el número de cosas que "pueden hacer" con japonés. En otras palabras, quiero que conozcas el placer de comunicarte utilizando el japonés más que la corrección gramatical.

pro_course_detail.title: 🌸 Costomized lesson for you☆Una lección personalizada para ti 🌸
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is designed for students of all levels.
This lesson is designed to focus on what you specifically want to study.

Let me know what you would like.

【ESP】Atiende a estudiantes de todos los niveles.
Esta lección está diseñada para centrarse en lo que usted quiere estudiar específicamente.

Hágame saber lo que le gustaría.

pro_course_detail.title: 🖋️作文添削コース ☆Writing Correction Course☆Curso de corrección de la escritura 🖋️
pro_course_detail.description:
「書く」という事も大事な「アウトプット」のトレーニングです。

ライターの経験を持つ私があなたの書いた文章を添削します。レッスンの前にあなたの作文を送ってくださいね。

Writing is also important "output" training.

I, who have experience as a writer, will correct your writing. Please send me your composition before the lesson.


La escritura es otra forma importante de entrenamiento de Output.

Como escritor experimentado, corregiré sus escritos. Por favor, envíeme su composición antes de la lección.

teacher_info.intro:
In English:
Hi, I'm Yenifer. I'm 20 years old and I'm Peruvian. I'm passionate about travel, culture, and languages, my native language is Spanish and I'm learning English. I love cooking, especially desserts. In my free time, I like to listen to music, read and paint. I also like to ride my bike at night and I love animals!

En español:

Me encanta cocinar, en especial postres. Me gusta en mi tiempo libre escuchar música, leer y pintar. También me gusta manejar bicicleta por las noches y amo a los animales!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
In English:
As a teacher, I am a very patient, dynamic, and friendly person. I like to listen and answer any questions or concerns the student may have during and after each class.  Remember I am here to help and support you in your process of learning Spanish.

En español:
Como profesora soy una persona muy paciente, dinámica y amigable. Me gusta escuchar y responder cualquier duda o inquietud que tenga el estudiante durante y después de cada clase.  Recuerda estoy aquí para ayudarte y apoyarte en tu proceso de aprender español.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
En español:
Mis clases están dirigidas a estudiantes con un nivel principiante, intermedio y avanzado. Cada clase es completamente personalizada de acuerdo a tus objetivos e intereses. Cuento con un amplio material didáctico y audiovisual que te ayudaran a mejorar cada aspecto del aprendizaje en español en el menor tiempo posible. 
Por ello, si quieres aprender español de una manera sencilla y divertida ¡Agenda una clase conmigo y juntos comencemos a explorar este hermoso idioma!

course_info.trial_description: 📌 En esta primera lección nos conoceremos a través de una conversación amena y casual en la que plantearemos tus objetivos de aprendizaje a corto, mediano y largo plazo. Así como también la metodología que emplearemos de acuerdo a tus necesidades.  ¡Nos vemos pronto futuro alumno! Recuerda todas las clases son 100% en español con la finalidad de que estés inmerso en el idioma .

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice / Práctica de conversación
pro_course_detail.description:
📌In this lesson we will chat about any topic you like. I will help you improve your pronunciation and fluency. I will correct your mistakes and expand your vocabulary. And we will organize the lessons so that every time we meet you will learn something new to be able to express yourself naturally in Spanish.

📌En esta lección charlaremos de cualquier tema que sea de tu agrado. Te ayudaré a mejorar tu pronunciación y fluidez. Corregiré tus errores y ampliaremos tu vocabulario. Y además organizaremos las clases de modo que cada vez que nos veamos aprendas algo nuevo para poder expresarte naturalmente en Español.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn Spanish / Aprende Español B1-B2
pro_course_detail.description:
📌 En cada clase de español incluiremos vocabulario, gramática, lectura, escritura, escucha activa y pronunciación. Emplearemos todo aquello que te permita aprender un nuevo tema o recordar algún tema ya visto previamente. Además te brindare material extra con el cual puedas practicar antes, durante y después de cada lección. Recuerda las clases son 100% en español, con la finalidad de que durante la lección estés inmerso en el idioma completamente sin embargo en aquellos temas .

📌In each Spanish class we will include vocabulary, grammar, reading, writing, active listening and pronunciation. We will use everything that allows you to learn a new topic or remember a topic you have already seen. I will also provide you with extra material with which you can practice before, during and after each lesson. Remember that the classes are 100% in Spanish, so that during the lesson you will be completely immersed in the language.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn Spanish / Aprende Español A1-A2
pro_course_detail.description:
📌 En cada clase de español incluiremos vocabulario, gramática, lectura, escritura, escucha activa y pronunciación. Emplearemos todo aquello que te permita aprender un nuevo tema o recordar algún tema ya visto previamente. Además te brindare material extra con el cual puedas practicar antes, durante y después de cada lección. Recuerda las clases son 100% en español, con la finalidad de que durante la lección estés inmerso en el idioma completamente sin embargo en aquellos temas que presentes alguna dificultad utilizaremos tu idioma nativo.

📌 In each Spanish class we will include vocabulary, grammar, reading, writing, active listening and pronunciation. We will use everything that allows you to learn a new topic or remember a topic you have already seen. I will also provide you with extra material with which you can practice before, during and after each lesson. Remember that the classes are 100% in Spanish, so that during the lesson you are completely immersed in the language, however in those topics that present some difficulty we will use your native language.

teacher_info.intro:
はじめまして、リュウイチです。僕はペルー生まれですが、小さい頃に日本に行き、中学3年まで教育を受け、その後はペルーに戻ってきました。
そして自分の国の学校に行き、そのあとは大学を卒業し、翻訳家として3年間、そして今はスペイン語を教えて3年程になります。南米の文化についてなら何でも聞いてください。 さらに、スペインのスペイン語にも詳しいです。
📌教材の都合上子供にはレッスンを行っておりません。

Mucho gusto, soy Ryuichi. He nacido en Perú, pero de muy pequeño me fui a Japón y recibí los estudios como un japonés hasta los 15 años y luego regresé a mi país Perú.
Fui al colegio aquí, me gradué en la universidad, trabajé 3 años como traductor y ahora tengo aproximadamente 3 años enseñando el español. Si quieres saber sobre la cultura de Latinoamérica no dudes en preguntarme lo que sea.
teacher_info.about_me:
はじめまして、リュウイチです。僕はペルー生まれですが、小さい頃に日本に行き、中学3年まで教育を受け、その後はペルーに戻ってきました。
そして自分の国の学校に行き、そのあとは大学を卒業し、翻訳家として3年間、そして今はスペイン語を教えて3年程になります。南米の文化についてなら何でも聞いてください。 さらに、スペインのスペイン語にも詳しいです。

Mucho gusto, soy Ryuichi. He nacido en Perú, pero de muy pequeño me fui a Japón y recibí los estudios como un japonés hasta los 15 años y luego regresé a mi país Perú.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
自分も英語を学んだり、若いころ、まだ完璧ではないスペイン語で学校に行ったので、言語を学ぶ難しさを理解しております。
現在スペイン語を教えて3年程になります、各生徒のペースで教えることができます。

Sé lo difícil que es aprender un idioma, ya que he estudiado el inglés y he ido de joven al colegio en Perú sin poder hablar aún perfectamente el español.
Actualmente tengo 3 años de experiencia enseñando el español, puedo enseñar a la velocidad que desee el alumno.

I love to visit temples and shrines.  I also love running.  I have run more than ten marathons.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am currently preparing for the Japanese-Language Teaching Competency Test.  I have been giving private Japanese lessons to foreigners for over a year.  I have also been giving lessons online since the start of the pandemic.  My teaching approach is to carry on a natural conversation while providing a fun learning experience.

日本語教育について独学で勉強しており、「日本語教育能力検定」にも挑戦中です。
外国人相手の日本語のプライベートレッスンは一年半程の経験があり、コロナで緊急事態宣言発令中時にはオンラインでレッスンも何度かしております。
ティーチングスキルについてはまだまだ私自身も勉強中ではありますが、自然な会話を大切にしながら楽しくレッスンをしたいと考えています。
teacher_info.teaching_style:
基本的に日本語でレッスンしますが、簡単な英語は話せますのでサポートがあった方が良いと考えられる場面では英語でサポートします。* Conversation in Japanese
This lesson is in Japanese, but since I can speak a little English, I can help you in English as needed.  
We can speak exclusively in Japanese if you prefer.
You will learn Japanese by talking about topics that interest you.
* Japanese for beginners
I will teach you easy sentences in Japanese using my original PowerPoint slides.
Let's enjoy learning Japanese by speaking it!

レッスン内は日本語のみでと言う要望があれば、希望に沿ってレッスンします。
スタイルとしては日常会話を通して日本語を学ぶスタイルで、生徒さんの興味があるトピック等について話ながら日本語習得に繋げていきたいです。
楽しく日本語で会話しつつ、便利な日本語文型も取り入れていきたいとも考えいます。
