pro_course_detail.title: Beginners/Intermediate/Advanced Mandarin【Provide Textbook & materials】
pro_course_detail.description:
☑️Elementary level Chinese 
📌Master about 1800 words and basic Chinese grammar
📌 Have basic skills in listening, speaking, reading and writing and preliminary language communication skills
📌 be able to use Chinese to complete communicative tasks in life, study, work, etc.
📌 talk and communicate about topics in specific areas and read Chinese newspapers and magazines
📌 Enjoy Chinese film and television programs, give a more complete speech in Chinese, and pass HSK level 4
☑️ Intermediate Chinese 
📌Master about 2500 words and basic Chinese grammar
📌Conduct complex conversation training and segmented speaking training
📌 Have the ability to recognize words and sentences and the ability to comprehend parts of speech
📌 Basic Chinese communicative and listening skills
📌Communicate and communicate with others on specific topics and pass HSK level 4
☑️Advanced Chinese
📌Master 3500-4000 common words
📌 Have a high level of language reading ability, especially comprehension based on passages and parts of speech
📌 be able to write about 400-600 words in about 30 minutes
📌 be able to understand general language material related to social life
📌 appreciate Chinese culture and communicate about these cultural topics
📌Pass HSK Level 5, HSKK Advanced

pro_course_detail.title: AP &HSK Tutoring【Provide Textbook & materials】
pro_course_detail.description:
📙 HSK 1 (A1): 🔑150 words🔑 Pinyin, radicals, basic grammar, self-introduction, basic common expressions
📗 HSK 2 (A2): 🔑300 words🔑 Basic daily conversation, pronunciation, sentence structure, Chinese culture (table manners, tea culture, Chinese New Year)
📕 HSK 3 (B1): 🔑600 words🔑 Social interaction, daily communication practice, Chinese culture (traditional sports, weddings, gift-giving taboos)
💠 At this level, you will be able to deal with most of the situations you will encounter when traveling in China.
📘 HSK 4 (B2): 🔑 1200 words 🔑 slang comprehension, Chinese culture in general, discussion of intermediate and advanced topics (friendship, love, shopping, happiness, life, education, etc.)
💠 At this level, you will be able to communicate comfortably with native speakers.
📒 HSK 5 (C1): 🔑 2500 words 🔑 In-depth knowledge of Chinese history, architecture, economy, etc.
💠 At this level, you will be able to read Chinese newspapers and magazines, watch Chinese movies, and give presentations in Chinese.
📓 HSK 6 (C2): 🔑 5000+ vocabulary words 🔑 Discussions of advanced topics in technology, business, society, travel, nature, technology, classical masterpieces, history, etc.
💠 At this level, you will be able to express and write your ideas with ease and comfort.

pro_course_detail.title: Business Chinese【Provide Textbook & materials】
pro_course_detail.description:
☑️ Professional Chinese - Business Chinese
📌 Cover the necessary Chinese applications in the workplace, including daily communication, writing and faxing, e-commerce, telephone Chinese, conference Chinese, recruitment Chinese, negotiation language, academic lectures, etc.
📌 Correct pronunciation to achieve authentic expressions

teacher_info.intro:
大家好! My name is Mary. 
I can teach you Traditional or Simplified Chinese and also tell you the vocabulary differences between  Northern / southern china and Taiwan.
I was born and raised in Taipei and I have lived in Shanghai and Tokyo.
Pinyin and Bopomofo which use in  China or Taiwan.
I love to eat and travel. I have also been to 15 countries.
Welcome to try my lesson. thanks!

teacher_info.short_signature: Certified TCSOL/TESOL teacher with over 6 years of teaching experience.
teacher_info.introduction: Hi everyone, My name is Mari. I'm Taiwanese and my hometown is in Taipei. I am traveling now so I live in Iceland. I am very exciting and happy to meet you. I have 2 years experience to teach Mandarin and Japanese. If you are interested in learning these two languages. I’m here to answer all of your question and help you to achieve the goal by practicing Mandarin and Japanese. I will be helping you to develop confidence for you speak. And I also can provide travel information about Taipei and recommend some beautiful landscape and food to you. Just feel free and relaxing to talk with me. I'm looking forward to meeting you. See you soon. --------------------------------------------------------------- 大家好,我的名字叫瑪莉！我來自台灣台北。 還請多多指教！我有兩年的教學經驗，如果你喜歡台灣，想知道台灣更多有趣的事，或台灣人的想法等等， 歡迎和我一起學習中文或英文。 期待與你（你）的相見！ 目前正在冰島旅遊，所以提供可戶外教學課程，有興趣的人可以與我聯繫 我提供的課程內容為： (1) 漢語日常會話 (2) 漢語商用用語 (3) 台灣旅行會話速成 (4) 台灣話教學 (5) 漢語聊天室 (6) 台北旅遊諮詢 (詢問各式台北旅遊問題) (7) 英語會話交流 (8) 看新聞學漢語 (適合中高級程度) (9) 漢語基礎教學 (適合初學者) --------------------------------------------------------------- こんにちは！マリと申します。 私は台湾の台北人です。 中国語教師の経験が2年です。 大学の専攻はインターナショナル ビジネスです。日本語を習ったきっかけは第二外国語の勉強です。卒業してから台北にいる日係企業でマーケティング関わる仕事を務めていた。 趣味は海外旅行、人間観察、世界ニュス、国際金融、政治などです。 皆様の素晴らしい先生になるを目指します。 一緒に楽しく中国語と英語を練習しましょう^^お待ちしております!! レッスンのリスト: (1) 日常会話 (2) ビジネス用語 (3) 台湾旅行会話練習 (4) 台湾語練習 (5) フリートーク (6) 台北旅行案内 (8) ニュスを見ながら中国語を勉強する(中高級向け) (9) 中国語をはじめましょう(初心者向け) (10) テキストの授業 (指定教材) 特典:ヨーロッパで海外レッスン、景色見ながらを授業します。

"Easy Japanese" is a program of Japanese language lessons produced by Japan's public broadcaster, NHK WORLD RADIO JAPAN. You can learn basic grammar and useful expressions through lessons designed in audio-drama style. You can download audio and texts for the lessons free of charge.

Introduction of the story
The heroine of the story is Anna, a 20-year-old Thai student who loves Japanese manga. She has come to Japan to learn the Japanese language for one year at a university in Tokyo. She will learn practical Japanese through various experiences, such as classes at the university, daily life at a dormitory, shopping, and traveling.
Japanese Lesson only for N5~N4 level

pro_course_detail.title: 【英語】初級コース (11歳以上～)  初级英文  (Textbook lesson)  适合想学习基础的学生
pro_course_detail.description:
★这个课是适合初级的学生，练习读、学单字，适合住在"非英语系国家"的学生，教材有日文、中文版 (这堂课主要针对成人)
★课程会提供教材
★このコースは、英会話に慣れていないが、挨拶や自己紹介として英語を使いたい方に適しています。
★テキストに沿ってセンテンスや単語を学習し、自然に使えるように練習していきます。
★毎回授業の前テキストを提供する 
★8歳以上の学生さんもレッスン可能です。
 --------
 1-1：自己紹介（自我介绍）
 1-2：講師への質問と要望（课堂常用语）
 2-1：ご挨拶 （打招呼）
 2-2：お問い合わせは何ですか（这是什么？）
 2-3：それが誰であるか尋ねる （这是谁的？）
 2-4：どこに尋ねるか （～在哪里？）
 2-5：レッスン1〜4の復習  （第一课～第四课的复习）
 2-6：出生地について話す  （出生地）
 2-7：キャラクターを説明する 
 2-8：時間を聞いて、基本的なコマンドフォームを理解する （时间）
 2-9：価格を尋ねる （多少钱？）
 2-10：あなたがしていることについて話します 
 2-11：レッスン6-10の復習
-------旅游用英文
第一课：你在做什么？
第二课：你平时吃什么？
第三课：上课提问用语
第四课：机场check-in
第五课：复习1~4课
第六课：在飞机上
第七课：下飞机后的入境检查
第八课：在机场换钱
第九课：前往市区
第十课：复习6~9
第十一课：酒店check in
第十二课：酒店内网路问题
第十三课：酒店check out

teacher_info.intro:
Welcome to my profile~
I am patient, organized, fun and enthusiastic. 
My interests include learning/teaching languages, fashion designing, to meet new people, meditating and travel. I love turtles, they teach me to follow my instinct, to travel at my own pace and to not give up hope.

My present students come from all backgrounds, countries, age ranges and levels of competency , whether beginners/intermediates/advanced looking to learn/improve their communication skills or school pupils trying to get to the top of their class, I have helped hundreds of students make the breakthrough they have been searching for. 
Just read my reviews:)
teacher_info.introduction: WHO AM I? Positive and energetic personality who loves to put a lot of fun and joy into his classes combined with personal approach to each student in order to progress them smoothly. I'm holding a TESOL certificate and I know how to match your needs with required study materials. WHAT CAN YOU EXPECT? • A fun and dynamic lesson! •I will base our lessons around YOUR needs and interests. •I want you to get the maximum benefit from the short time we have together, so you need to be INTERESTED, ENGAGED and always IMPROVING. • Increased confidence in speaking and listening skills in any situation.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
I'm a passionate and creative teacher, I want my students to enjoy learning ! 
My number one goal is to identify what is keeping you from speaking with confident. Whether you are a new learner or have some experience , we will work together to improve your skills.

We can use different resources to learn such as audio recordings, textbook, songs, pictures etc.

We can talk about different ´´Faux amis´´ which are often confusing to non-native speakers.
I will assist you at a pace that is neither overwhelming nor boring.
teacher_info.cancel_policy:
I do not accept any reschedule after 15 minutes delay of beginning of class, it's an automatic cancellation,  i'll ask you to confirm the lesson has been completed. 
The student should Cancel or reschedule the lesson 24 hours prior. Please don't ask me to cancel/reschedule within 24 hours the lesson will be charged anyway.
I always give you homework to do before class, i beg you to do it , if not the class will be made but i'll have the last 10 minutes as a gift.
I will decline any request of package termination at the single lesson price. I don't extend package request either since you have 6 months to take 5 lessons.

course_info.trial_description:
Hola a todos 
Bienvenidos a una forma más fácil y sencilla de aprender el español En esta CLASE DE PRUEBA podrás interactuar conmigo, para conocer mas a fondo el español, identificaremos tus necesidades específicas y resolveremos dudas en inquietudes de tal forma que podamos entre juntos crear un plan de trabajo beneficioso y efectivo.
Identificaremos:
•	Fluidez 
•	Pronunciación
•	Conversación 
Por medio de actividades online (videos, actividades variadas, conversación etc.) que te permitan cumplir tus objetivos y de ser necesario haremos los cambios correspondientes para que puedas hablar un español que te permita comunicarte de manera adecuada cuando y donde lo necesites.
En esta primera clase nos conoceremos con conversaciones básicas e interactuaremos en escenarios básicos de entrevista inicial (nombre, hobbies, trabajo, estudio, familia, amigos, comidas) entre otras.

pro_course_detail.title: CONVERSACION INICIAL
pro_course_detail.description:
En esta clase de CONVERSACION INICAL practicaremos los tópicos iniciales de una conversación por primera vez: (formato conversacional) presentación 
•	Nombres 
•	Nacionalidades
•	Estudio
•	Trabajo
•	Familia
•	Actividades libres 
Los primeros 15 minutos
Crearemos tips que permitan entender el idioma y por tanto mejorar la pronunciación. 
Y por último cerraremos identificando tus necesidades para poder crear un plan de trabajo acorde a tus necesidades.
¡ Te invito a aprender fácil y rápido! anímate

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring - Conversational English for Adults & Teens
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson, we will have a conversation in English about a variety of subjects that interest you, and I will correct your mistakes as we go and type them out for you. The conversation practice lessons will give you a chance to improve your speaking confidence and accuracy, listening comprehension, pronunciation, grammar, vocabulary, and more. I will help you if there's a word you don't know! 

✨ No prepared materials or homework assignments. 

✨ Attention to all beginner students! This lesson is ideal for intermediate to advanced students. My General English Course would be much more helpful than this Informal Tutoring lesson for beginning your language journey. Message me with any questions!

⚠️CANCELLATION POLICY: You must cancel or reschedule your lesson at least 24 hours in advance. Cancellations and no-shows within less than 24 hours of the lesson time will NOT receive a refund. Thank you for understanding. 


---

Dans cette leçon, nous allons avoir une conversation en anglais sur des sujets qui vous intéressent, et je corrigerai vos fautes. Nous pouvons pratiquer ce que vous voulez, y compris la compréhension, la prononciation, la grammaire, et le vocabulaire. Je vous aiderai s'il y a un mot que vous connaissez pas!

✨ Pas de matériaux de classe ni de devoirs. 

✨ Un message pour les débutants complets: cette leçon est parfaite pour les élèves intermédiaires ou avancés. Mon cours de General English est beaucoup plus structuré et adapté pour commencer de votre apprentissage de l’anglais que cette leçon de Informal Tutoring. N’hésitez pas à me contacter si vous avez des questions.

⚠️ POLITIQUE D’ANNULATION: Vous devez annuler ou reprogrammer votre leçon au moins 24 heures à l’avance de l’heure de votre leçon. Aucun remboursement ne sera effectué pour les annulations et non-présentations moins de 24 heures avant la leçon. Merci pour votre compréhension.

pro_course_detail.title: English for Kids ages 4-14
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you want your child to improve their English speaking, listening, reading, writing, or pronunciation? In this lesson, we will work on all of those skills through a variety of structured and interactive games, activities, songs, and more! I follow the Learnaling Curriculum for ages 4-12, which is roughly aligned with CEFR guidelines, Cambridge YLE exams and TOEFL Primary exam. All activities will be age-appropriate and tailored to the needs of your individual child. Message me for more information about my curriculum or any other specific questions you have. Book a trial lesson today and we will discuss the child's level and needs. 

✨ Zoom is highly recommended as the video platform for the most interactive use of all activities and games in this lesson.

⚠️ CANCELLATION POLICY: You must cancel or reschedule your lesson at least 24 hours in advance. Cancellations and no-shows within less than 24 hours of the lesson time will NOT receive a refund. Thank you for understanding.

---

Est-ce que vous voulez que votre enfant améliore son anglais à l'oral ou à l'écrit ? Dans cette leçon, nous allons travailler tous ces aspects de la langue en utilisant une variété des jeux, activités, et chansons d'une façon structurée et interactive. Je suis le programme ‘Learnaling’ pour les enfants de 4 à 12 ans, qui est aligné avec les lignes directrices du CEFR et les examens Cambridge YLE et TOEFL Primary. Toutes les activités seront adaptées à l’âge et aux besoins de votre enfant. Envoyez-moi un message pour plus d’infos sur mon programme ou mes leçons. Réservez une leçon d’essai et nous allons discuter du niveau et des besoins de votre enfant. 

✨ Le platform Zoom est conseillé pour l’utilisation la plus interactive de toutes les activités et jeux dans cette leçon.

⚠️ POLITIQUE D’ANNULATION: Vous devez annuler ou reprogrammer votre leçon au moins 24 heures à l’avance de l’heure de votre leçon. Merci pour votre compréhension.

pro_course_detail.title: NEW - General English for Adults & Teens of All Levels - Formal Structured Course
pro_course_detail.description:
Improve your English in a formal capacity following a structured curriculum. This course is suitable for students from level beginner all the way to advanced. We will work on all modals of the language (speaking, listening, reading, writing, and pronunciation) through a mix of activities from discussing an article or video to practicing a new grammar point. Every lesson will be tailored to your individual goals and needs. The main benefit of iTalki is the opportunity to speak with a native speaker! Therefore, all lessons will have a focus on speaking and conversation. Reading and writing assignments will be assigned as homework and reviewed at the next lesson.  
Book a trial lesson today, and we will discuss your level and goals and create a plan for your lessons! You can message me for more information about my curriculum or any other specific questions you have.

✨ Evidence-based teaching approach using Communicative Language Teaching methods. 

✨ Attention to all beginner students! This General English course will be much more helpful than an Informal Tutoring lesson for beginner students. I highly recommend this structured course for beginning your language journey. Message me with any questions!

✨ Some Business English lessons are also available. Let me know if you're interested!

⚠️ CANCELLATION POLICY: You must cancel or reschedule your lesson at least 24 hours in advance. Cancellations and no-shows within less than 24 hours of the lesson time will NOT receive a refund. Thank you for understanding.

pro_course_detail.title: Text Correction (asynchronous, not a live lesson)
pro_course_detail.description:
60 min lesson for up to 1000 words (about 2 pages)
Message me for a quote for higher word counts. 

Send me the text you wish to have corrected, and I will send you the corrected text with highlighted corrections, comments, and suggestions to improve your English grammar, vocabulary choice, and sentence structure. Ideal for assignments, business emails, resumes, application letters, and more. I will help your text look like it was written by a native speaker! 

✨ Please send me the document prior to booking a lesson to ensure I have adequate feedback for the text.

✨ I am not a professional editor! I am a native English speaker from America with a TEFL/TESOL certification in English. I will proofread and edit your text to make it sound natural like a native speaker. 

✨ Please note: this is not a live lesson. I will correct your text and return it to you at the time of the lesson or before. Alternatively, if you would like your text corrected in real time, you can book an 'informal tutoring' lesson, and we will go over the text together on the video call.

Los 30 minutos de clase de prueba serán una gran oportunidad para que nos conozcamos y puedas experimentar la forma dinámica, professional y comunicativa que te ayudará a mejorar tu español. Reserva un horario de clase de prueba y comienza hoy tu proceso de aprendizaje.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish for the Real Estate Market/ Español para el Mercado Inmobiliario
pro_course_detail.description:
Spanish lessons with a communicative approach designed for Real Estate professionals.
Spanish is spoken from day one. 
I will prepare you to build vocabulary and perform all everyday tasks needed for a Real Estate Agent.
My classes are very personalized, so we will focus on your needs an interests.
We will work on real life work situations.

Clases de español con un enfoque comunicativo diseñadas para profesionales inmobiliarios.
Hablaremos español desde el primer día.
Te prepararé para que construyas el vocabulario y puedas realizar todas las actividades cotidianas necesarias para un Agente Inmobiliario.
Mis clases son muy personalizadas y haremos foco en tus necesidades e intereses.
Trabajaremos sobre situaciones laborales de la vida real.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish conversation / Conversación en español
pro_course_detail.description:
Spanish lessons designed to improve your communications skills.
Spanish is spoken from day one. 
I will prepare you to build vocabulary, grammar and perform all everyday communicative situations.
My classes are very personalized, so we will focus on your needs an interests.
We will work on real life situations.

Clases de español diseñadas para mejorar tus habilidades comunicativas.
Hablaremos español desde el primer día.
Te prepararé para que adquieras tanto el vocabulario como la gramática y puedas desenvolverte con eficacia en situaciones comunicativas.
Mis clases son muy personalizadas y haremos foco en tus necesidades e intereses.
Trabajaremos sobre situaciones de la vida real.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish for kids / Español para niños
pro_course_detail.description:
Learning a language should be fun! I invite you to learn Spanish with me, enjoying stories, songs, games and much more!!
We are going to play together with words, create stories and challenge ourselves to advance in learning Spanish. I will share interactive games with my students (memory games, drag and match, concept race and more) so that, they can have fun, learn and practice vocabulary and language structures.
Aprender una lengua debe ser divertido! Te invito a aprender español conmigo, a disfrutar de historias, canciones, juegos y mucho más!!
Juntos vamos a jugar con las palabras, crear historias y desafiarnos a nosotros mismos para avanzar en nuestro dominio del español.
I worked for many years in schools, I have a bachelor's degree in education and a master's degree in teaching Spanish as a foreign language.Teaching my native language is my profession and my passion!! Book a trial class with me !!!

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish for business/ Español para negocios
pro_course_detail.description:
Spanish classes with a communicative approach designed for business.
* We will speak Spanish from day one.
* I will prepare you to build vocabulary and be able to carry out all the daily activities necessary for your work activity.
* My classes are very personalized and we will focus on your needs and interests.
* We will work on real life work situations.

Clases de español con un enfoque comunicativo diseñadas para negocios.
* Hablaremos español desde el primer día.
* Te prepararé para que construyas el vocabulario y puedas realizar todas las actividades cotidianas necesarias tu actividad laboral.
* Mis clases son muy personalizadas y haremos foco en tus necesidades e intereses.
* Trabajaremos sobre situaciones laborales de la vida real.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish for Seniors
pro_course_detail.description:
Why this course?
Adulthood is an exceptional time to learn a new language. Learning a language in adulthood helps us to keep the brain active, stimulated and healthy. Learning a language improves brain plasticity, delaying cognitive aging.
That is why I invite you to book a class in this course, to enjoy a pleasant learning environment, in which we will stimulate cultural knowledge and carry out varied activities, according to your personal tastes.
If you are too young for this course and have come to read my proposal, perhaps you have found an excellent gift to make to your dear adults.

La adultez es una etapa excepcional para aprender un nuevo idioma. Aprender un idioma en la edad adulta nos ayuda a mantener el cerebro activo, estimulado y sano.  Aprender un idioma mejora la plasticidad cerebral, retrasando el envejecimiento cognitivo.
Por eso te invito a que reserves una clase en este curso, para disfrutar de un ambiente de aprendizaje placentero, en el que estimularemos el conocimiento cultural y realizaremos actividades variadas, de acuerdo a tus gustos personales.  
Si eres demasiado joven para este curso y has llegado a leer mi propuesta, tal vez has encontrado un excelente regalo para hacer personas adultas queridas.

teacher_info.intro:
I got my bachelor's degree in teaching Chinese as a foreign language in 2007. Then I received four-year training in Chinese Teaching with Practice while I was working in the Bridge School in Beijing.
My students come from all walks of life, I am good at making practice with the words that they use frequently in their offices or life.
In my classes, the students get the meanings of the new words from the context first. Second, they can read the new words accurately. Third, I create a questionary situation through "asking and answering the questions by students" to improve students' communication skills with the new words.
I teach a new language point with old words before adding new words.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I can speak English fluently, so English will be our medium language during the course if necessary. Please leave me a message about what you wish to learn and for how long you have been learning before the class begins.

LESSON RESCHEDULING/CANCELLATION POLICY: 24-hour notice is needed for lessons to be canceled or rescheduled, and please do not reschedule more than once. 
The class will be considered as completed, if you don´t join the class 15 minutes after the class begins.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
1. Beginners: we will start from Pinyin and simple grammar that will be useful in every day situations. Also I will focus on your pronunciation, especially tones as Chinese is a tonal language. 
2. Advanced learners: I would like to be strict and correct grammar mistakes. Furthermore, I will help you lead our conversation during the class, which will help you be more confident.
3. Short time users: I will offer you survival Chinese before you go on vacation, a business trip, meeting Chinese friends,or other needs.
4. If you are not sure about your level, I will help you find out and prepare a suitable study plan for you, so that you will have a clear idea of what you're going to learn.

本课程提供粤语对话练习，并帮助你扩展词汇，纠正发音问题，同时穿插粤语文化知识。

pro_course_detail.title: Chinese Mandarin Tailor-made Class
pro_course_detail.description:
In this class we will discuss what your needs and goals are for learning Chinese Mandarin, I will discern your current level and in this way I will be able to tailor-made a class that fits you personally. 
I feel that each student learns differently and it's my job to accommodate the class to best fit each student's needs, so in this way you will be able to learn faster and have more fun while you learn.

Here are a few things I can help you learn:
Basic Grammar.
Basic Conversational Skills.
Chinese for Kids.
Survival Chinese.
Business Chinese.
HSK Test Prep. 
Book Lessons.
Conversational Chinese.
Writing Lessons.
Informal conversations.

I look forward to helping you in your learning journey, Chinese is a very beautiful and interesting language, I hope we're able to learn more together.

teacher_info.intro:

I like talking about many different topics, such as books, films, food and music. I would also love to know more about your country and your culture.   

Meu nome é Joanna e eu sou uma falante nativa da língua portuguesa. Se você está em busca de alguém com quem praticar conversação em português, você encontrou a pessoa certa! Eu gosto de conversar sobre vários assuntos diferentes, como livros, filmes, comida e música. Eu também adoraria conhecer mais sobre o seu país e sua cultura.

Minhas aulas são bem informais e eu sempre tento propiciar um ambiente de aprendizagem tranquilo. Meu foco principal é desenvolver habilidades de conversação, então se você quer melhorar suas habilidades de conversação, escuta (listening) e fala (speaking), eu acredito que posso lhe ajudar.

teacher_info.intro:
Well hello there! My name is Amir, and I love languages; that's why I have an interest in teaching them. No matter what level of proficiency you represent - be it beginner, intermediate, advanced, or outright proficient. We can always learn something new and expand our knowledge.

As cliché as it may sound; aim for the moon - for even if you fail, you'll land amongst the stars. And remember, speaking to someone in their second language is speaking to their brain - but, speaking to them in their native language is speaking to their heart.
teacher_info.short_signature: Providing you corrections of your every mistake and giving new vocabulary since day one!
teacher_info.about_me:
Well hello there! My name is Amir, and I love languages; that's why I have an interest in teaching them. No matter what level of proficiency you represent - be it beginner, intermediate, advanced, or outright proficient. We can always learn something new and expand our knowledge.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Recently, I realized that I had an inclination to understand and connect with people of various backgrounds and cultures. And, with the advent of the internet - what better way to do so than to meet people through language learning platforms like italki!

As your teacher, my core responsibilities will be to help you improve your English conversational proficiency in terms of fluency, grammar and pronunciation.

My goal is to provide you with a comfortable and conducive learning environment, whilst displaying equanimity and tolerance to provide you with a satisfactory class. I am also highly intuitive and receptive, so you'll never feel like you're talking to a wall!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My classes are primarily catered to improving your English conversational skills - however, I may curate classes focused on something else - e.g. proofreading.

I will try my level best to drill my explanations into you to ascertain that you understand how and when to use certain words - as well as why you should use them; I'll provide you with synonyms and antonyms of the words we discuss. And let's not forget about idioms and phrases; we'll work on them too!

Fret not if you stumble or fumble about often (frequently make mistakes); never be afraid to ask me questions, as I will aid you with whatever requires assistance!

And keep in mind that I will correct your mistakes. All. Of. Them.

course_info.trial_description:
Hello there! 

In this brief class, the time we spend together will be purely for me to gauge the level of proficiency of your English. We shall engage in simple discussions and simply try to understand each other. I'm hopeful that we'll get along nicely!

And just so you know, there's nothing different about this class compared to 'Incremental Improvements to the English Language'; it functions exactly the same. So, feel free to choose either one—you're not missing out on anything!

See you in class!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
今まで色んな国をバックパックで回ったりシェアハウスに住んだりしてきました。
そこで日本語（にほんご）を教（おし）える機会（きかい）がよくあり
その楽（たの）しさや難（むずか）しさを知（し）りました。

今（いま）は日本語教師（にほんごきょうし）になるための勉強（べんきょう）をしています。
来年（らいねん）はカンボジアで建（た）てた学校（がっこう）で日本語（にほんご）を
教（おし）えられるようになることを目標（もくひょう）としています。

I have visited different many countries while backpacking and have lived in share houses.
I had many opportunities to teach Japanese.
And I learned the fun side of teaching Japanese as well as the difficult side of  it.
Currently, I’m studying for become a Japanese language teacher.
Next year ,my goal is to teach Japanese language in Cambodian school that I help to build .
teacher_info.teaching_style:
私（わたし）の授業（じゅぎょう）は会話（かいわ）を中心（ちゅうしん）としています。
カジュアルな会話（かいわ）でもビジネス敬語（けいご）でも関西弁（かんさいべん）でも
あなたの希望（きぼう）のスタイルでお話（はな）しします。

あなたが話（はな）したいどんなトピックでも良（よ）いですし
難（むずか）しければこちらでトピックを用意（ようい）することもできます。

もし,あなたが希望（きぼう）すれば
①文法（ぶんぽう）②単語（たんご）③発音（はつおん）④文字（もじ）の書（か）き方（かた）
なども教（おし）えることができます。

My lessons are  mostly composed of conversational Japanese.
 I am flexible I can teach you in the manner　that you would like to learn. 
Whether it is business Japanese or casual Japanese or even Kansai dialect.
You can talk any topics what you want.
However if you feel like coming to　a set of pre planed lessons.

Here are somethings that I can teach you
①Grammar
②Vocabulary
③Pronunciation
④Japanese writing styles

course_info.trial_description:
トライアルレッスン（conversation）
自己紹介（じこしょうかい）し、あなたのやりたい勉強(べんきょう）を確認（かくにん）します。
あなたのすきなことやわたしのことをたくさんお話（はなし）しましょう。

Trial lesson (conversation)
We begin with a self introduction, and then we’ll take a look at what kind of study you would like to do.
Let's talk about ourselves and the things we like.

pro_course_detail.title: フリートーク / Free talk
pro_course_detail.description:
初級者（しょきゅうしゃ）～上級者向（じょうきゅうしゃむ）けの
日常会話（にちじょうかいわ）を身（み）に着（つ）けたい人（ひと）におすすめ

あなたの好（す）きなテーマでフリートークでもよいですし、シチュエーションを設定（せってい）しての会話練習（かいわれんしゅう）やトピックについて意見（いけん）を伝える練習をします。
本（ほん）やニュース、マンガを読むこともできます。
事前（じぜん）にあなたの希望（きぼう）があれば教（おし）えてくださいね。

In this lesson, just enjoy chatting and learning Japanese!!
The level is beginner　to advanced level Japanese lessons.
Recommended for those who want to practice everyday conversation.
We can talk freely about a topic of your liking, or simulate a daily situation to practice. 
You can also read books, news, and manga with me.

Please let me know beforehand what your preference is.

pro_course_detail.title: 上級者向（じょうきゅうしゃむ）けビジネス敬語（けいご）/ Business Japanese
pro_course_detail.description:
仕事（しごと）で使（つか）うビジネス敬語（けいご）の練習（れんしゅう）です。

職場（しょくば）でのシーンや電話対応（でんわたいおう）、ビジネスメールなど
様々（さまざま）な想定して練習（れんしゅう）をおこないます。

上級者（じょうきゅうしゃ）向（む）けのクラスです。
はじめは事前（じぜん）に要望（ようぼう）をメッセージで伝（つた）えるか
トライアルレッスンで伝（つた）えてください。

This lesson is designed for using practical business Japanese in the real workplace.

In this lesson you can practice different business scenarios like telephone sales call, and writing business emails as well as talking with your superiors/customer in a company. 

This class is for advanced japanese learners (possibly people who are at JLPT N2 or N1 level)

Please feel free contact me regarding anything related with this lesson during the trial lessons or you can always contact me if you have any concerns about the lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: 初心者向(しょしんしゃむ）け文法（ぶんぽう）コース / Basic grammar
pro_course_detail.description:
日本語初心者向（にほんごしょしんしゃむ）けコースです。

テキストなどの教材（きょうざい）などを使（つか）って基本的（きほんてき）な
文法（ぶんぽう）を学（まな）びます。
あいさつやたんごの勉強（べんきょう）もできます。

最初（さいしょ）のレッスンであなたの希望（きぼう）やレベルを確認（かくにん）し
適した教材（きょうざい）をかんがえるので安心（あんしん）してください。

リラックスしてはじめてみてください♪

This is designed for beginner Japanese learners.
You are able to learn basic grammar by using various materials like textbooks(ex,Genki,MinnanoNihongo) as well as conversing with me.

You can also practice basic greetings and foundational vocabulary.

I will be designing the course as your needs fit,
this can be done while we do the first lesson.

Please be relaxed and just give it a try!

teacher_info.introduction:
Hi, I'm Elena

I've been a teacher since I graduated from University. After teaching in the Chinese school system, I found that I enjoy teaching online best, so I'm full-time online. My students are 5 to 65 years old, from all over the world, with many different first languages. I've taught more than 6,000 hours of Chinese lessons online. I get great feedback and have made many good friends along the way.  

Welcome To Your Personal Chinese Learning Journey.

Acquiring a new language is a journey. Everybody's journey is unique. Everyone brings different needs, skills, personalities and goals to their journey.  So the first thing I do with new students is to spend time listening to YOU, listening to YOUR language learning goals and objectives, YOUR likes and dislikes, learning about YOUR background and current standard.  Then, I work with you to build a personally tailored and unique learning journey plan to meet YOUR specific needs.

Find A Teacher With The Right Accent.

I am a northerner, from the Beijing area, and speak standard Mandarin with a proper accent. Be careful! It matters a lot what region your teacher comes from, each region has it's own strong characteristics. Finding a teacher with a standard accent is very important, because imitation is the first step in learning. If your Chinese teacher's accent is very standard, then you are successfully started down the right path to learning Chinese.

Use The Right Materials.

I have many other learning materials, so you have a wide array to choose from.If you want to take the HSK exam, I can help you prepare your studies for that test. I have a lot of students I helped pass the HSK at different levels.

Find A Teacher That Works For You. 
 
We can practice listening, speaking, reading and writing. I am very grateful to all the friends who have studied with me, and welcome the new students who will study with me.Please don't hesitate to come and try out my classes!

teacher_info.teaching_style:
🙋‍♀️🙋‍♀️The importance of regular classes

Regular classes can help you accumulate and consolidate knowledge, continuously improve, and help develop good study habits

📚📚The way to study after classes

1 Complete classwork, summarize and review what you learned in the class, and prepare for the next lesson.
2 If you are in China or have a good Chinese language environment, don't be shy, don't be afraid of making mistakes, and talk more.
3 Find a favorite Chinese video, podcast, or TV show, watch or listen to it repeatedly, improve listening, and expand vocabulary.
4 How to memorize words
Use apps or take notes in a notebook. Review and recite the vocabulary you have learned regularly.

teacher_info.short_signature: 楽しくレッスンしましょう
teacher_info.about_me:
私の名前は　’　るみこ　’　です。
大学で国文学を学びました。卒業後、いくつかの職業についています。
私は猫が好きで飼っています。

teacher_info.about_teacher:
日本語で日本語を教えます。
分からない時はイラストなどを使います。
最初はあなたのレベルをチェックします。
どんな方法で勉強したいか話し合い、レッスン方法を決めます。
teacher_info.teaching_style:
「楽しく学ぶ」これが私の基本的な考えです。
楽しくなければ続けられません。

基本的には会話中心です。
写真やイラストについて話す。
何か話題を見つけて話す。

教科書を使う場合は「いろどり」を使います。
しかし、他の教科書を使いたければ最初に言ってください。相談して決めましょう。

レッスンは24時間前ならキャンセルも時間変更も可能です。しかし、24時間以内の場合はキャンセル料が発生します。ご注意ください。

レッスンを録画・録音することはお断りしています。

course_info.trial_description:
日本語で会話をしましょう。何を話したいですか？話したいことを沢山話して日本語を楽しく勉強しましょう。
話すテーマがある時は教えてください。それについて話しましょう。話すテーマがない場合はこちらでテーマを決めて楽しく会話をしましょう。

pro_course_detail.title: 日本語で楽しく会話をしましょう
pro_course_detail.description:
楽しく日本語で会話をしましょう。何か話したいテーマがありますか？ある場合はレッスン申し込みの時にお知らせください。事前準備をします。
特に話したいテーマがない場合はレッスンの時に決めてもいいし、思いつくまま会話を楽しんでもいい。もしくは絵や写真を見てそこから話を進めます。どんどん思いつくことを話してください。
楽しく話しましょう。

pro_course_detail.title: 浮世絵を見て会話しましょう
pro_course_detail.description: UKIYOE（浮世絵）は知っていますか？主に江戸時代に描かれた絵です。とても独創的で面白い絵や、奇抜な絵、美しい絵など様々です。そんな浮世絵をみながら会話します。会話では発音の間違いや文法のミス、正しい言い方を直します。浮世絵は会話の手助けとしての活用です。浮世絵の解説はありません。楽しく自由な発想で浮世絵を見て、会話をし、日本語を学びましょう。

pro_course_detail.title: テキスト「いろどり」を使った文法レッスン
pro_course_detail.description:
オンラインテキスト「いろどり」を使った文法のレッスンです。
すべて日本語で教えます。日本語の入門から中級レベルまでです。
「いろどり」は生活に使う言葉を中心に、実際に出会うであろう場面を想定して作られています。「いろどり」を中心にしてレッスンを進めます。自由に質問もしてください。

pro_course_detail.title: 🗣 TEN hrs: Start From Chinese Pronunciation & Tones; 発音とトーン（初心者）; 發音,聲調課
pro_course_detail.description:
📢 This course is suitable for both
1. Total beginners 
2. Learners who want to improve their accents


⭐️⭐️Course Introduction⭐️⭐️
Recognizing Chinese Pinyin (I teach ’‘zhù yīn ㄅㄆㄇ’‘ as well, please let me know which one you want to learn!) and tones are an important foundation for learning Chinese. They might be challenging for beginners, however, constantly listening, speaking and practising can be the most efficient way to learn and help you to become familiar with them.

This course will introduce you to (1) the Chinese Pinyin / zhù yīn system, (2) vowel and initial pronunciation, and (3) tones. Also, through our Pinyin and pronunciation practice, your pronunciation and intonation will become more natural and smooth.


⭐️⭐️Course Content⭐️⭐️
Chinese Pinyin Introduction
Vowel pronunciation practice
Initial pronunciation practice
Tone practice
Pinyin listening, writing, speaking practice
Spelling practice
Numbers
Daily life vocabulary 
Daily conversation, greetings
Introducing Chinese characters

*********************
Class length: 43, 55 minutes.
Teaching materials provided.

🥇🥇🥇 For total beginners, I highly encourage you to attend classes 3-5 hours per week - to familiarise yourself with new learning and create a well-built learning environment!

pro_course_detail.title: 🙇🏻‍♀️ General Chinese: Beginner - Advanced, 中国語レッスン（初級～上級）, 通用華語
pro_course_detail.description:
📢 This course is suitable for students who learn traditional Chinese characters


⭐️⭐️Course Introduction⭐️⭐️
In this course, we will have structured lessons to develop and train your Chinese skills efficiently, including listening, speaking and reading.

Teaching materials are provided, you can also bring your own textbook to our class!  The assignment is optional; we can check and correct it in class.


⭐️⭐️Course Content⭐️⭐️
1) Review Chinese pronunciation and gain a preliminary understanding of simple life dialogues.
2) Understand topics and conduct a simple exchange of questions and answers. Read daily short texts.

4) Learn to express specific views on topics and read broader articles.
5) Talk about areas of interest, such as lifestyle, educational background, and career history. Read articles in these areas.
6) Talk about current events, cultural differences between countries, traditional festivals, etc.
7) Learn to engage in in-depth conversations with native speakers, narrate stories, describe events, hopes and ideals, detail experiences, describe feelings and reactions, etc.
8) Read professional articles and gather the information you need.


🔖 To improve your conversation skills and speaking fluency, pronunciation and grammatical mistakes will be corrected immediately during the class, I will help you to build your confidence in communicating with native speakers. Please feel free to ask when you have questions during the lesson. :)

Notice*********************
Class length: 28, 43, 55 minutes


🥇🥇🥇 I encourage students to attend classes for 2-3 hours a week - we can create an immersive learning environment and develop your Chinese ability through long-term and stable learning!

pro_course_detail.title: 📝 Daily Chinese: All Level, 中国語会話, 日常華語
pro_course_detail.description:
📢 This course is suitable for both 
(1)Traditional Chinese and (2)Simplified Chinese learners


⭐️Course Introduction⭐️
1) Free topic conversation practice - you speak, and I correct pronunciation, grammar and vocabulary mistakes. 
2) We will design a course plan specifically for you according to your learning needs! Let me know if there are any specific areas you would like to enhance.


🥇For Beginner and Intermediate learners
1) Learn basic Chinese vocabulary and common words used in typical everyday conversations.
2) Learn conversations for specific occasions, such as meeting, shopping, ordering food, and so on.


🥇For Advanced learners
1) Learn more authentic Chinese expressions, such as common sayings and catchphrases.
2) Reading articles and discussing different topics deeply in the class, let you make more advanced expressions and practical, effective everyday communication.
🔖 It would be great if you give me an idea of what kind of materials you want to work on before our class; because I could prepare relevant materials for you beforehand!

🔖 To improve your speaking fluency, pronunciation and grammatical mistakes will be corrected during the class, I will help you to build your confidence in communicating with native speakers.

*********************
Class length: 28, 43, 55 minutes

🥇🥇🥇 I encourage students to attend classes for 1-2 hours a week - we can create an immersive learning environment and develop your Chinese ability through long-term and stable learning!

此課程專為已習得中文發音及聲調的兒童設計。學習目標為使孩子熟悉基本中文會話，在引起孩子學習興趣的過程中，漸進式培養中文聽說讀寫、表達的能力。

teacher_info.intro: I attended school and went to college in New York City, where I majored in English Literature. LGBT-friendly.
teacher_info.introduction:
I'm a 27-year-old English teacher who is looking to take on new students. I've been teaching English in Moscow for over three years. I work with students from various corporations, such as Halliburton, ExxonMobil, and Deutsche Bank. I am CELTA-certified and have a Bachelor's degree in English Language and Literature. I was born in Moscow, but my parents relocated to the US when I was a small child. All my subsequent education and formative years took place in an English-speaking environment; English has become my dominant language. 

I try to make my lessons both fun and educational. I believe that motivating my students and providing them with the necessary tools to study English more effectively are essential parts my job.

I offer two kinds of lessons:

1) I send the student an exercise that looks something like this: http://postimg.org/image/vt1qw7a0f/
During the lesson, the student answers the questions, and I help him or her with grammar, word choice, and pronunciation.

2) I send the student a newspaper or magazine article to read, and then, during the lesson, we go over any new vocabulary and discuss the contents of the article. I do this mostly with my more advanced students, as one of the best ways to progress in your English studies at the upper-intermediate level is to use authentic material (i.e. material created for native speakers of English).
teacher_info.about_me: I attended school and went to college in New York City, where I majored in English Literature. LGBT-friendly.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I'm a CELTA-certified English teacher from New York City with 8 years' experience teaching general and specialist English. I specialize in IELTS speaking and writing prep. As a former IELTS Examiner, I know exactly what you need to do to reach your desired band score.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I offer OFFLINE IELTS essay correction service only. Book a lesson at any time on my schedule and email me two IELTS writing tasks. I'll send you my detailed comments and suggestions, your estimated band score, and tips on how to improve your score.

I will send you my detailed comments and corrections, your estimated band, and tips on how to improve your score within the next 24 hours. Let me know if you want to see a sample marked essay. [Please do not book 60- and 90-minute lessons!] My e-mail: daglig (AT) gmail (DOT) com

Soy estudiante de Medicina viviendo en Argentina. Me encanta conocer a nuevas personas y disfruto ayudar a la gente con el aprendizaje. Creo que soy muy determinada y  capaz de adaptarme a cualquier situación, el hecho de mudarme a otro pais donde no hablo el idioma es evidencia suficiente.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
My teaching style would be tailored to fit my students needs . Having been a student myself , I know  the different struggles a student may face when learning a new language. Patience is key, it is also extremely important for me to create a friendly , comfortable environment , where students know it is ok to make mistakes .
Mi técnica de enseñanza estará especializada en las necesidades de cada estudiante. Tengo en cuenta los desafíos que estos pueden enfrentar cuando se aprende un nuevo idioma ya que tuve que pasar por el mismo proceso. La paciencia es clave y mi prioridad es que sea un ambiente donde se sientan cómodos y donde sepan que se puede cometer errores en el aprendizaje.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I would use place special emphasis on 
*Vocabulary lists, so students can amplify their vocabulary
*Grammar, so that students can have proper tools to speak fluently 
*conversation practice to increase fluency
*listening comprehension, where students will get used to listening and understanding 
*Pronunciation improvement

Haria énfasis en *listados de vocabulario para que los estudiantes pueden ampliar el habla 
*reglas gramáticas para que puedan tener las herramientas para formar frases *conversaciones en el idioma para aumentar fluidez 
* comprensión auditiva para que los estudiantes puedan acostumbrarse al idioma en una forma natural
*mejorando la pronunciacion

course_info.trial_description:
In the first few minutes , I will evaluate the students language level 
(beginner, intermediate, advanced) and based on that information I will do a short grammar lesson , we will then have conversation practice based on the grammar level .

Students will practice speaking or reading a paragraph and pronunciation errors will be corrected.

En los primeros minutos, voy a evaluar el nivel de idioma del estudiante  (principiante, intermedio, avanzado) y según el nivel vamos a dedicar unos minutos a una lección gramática , después una conversación en el idioma para practicar lo aprendido 

Para terminar los estudiantes van a leer un párrafo y vamos a mejorar la pronunciación de las palabras.

teacher_info.intro:
みなさん、こんにちは。私はマリです！
My name is Mari.
I have 10 years of experience as a Japanese teacher, both online and face-to-face.
I have a great passion for travelling, learning new things and meeting new people. I love to teach and share my experience with students.
My interests are cooking, discovering new food, reading books, watching anime and movies. Also love nature, animals.

teacher_info.about_me:
みなさん、こんにちは。私はマリです！

I have 10 years of experience as a Japanese teacher, both online and face-to-face.
I have a great passion for travelling, learning new things and meeting new people. I love to teach and share my experience with students.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am a kind, responsible and  patient teacher. 
My 10 years of experience as a Japanese teacher have allowed me to create a fast and efficient method for students to learn Japanese.
I understand that every students is different and that each student has different goals and capabilities.
I aim to use each lesson as an opportunity to help you improve your language skills, but still personalize the lesson to your capabilities.
I will always try my best to assist each student in the vest way possible.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
The first step is to get to know the student's goals.
Once I assess the student's level, we can draft a study plan in order to meet the student's short and long-term goals.
The classes are 100% taught in Japanese, and my main focus is to develop student's speaking skills. I can offer purely conversational lessons or more tailored lessons where I will offer targeted activities to deepen the student's grammar, vocabulary and pronunciation skills.
I have also prepared hundreds of students for the JLPT exam with many success stories to share.
My teaching style is fun and exciting, but strict enough to be able to help you reach your goals.
After all, what is learning without enjoying?

I would love to be able to transmit all my knowledge about the Spanish language, so if you are looking to learn in an entertaining, clear and at your own pace, look no further!
teacher_info.about_me:
¡Hola! Mi nombre es Dafne García, me alegra que te interese aprender el hermoso idioma del español y que me dejes ser parte del proceso.  Me encantaría poder transmitirte todo mi conocimiento sobre el idioma, así que si buscas aprender de una manera entretenida, clara y a tu ritmo¡No busques más!

Hi, my name is Dafne Garcia and I´m glad that you are interested in learning the beautiful language of Spanish and that you let me be part of the process.  I would love to be able to transmit all my knowledge about the Spanish language, so if you are looking to learn in an entertaining, clear and at your own pace, look no further!
teacher_info.about_teacher: Learning languages ​​is not always the easiest thing in the world, I understand how tedious and difficult it can be, that is why if you are looking to learn Spanish in an entertaining, simple way and with a patient teacher who is aware of your interests and needs, you are in the right place. Together, little by little, we will discover the wonder of Spanish with classes tailored to your abilities and when you least expect it, you will have mastered the language.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Why  sometimes learning a language is so complicated? Because usually the classes start by teaching us thousands of grammar rules and memorization techniques, which only makes us end up tired and bored. That is why for me the first step to mastering a language is conversational practice, as we learn our native language, in which little by little we develop the necessary skills to later move on to writing , with it you will find that learning Spanish can be  fun and interesting.

course_info.trial_description:
Let's get to know each other!
In this class I will be happy to answer your questions, find out how you want to take the classes and share my knowledge with you.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Spanish
pro_course_detail.description: If you are interested in exceeding your level of Spanish and being able to maintain a fluent conversation with a native speaker, this is the class for you. No matter what level of Spanish you have, we will make you feel comfortable speaking it in less than you think

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish for begginers- Let´s start!
pro_course_detail.description: I know that learning Spanish can be challenging, but together we will achieve it in the easiest and most entertaining way possible.

pro_course_detail.title: Reading and writing
pro_course_detail.description: Interested in understanding texts and grammar? This is your class! From simple texts to complex readings.

I can help you if you want to learn Bahasa Indonesia for daily conversation, specific purpose, or if you just need a partner to speak Indonesian with.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
My main goal is to help you speaking Bahasa Indonesia correctly and fluently. 
When I teach, I get my student to use Bahasa Indonesia as often as possible.  
You will not only learn about Indonesian language, but also the cultures. 
All materials will be provided. 

Book a lesson with me and let us achieve your goals in learning Bahasa Indonesia~
Thank you & see you :)

course_info.trial_description: In trial lesson, let's get to know each other. During this lesson, you will learn about common phrases and basic vocabulary in Bahasa Indonesian. Of course, I will guide you for the next lesson and tell what you can expect from my class.

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking Practice for Beginner
pro_course_detail.description: You will learn Bahasa Indonesia from very basic. I will teach according to your pace. It is okay if you do not know Indonesian at all, I will teach you very patiently. If you can speak little Indonesian, I can help you learn with simple common phrases and get better in every lesson. I mostly speak in Indonesian and I always encourage my students to speak Indonesian during the class. If you want, I can teach you formal/informal language.

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking Practice for Intermediate
pro_course_detail.description:
You will learn Bahasa Indonesia on the next level. After passing this class, I guarantee you will be able to speak Bahasa Indonesia in most situation.
I mostly speak in Indonesian and I always encourage my students to speak Indonesian during the class. I will guide you comprehensively. Of course, I am available to your request for learning Bahasa Indonesia (for example, if you want to learn Bahasa Indonesia for business, I can cover it for you)

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! My name is Bella. I come from Guangdong,China. My mother tongue's Chinese and Chaoshan dialect. Chaoshan dialect is a kind of Minnan dialect. I can also speak Cantonese.
I have more than one year's teaching experience,  and passed the Chinese teacher certificate and Putonghua certificate during the University.
I like traveling, I've been to many places in China and abroad. If you're interested, I'd like to share it with you.
I  like study new things and learn about different cultures.I like dance. I have learned modern dance and classical dance.I also like music. I have many hobbies
I am very talkative. In class, you just need to follow my rhythm. Learning Chinese is not difficult

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have been engaged in the education industry for more than one year. I have taught in schools and educational institutions. Now I am working as an online Chinese teacher. Most of the students I contacted before were children and teenagers, so I was very patient. Online teaching teaches more adults. Interest is the best teacher to learn. In my class, I hope you can learn Chinese easily. No matter beginners or students who have been in contact with Chinese, welcome to my class to experience the charm of Chinese.

我從事教育行業已經1年多了，在學校教學過，也在教育機構教學過，現在是作為一名線上中文教師在進行我的工作。之前接觸的學生年齡段比較多的是小孩子和青少年，所以在教學的過程中我學會了耐心。線上教學多教授成年人。我對待我的學生很有耐心。興趣是學習最好的老師，在我的課堂上，我希望你們能輕鬆的學習中文。不管是初學者還是接觸過中文的學生，歡迎你們來我的課堂體驗中文的魅力。
teacher_info.teaching_style:
✨Courses: beginners, conversation practice, daily dialogue, business dialogue（Including international trade, tourism and hotel industry）, tourism language, HSK, etc.
✨Teaching materials: I will give you free electronic teaching materials and course notes, such as e-books or after class notes, according to the content you want to learn. I will customize the textbook according to the Chinese level of each student；Vocabulary set.
✨Teaching style: in my course, I will use the video on social software as the teaching content, or it may be TV series and songs, so that students can learn and imitate. Study easily, don't let study become your burden.

线上中文教师
online chinese teacher

中国的普通话评级证书（因为我的纸质版普通话证书丢失了，所以这是电子版的）
Chinese Putonghua rating certificate (because my paper Putonghua certificate is lost, so it's electronic version)

course_info.trial_description: Hey😉，Want to know my teaching style? Contact me! Let's introduce ourselves and have a brief chat about your learning goal!

pro_course_detail.title: Mandarin class for beginner  |  Intermediate | Advanced |初中高
pro_course_detail.description:
👍Beginner
✨The course for beginners is mainly learning Pinyin, speech correction, words and sentences.
✨We will learn pinyin, strokes of Chinese characters, Chinese words and sentences for daily conversation; In the process of learning Chinese characters, we will learn Chinese radicals, through which we can simply remember the meaning of Chinese characters.
✨In class, we will use Chinese as much as possible for communication, and I will encourage you to use Chinese more for inquiry and reply, and imitate my words more; Practice listening and speaking.
✨You will also know the origin of Chinese characters in the process of learning, such as how Chinese characters evolved; In the process of learning,  If you have any topics you want to talk about, such as food, society, epidemic, travel, etc., I'm looking forward to talking with you in class.


👍 Intermediate | Advanced
✨This course is for middle and senior students.
✨I will make a suitable course for you according to your needs; In the use of teaching materials, I will recommend suitable textbooks to you according to your learning needs. All decisions are up to you; If there are other textbooks you like and want to use in class, you can also communicate with me after class.
✨ if you have difficulties in grammar, writing and reading, we can set up special courses.
✨For students who want to focus on practicing oral conversation, I will choose the topic of teaching, choose the topic you are interested in, or the hot topic in China today, and discuss it in class; During the discussion, you can enrich your vocabulary and practice speaking fluent Chinese.
✨If you have any questions after class, please feel free to contact me. I'm happy to answer them for you.
✨Looking forward to talking to you

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation class | 会话课
pro_course_detail.description:
This class is mainly about dialogue practice, correcting your pronunciation and communicating in Chinese.
According to your learning needs and learning level, I will confirm with you whether you want to use teaching materials for learning, or just have a dialogue.
In the process of dialogue, I will help you correct your grammar and mistakes.
According to your learning objectives and learning objectives (daily dialogue, business dialogue, tourism dialogue, etc.), carry out relative learning and dialogue exercises.

这节课主要是对话练习，纠正你的发音以及运用中文进行沟通。
根据你的学习需求和学习水平，我会和你确认是否要运用教材来进行学习，或者只是进行对话。
在对话的过程中，我会帮助你纠正你的语法和错误。
根据你的学习目标、学习目的（日常对话、商务对话、旅游对话等等）进行相对应的学习和对话练习。

pro_course_detail.title: HSK Course | HSK
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is suitable for those preparing for HSK/HSKK test.
This course will help you to learn Chinese systematically. We will use HSK as a teaching material throughout the course，and will provide the corresponding test paper for the mock examination!!!!
In my class, I will provide customized courses.
I will not only use HSK teaching materials, but also make corresponding changes to the class content according to your actual level, so that you can better accept and learn Chinese, instead of boring teaching materials.
If you want to know more, please let me know what you need.

pro_course_detail.title: Hokkienese - Chaoshan dialect -  Teochew / Chaozhou Dialect
pro_course_detail.description:
----Only dialogue classes are available.

潮州话是闽南语的一种。
讲闽方言的地区包括福建地区、台湾地区和潮汕地区等。
我所教授的方言，是潮汕地区中的潮州话。
如果你想对潮汕话感兴趣，想了解、学习和交流潮汕文化，请和我联系吧！

Chaozhou Dialect is a kind of Minnan language.
The areas where Min dialect is spoken include Fujian, Taiwan and Chaoshan.
The dialect I teach is Chaozhou Dialect in Chaoshan area.
If you want to be interested in Chaoshan dialect and want to understand, learn and exchange Chaoshan culture, please contact me!

This class is only available to students who have booked the course before March 1, 2022。

teacher_info.about_teacher:
In private lessons, group lessons, Skype lessons, I've been teaching from beginner to advance level.
My specialty is teaching beginner Japanese :)

I am a language teacher, but I don't think "I am a teacher".
I want to give you tips about learning Japanese and I want you to use it and have fun your life with your Japanese language.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
＜model plan for beginner＞
Genki 1 (JLPT N5 level)・・・・・about 100hours 
Genki 2 (JLPT N4 level)・・・・・about 100hours
 
For example,
・2 hours/week・・・about one year for genki 1
・3 hours/week・・・about 8 months for genki 1
・4 hours/week・・・about half year for genki 1

Of course my lessons are private, the focus is on you!
So please let me know what you’re looking for and we can build a lesson plan based exactly on what you need/want to learn!!

course_info.trial_description:
In my class, we focus on conversation. Speak!!! Talk!!! Fun!!!
______________________________
After each lesson, I will share a google document with your lesson's summary and homework!!
This is very helpful. You can review what grammar and vocabulary you learned in your lesson and you can do homework. 
______________________________
★★ cancellation or reschedule within 24h is not allowed ★★

● For beginner, you will be able to have a small talk, go shopping ... etc.
text book → Fun&Easy, Genki,  or anything your request.

● For intermediate, you will be able to... 
・talk your opinion and discus about each topics (ex: news, latest topics.) , 
・book a restaurants, hotel  ... etc.

● For advanced, 
ネイティブと問題なくどんな場面でも会話ができるようになることを目指して、
それから、発音や自然な話し方など、もう一度見直し、問題点は直していくという活動も行いたいです。テキストは、JLPT N2やN1の文法や語彙のテキストを使いながら会話中心の授業を行ったり、何か日本語の記事やニュースを読んで、それを使って練習する　などを考えています。

Please tell me what you want to practice in Japanese.
Let's make your own Japanese lessons with me.

＊Occasionally I might need to finish your lesson 5min earlier because I have another lesson scheduled. Thank you very much for your understanding.

teacher_info.intro:
Languages are my passion and I have a lot of experience teaching/learning them.
I’m a Canadian who was born in Slovakia close to the Hungarian border. I also lived in England, the Czech Republic and Guatemala and visited many places in Europe/America.
I love meeting people.
I also enjoy hiking, swimming, nature, reading, cooking, baking, gardening and eating delicious food.
I am also interested in psychology.
teacher_info.short_signature: Currently a language tutor/youth worker; a nurse by profession. A polyglot and a lover of life, too.
teacher_info.about_me:
Languages are my passion and I have a lot of experience teaching/learning them.
I’m a Canadian who was born in Slovakia close to the Hungarian border. I also lived in England, the Czech Republic and Guatemala and visited many places in Europe/America.
I love meeting people.
I also enjoy hiking, swimming, nature, reading, cooking, baking, gardening and eating delicious food.
I am also interested in psychology.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have been teaching since 2009 and on italki since Oct 2020. 
I am a calm, patient and relaxed teacher with a good sense of humour. 
I know learning a new language can be a challenge, so, I like to give a lot of encouragement.
I easily adjust to the needs of each student and I am quick to observe the student's level and his/her necessities.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I teach in a friendly, warm, welcoming and relaxed environment.
First, I observe the students’ needs and then I suggest the appropriate material/style.

course_info.trial_description:
You can choose from the following activities:
1. Conversation about general topics. This will help you to become more fluent and confident and to sound more natural.
2. Learning proverbs - It's raining cats and dogs. - Leje ako z konvice. 
Knowing proverbs is an essential part in any given language. Proverbs cannot be translated word for word that is why it is so important to learn their meaning. 
This will help you to build your vocabulary and become more comfortable as you engage in conversation with native speakers.      
3. Listening to short stories. This will help you to improve your listening and comprehension skills and to build your vocabulary.
4. Flashcards, quizzes, tests and games. These will help you to build your vocabulary and to practice pronunciation.

pro_course_detail.title: Learning Slovak
pro_course_detail.description:
Rather than just learning words, I will teach you from the beginning how to build sentences.
Please note: I do not teach grammar!!!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation in Slovak
pro_course_detail.description:
It doesn't matter where your interest lies we can talk about it in a relaxed and friendly environment. 
These lessons will help you become more fluent and confident.

pro_course_detail.title: Hungarian for TOTAL beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
We will start building simple sentences from the very beginning, that way you will become accustomed to the word order right away. 
These lessons are for TOTAL BEGINNERS!!!
Please note: I do not teach grammar!!!

pro_course_detail.title: Hungarian for advanced beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
If you already know some vocabulary but cannot form sentences, then these lessons are for you. 
I will help you to use the vocabulary that you already know and teach you new words, too.
Please note: I do not teach grammar!!!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation in Spanish
pro_course_detail.description: I will help you to use the vocabulary that you already know and teach you new words, too. You can choose the topic you would like to talk about.

pro_course_detail.title: Learning Spanish
pro_course_detail.description:
We can work on these areas: listening, speaking, vocabulary, comprehension, building sentences. 
Please note: I do not teach grammar!!!

pro_course_detail.title: Learning English
pro_course_detail.description:
We can practice listening, speaking, comprehension, grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, etc. 
The lesson will be tailored to your level, needs and interests. Moreover, you choose the areas you want to work on.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation in English
pro_course_detail.description: These lessons are perfect for those who would like to become more fluent in English. We can talk about any topic of your choice.

pro_course_detail.title: Czech for TOTAL BEGINNERS
pro_course_detail.description: If you are a total beginner or know very little Czech, then, these lessons are for you. We will start by learning new words and building simple sentences.

teacher_info.intro:
¡Hola! Me llamo Fabián y soy un nativo de Español de México. Soy una persona muy apasionada y me encanta conocer a nuevas personas de otras culturas alrededor del mundo.  Amo aprender de otras culturas y conocer sus tradiciones para poder algún día viajar y conocer sus países.

Hello! My name is Fabian and I am a native of Spanish from Mexico. I am a very passionate person and I love meeting new people from other cultures around the world. I love learning about other cultures and knowing their traditions so that one day I can travel and know their countries.
teacher_info.short_signature: Conversational Spanish Teacher From Mexico.
teacher_info.about_me:
¡Hola! Me llamo Fabián y soy un nativo de Español de México. Soy una persona muy apasionada y me encanta conocer a nuevas personas de otras culturas alrededor del mundo.  Amo aprender de otras culturas y conocer sus tradiciones para poder algún día viajar y conocer sus países.

Hello! My name is Fabian and I am a native of Spanish from Mexico. I am a very passionate person and I love meeting new people from other cultures around the world. I love learning about other cultures and knowing their traditions so that one day I can travel and know their countries.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Cuando me toca enseñar siempre trato de considerar de que cada uno de ustedes es diferente del otro, todos tienen su propio método para aprender. Por eso, he tratado de buscar y hacer lecciones basadas en tu forma de aprender en un camino flexible. 
Te puedo ayudar a mejorar tu Español.

When I have to teach I always try to consider that each one of you is different from the other, everyone has their own method of learning. Therefore, I have tried to find and make lessons based on your way of learning in a flexible way.
I can help you improve your Spanish.
*NO BEGGINERS*
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Siempre trato de que mis clases sean personalizadas basado en las necesidades de los estudiantes. Si el estudiante necesita más gramática comienzo las clases enseñando las reglas de gramática. Normalmente trato de enfocarme en conversación, porqué es la mejor manera de aprender un idioma, en mi opinión. 

I always try to make my classes personalized based on the needs of the students. If the student needs more grammar, I start the classes by teaching the grammar rules. I usually try to focus on conversation, because it is the best way to learn a language, in my opinion.
*NO BEGGINERS*

teacher_info.intro:
Hi! I’m Kelly and am a native Chinese speaker from Shenzhen.

Having also gone through the pain of studying a new language, I sincerely believe that the most important thing is getting the chance and freedom to speak the language freely! So all my lessons are mainly focused on speaking and listening! 

My classes have shown to rapidly and flexibly improve my student’s Chinese abilities despite whatever customized study plan or agenda they may have (or that I devise for them!) 

I sincerely hope that my students not only learn Chinese simply as a language but also gain an appreciative and intuitive understanding of Chinese culture!

Looking very much to meeting you!

Thank you. Kelly
teacher_info.short_signature: I take absolute beginners in my class! Thanks for checking out my reviews! ; )

teacher_info.about_teacher:
**My lessons are designed to cater to each individual student's needs.**
**With my English, I believe I can save you some time on grammatical explanations.**
When learning a new language, it's common to translate it in your own language first then to the target language. But let's try not to do so and try our best to solve problems in a Chinese mindset instead ; )
学习一门语言，其实语法并不是最重要的。重要的是你敢开口说，不怕犯错，从错误中不断学习。还有更重要的一点就是要坚持！加油，我们一起加油！
teacher_info.teaching_style:
1/ Through classes to build vocabulary and learn grammar points, listening & imitation are extreamly important in my classes
2/ Practical homework for the new lesson
3/ Review former lesson before a new one
4/ Customized study plan 
In order to build confidence, I'll try to make my classes in an easy and fun atmosphere, a place where you feel comfortable to make mistakes and try again.

cert_info.description: Kelly Yip has been a teacher on Verbling since July 20, 2020. Verbling is an online platform where language learners can take lessons with professional teachers. Verbling is incorporated and based in San Francisco, CA, USA, and any and all work done for the company by Kelly Yip is carried out remotely (online). Ourin-house staff vets every application from prospective teachers. Only those teachers who meet rigorous standards are accepted, ensuring high instruction quality for ourlearners.

course_info.trial_description: Having the ability to communicate in another language opens up so many new doors and makes the world so much smaller than you can imagine ; )

pro_course_detail.title: Customized lesson - - Total beginners are welcome! (incl. personal notes, material, grammar,  homework, lesson plan etc)
pro_course_detail.description:
**Anyone can learn Chinese! My approach is focused on natural language learning.**

1/ No matter what your level is, my tutoring provides the reinforcement you need. Being effective on your own pace. 
2/ You will learn to speak Chinese the same way you learned to speak your mother tongue – listen, repeat/imitate, make mistakes, and try again.
3/ Last but not least, pls be patient. Learning a language never stops. It’s an ongoing process.

E books will be provided, homework as desired ; )
Let's get started!

**Teachers are paid for lessons you miss without notice. Any cancelation or any reschedule request, pls kindly inform me 12 hours ahead, thanks. **

teacher_info.intro:
Hi there,
My name is Dahee.
I'm a qualified language teacher from Seoul, South Korea. 
I live alternately between Cape Town and Seoul.
I've been working as an on-offline Korean Language teacher and a TVC model in Cape Town.
Also, when I visit Korea, I teach either English to elementary school kids or Japanese to middle-high school students. I always get some offers to teach foreigners Korean language while I'm staying in Korea. 

I love children, animals and travel. Recently, I traveled to South America and Eastern Europe for 6 months. I like to meet new people, listen to their stories, and share experiences. 
I sincerely hope I can help you to improve your Korean level.

Hi there,

teacher_info.about_teacher:
My qualifications:

• Master’s degree in Language Education from Hankuk University of Foreign Studies, Seoul (2014).
• Korean Education Course at Hongik University, Seoul (2013).
• Bachelor’s degree in Japanese Language and Japanese Translation from Hankuk University of Foreign Studies, Seoul (2011).

My Korean teaching experience consists of one-on-one private lessons and teaching group lessons at the Korean school in Cape Town.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I offer beginner lessons, conversation practice lessons, intermediate lessons and topic discussion lessons for upper intermediate and advanced students. You can find out more information on each type of lesson in the “Lessons” section below.

Generally, my classes contain an equal balance of reading, speaking, writing, and listening. During the class, I like to spend more time on speaking and listening through conversation. After class, I will give you worksheets to complete and writing tasks to practice by yourself.

I strive to be friendly, efficient and clear in my lessons. I like to complement my students to encourage them and give them confidence in learning Korean.

exp_info.description: I was the first Korean Language teacher of Hangeul school in Cape Town for 9 months to teach an adult group.

Left side picture is my Teaching License.
cert_info.certificate: Teaching License for Middle/ High School Level

cert_info.description: My all certifications are in Korea. So I found an evidence photo on Facebook.

course_info.trial_description: A trial lesson is for students who want to check their Korean level before taking a full lesson and to see if the student and teacher are a good fit. I can provide a level test before the lesson to save your time or a level test can be done during the lesson by answering my questions. I look forward to meeting you!

pro_course_detail.title: Beginner Korean Classes
pro_course_detail.description:
First 2 lessons are for learning and memorizing the Korean alphabet. There are 19 consonants and 21 vowels.

From the 3rd class, you’re going to learn expressions including vocabulary and grammar.
After 12 classes you will be able to:

• Introduce yourself and others in an informal and formal way.
• Request items in a shop.
• Talk about activities and places.
• Ask questions and answer questions about destinations.
• Talk about dates and days of the week. 
• Talk about past experiences.
• Order food at a restaurant and ask the price of items.
• Talk about the weather.
• Make suggestions.
• Express feelings.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring - Real Life Conversations
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is for travelers to Korea to practice Korean that you can use right away.
It's recommended for students who want to practice their Korean conversation skills.
The format of the class is flexible and can be decided by the student.

pro_course_detail.title: Intermediate Korean Classes
pro_course_detail.description:
This class is for students wanting to practice their Korean speaking and listening skills. It is offered to students who achieve a mark of 85% or higher on the level test I provide. 

Lessons will contain more advanced vocabulary, grammar and reading.
We will practice making conversations about different topics such as:

•	Hobbies
•	Food
•	Transport
•	Travel and holiday plans
•	Your hometown
•	Visiting the doctor
•	Dreams
•	Occupations
•	Likes and dislikes
•	And more…

Each lesson is customized for the student.

pro_course_detail.title: Topic discussion - Upper Intermediate & Advanced • Overseas Koreans
pro_course_detail.description:
This class is for students wanting to practice their Korean speaking skills.
It's offered to students who are Upper Intermediate to advanced and overseas Koreans.

In this lesson we're going to practice learning high level words (한자어) and organizing grammar that you already know (but not properly or heard somewhere through various topics) so that you can speak with confidence. I recommend an hour class because it will be quite tight for practicing speaking, listening, reading and writing in each class.

pro_course_detail.title: [NEW] Play Korean for children
pro_course_detail.description:
It's a Play Korean lesson tailored for your child's interests.
Hangul school is good for experiencing Korean culture and meeting friends but if you want Korean lessons that only focus on your child, I recommend 30 minute one on one Korean lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: [NEW] Small Group Korean Lessons
pro_course_detail.description:
Try learning Korean with your best friend or family.
All classes can vary depending on learners' interests and needs.
Feel free to comment.
