teacher_info.intro:
大家好！我的中文名字叫灿灿。“灿”字，在汉语里是光彩、明亮的意思。我喜欢中国的传统文化：汉服、旗袍、中国古典舞和古典乐曲；同时，我也喜欢学习语言、读书、旅游。中国文化丰富多彩，而汉语就是打开这个多彩世界的一把钥匙。在这里，我非常乐意帮您掌握这把钥匙，去打开一扇门，感受中国传统文化的魅力。
Hi, everyone. My Chinese name is cancan which means bright and shine. I'm so interested in Chinese cultures and traditions such as han-style clothes, Qipao, Chinese classical dance and music. Meanwhile I'm also interested in reading, traveling and language studying. Learn to speak Chinese is the key to understand Chinese culture which is so interesting. I'm really happy to help you master  Chinese and enjoy the charm of Chinese culture.
teacher_info.short_signature: More than 3 years of teaching experience, students have taught from more than 20 countries.超过3年的教学经验
teacher_info.about_me:
大家好！我的中文名字叫灿灿。“灿”字，在汉语里是光彩、明亮的意思。我喜欢中国的传统文化：汉服、旗袍、中国古典舞和古典乐曲；同时，我也喜欢学习语言、读书、旅游。中国文化丰富多彩，而汉语就是打开这个多彩世界的一把钥匙。在这里，我非常乐意帮您掌握这把钥匙，去打开一扇门，感受中国传统文化的魅力。
Hi, everyone. My Chinese name is cancan which means bright and shine. I'm so interested in Chinese cultures and traditions such as han-style clothes, Qipao, Chinese classical dance and music. Meanwhile I'm also interested in reading, traveling and language studying. Learn to speak Chinese is the key to understand Chinese culture which is so interesting. I'm really happy to help you master  Chinese and enjoy the charm of Chinese culture.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
我有3年多的中文教学经验。我教过各个年龄段的学生，不同的年龄段，我会用不同的材料和方法来教学。我也和你们一样热爱学习语言，并知道学习新的语言是具有挑战性的。所以我非常理解你们，并乐意帮助你们学习中文。
I have been teaching Chinese for more than 3 Years, they from different countries. I teach in suitable way for different age groups. I teach foreigners who live and work in my city In my spare time. And  just like you, I love learning new languages, too, so I understand how challenge and difficult it is to learn a new language. That is why I'm here to help you learn Chinese.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
我很有耐心，也很随和，我的课程非常的灵活，所以请放轻松。无论你年龄大小，中文是什么水平，我很乐意帮你找到最合适的方式学习中文，并达成你的目标。
I'm very patient, kind, flexible, open-minded. No matter your age is and no matter your Chinese level is, I would like to find out the most suitable method for you and help you achieve your goals.
 For conversion class, you and I choose topics which you are interested in. We can talk about our lives, friends, job, hobbies. Our favorite films, books, musics and food. You will learn more vocabularies,phrases,conversations and cultures. I will tune your tones, fix your pronunciation, correct grammar mistakes and practice with you. Chinese is really an interesting language, so please take it easy in my class.

course_info.trial_description:
I'm very patient, kind, flexible, open-minded. No matter what level you are at, you will find interesting and useful things on my lesson.
 In my lesson I will give you the answers to WHAT, WHY, and HOW of Chinese and help you study or improve your Chinese.

Please BOOK my lesson，and learn Chinese with me.

pro_course_detail.title: 学习中文 Learn Madarin Systematically or Spoken Chinese
pro_course_detail.description:
本节课适用于系统学习中文和想要提高中文水平的学生，成人和青少年都有适合的材料教学。
This lesson is suitable for students who learn Chinese systematically or who want to improve spoken Chinese.
Learn Chinese Systematically 
There are suitable materials for Adults and Teenagers and Kids

- HSK(1-6) textbooks will be the main materials for adults
- Boya Chinese 1-8（Elementary/Intermediate/Advanced）
- Rode to success 1-8（Elementary/Intermediate/Advanced）

- Easy Steps to Chinese for Kids will be main material for child( from 5 to 7 years old)
- Easy Steps to Chinese will be main material for child( from 8 to 18 years old)

If you are the beginner, we will begin from chinese alphabet and Chinese character, and we learn the words, grammar, phrases from basic conversation. The pronunciation is the most important part.

If you are the intermediate or advanced learner , we will not only learn words,grammar and phrases,but also listening, writing, reading.

Improve Spoken Chinese
- Materials are prepared for you 
- Experiencecing Chinese (living in China/living in China - Advanced/Cultural Communication in China/Traveling in China/ Business communication in China)
- New Target Chinese Spoken Language (from level 1 to level 6)
- Short Term Spoken Chinese (beginner to advanced level)
- Conversational Chinese 301 （volume 1-volume 2）

If you are a chinese bigener, please don't afraid to speak chinese,we could practice chinese together.
If you are a chinese intermediate or advanced learner,let's enjoy speaking chinese.

pro_course_detail.title: 中国文化与艺术 Chinese Culture and Art
pro_course_detail.description:
Chinese culture is rich and colorful. This lesson I will lead you to understand Chinese culture, discuss Chinese culture, and make you enjoy the charm of Chinese culture. (This course is more suitable for intermediate and advanced Chinese learners; if you are a beginner in Chinese, and you really like chinese culture, I'm happy to help you understand them)
-- Chinese Civilization and Art:
   Chinese cities/Chinese cuisine/Chinese zodiac signs/Chinese marriage/Chinese Qigong/Chinese dragon/etc.
-- Chinese traditional culture:
   China's four major traditional festivals/ Hanfu cheongsam culture/Dragon and Lion dance/Paper-cutting/ etc.
-- Chinese cultural stories:
    Legend of Cowherd and Weaver Girl/Legend of Liang Zhu/Legend of White Snake/etc.
-- Chinese idiom
   Learn Chinese idiom via stories and videos，help you understand the meaning of idioms  and how to use it
中国文化丰富多彩，这节课带领你了解中国文化，一起讨论中国文化，让你感受中国文化的魅力。（此课程更加适合于中、高级汉语学习者；如果你是汉语初学者，但非常想了解中国文化，我们一样可以学习中国文化）
中国的文明与艺术：
中国城市、中国菜、十二生肖、中国人的婚嫁、中国气功、中国太极拳、中国龙等
中国传统文化：
中国四大传统节日、汉服旗袍文化、舞龙舞狮、武术、剪纸、年画等
中国文化故事：
牛郎织女的传说、梁祝传说、白蛇传说等
中国成语：
通过学习成语故事，学习成语的意思和成语的用法。

teacher_info.intro: Hello everyone! My name is Trang,  I'm from Vietnam! I was born in Phu Quoc island, whose beauty should be compared with a paradise I believe, I'm proud to get to say that it is my original hometown, I have been living in Ho Chi Minh city (Saigon city) for almost 12 years now, and with no doubt, I love this city like my second home, it never stops making me feel amazed! I once decided to spend a month to travel around Vietnam when I was 22 since I love traveling! Beside it, I also love making new friends, because when we get to meet and talk to people, the world is naturally brought to us then, through other stories and experiences, I do believe so!
teacher_info.short_signature: Over 3 years of teaching experience
teacher_info.about_me: Hello everyone! My name is Trang,  I'm from Vietnam! I was born in Phu Quoc island, whose beauty should be compared with a paradise I believe, I'm proud to get to say that it is my original hometown, I have been living in Ho Chi Minh city (Saigon city) for almost 12 years now, and with no doubt, I love this city like my second home, it never stops making me feel amazed! I once decided to spend a month to travel around Vietnam when I was 22 since I love traveling! Beside it, I also love making new friends, because when we get to meet and talk to people, the world is naturally brought to us then, through other stories and experiences, I do believe so!
teacher_info.about_teacher: I started working as a Vietnamese and English tutor since early September in 2017, it has been an interesting, and wonderful experience to me personally. While helping an Australian friend study Vietnamese, I accidentally found out about my ability in teaching Languages, with the encouragement of my friend, the journey of me becoming a tutor began! I have seen myself having great passion in languages since I'm studying to become a translator and interpreter now. Always appreciate it to have a chance to introduce Vietnamese to everyone, especially to ones who are living here in the moment, so you can apply it usefully while interacting with local people, and making new local friends!
teacher_info.teaching_style: I can teach both Vietnamese, English to teenagers and adults with quiet flexible schedules! Some students of mine, after spending a while studying in schools, centers, yet the results were not as good as they had expected, especially to those who are not into studying in a serious atmosphere! That is why I always think about teaching as providing something new and interesting to everyone. I love making students feel comfortable to speak up, a good laugh to lift up any atmosphere, and games related to studying can help everyone remember their lessons better I believe! My goal is to make everyone feel like "studying is fun", and so hope that everyone will love the language like I do too!

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring - easy Vietnamese for children and adults
pro_course_detail.description:
conversational practice, daily communication, vocabulary contribution, pronunciation focus, building common and creative questions and practice listening skills

learning languages should not be something that is too stressful or too serious for children: fun atmosphere to take part in, effective method of memorizing vocabularies, doing reviews of the lessons frequently, helpful homework for children to work on , ...

teacher_info.about_teacher: I've been tutoring spanish online for the past 2 years and now I'm getting my certificate. I follow the European Framework of Reference for the Languages but I'm very flexible and I adapt the lessons according to your goals and interests. I design a personilized study plan based on your level, your interests and your needs, so you can be sure that you are going to learn something new each class and want to continue learning!
teacher_info.teaching_style: I teach all levels and conversation workshops, too. I work with all the main skills that conform a language: speaking, listening, writing and listening without forgetting the grammar. All of them, brought toghether, constitute the core of learning and perfecting a new language. I desing all the material so you can be sure that each class is made thinking about your needs. I use a lot of different tools such: editable PDFs, PPt presentations, youtube, podcasts, documentaries, articles, short tales, interactive excercises, games, etc. Because I think that we learn better when we are having some fun!

course_info.trial_description:
In the first class we are going to meet each other! We are going to talk about your goals in learning spanish, I'm going to ask you some questions to be sure in which level you are and then I'm going to explain to you my methods and materials. 
If you have any questions, don't hesitate and send me a message. I'm looking forward to meeting you.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish for beginners (adults only)
pro_course_detail.description:
In this class you are going to start learning the language with lessons that involves all the main skills: speaking, listening, reading and writing, without foretting a little bit of grammar which is essential. Based on your goals and interests we are going to talk about things like:
- Basics for a vacation or a travel 
- Grammar basics 
- Introduction, descriptions, ask for and give directions, ask questions 
- Numbers, family, colors, days and months
- Interests, shopping, family, likes and dislikes
- Verbs and the basic verb tenses in spanish (present and simple past)
- Pronunciation
And we are going to use a variety of materials for you to learn and have fun at the same time!:
- Real material (travel guides, travel videos, city maps, etc); youtube, podcasts, songs, poems, games, infographics, interactive excercises...

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish for intermediates (adults only)
pro_course_detail.description:
In this class you're going to continue with your learning journey. We are going to work on the main skills: speaking, listening, writing and reading in a more advanced level following the next topics:
- Grammar and pronunciation.
- Advanced vocabulary.
- Advanced past tenses to relate past experiences.
- Future tenses to express wishes, desires and hypothetical experiences.
- Arguments, express feelings and believes. 
- Give advice, express personal opinions and tell fictional stories. 
- And we are going to improve speaking production by continuos oral production classes.
We are going to work with many different materials: material from the real world, youtube, songs, podcasts, interactive excercises, games, documentaries, movies, articles, short tales and children books, etc.
Aditionally to that material, I'm going to give you and/or recommend you extra material so you can practice outside the classroom. 
If you have questions or want more info, don't hasitate to send me a message, I'm looking forward to meet you and to help you in this amazing journey learning one of the most beautiful languages!

pro_course_detail.title: Taller de conversación (sólo adultos)
pro_course_detail.description:
En este taller nos dedicaremos a tu producción oral: a que practiques, tengas mayor seguridad y fluidez, y a que corrijas algunos errores (si es que existen). También veremos modismos mexicanos y te enseñaré a hablar de una forma más natural y coloquial. 
Como material de trabajo utilizaremos material real producido en México, libros, cuentos, artículos, documentales, películas, podcasts. Todos ellos de acuerdo a tus intereses y objetivos en este taller. 
¡Este tipo de talleres son mi especialidad! ¡Me encanta escuchar lo que otros tienen que decir, discutir temas interesantes y tener la oportunidad de también poder aprender!
Contáctame y ya verás que amarás hablar en español cada día más.

teacher_info.intro:
¡Hola! Mi nombre es Sayra, tengo 25 años y soy de una pequeña y bonita ciudad al norte de México. Tengo una carrera de Ingeniería en Energías Renovables con especialización en la Energía Solar. Estudié e hice mis prácticas profesionales en Alemania en los pueblos de Göttingen y Freiburg en un periodo total de 2 años. 
Durante mi intercambio, descubrí mi pasión por los viajes y por conocer gente de todas las culturas. Además, me encanta hacer ejercicio, disfrutar del aire libre y descubrir nuevos y deliciosos platillos :)
teacher_info.short_signature: Patient and fun Spanish and English tutor!
teacher_info.about_me:
¡Hola! Mi nombre es Sayra, tengo 25 años y soy de una pequeña y bonita ciudad al norte de México. Tengo una carrera de Ingeniería en Energías Renovables con especialización en la Energía Solar. Estudié e hice mis prácticas profesionales en Alemania en los pueblos de Göttingen y Freiburg en un periodo total de 2 años. 
Durante mi intercambio, descubrí mi pasión por los viajes y por conocer gente de todas las culturas. Además, me encanta hacer ejercicio, disfrutar del aire libre y descubrir nuevos y deliciosos platillos :)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Siempre he disfrutado mucho enseñar cosas nuevas. Además, he sido estudiante del idioma alemán por más de 4 años por lo que conozco la estructura y las herramientas que más me han funcionado en mi trayectoria con el idioma. 
Me encantaría que se pudieran sentir cómodos conmigo ya que soy una persona muy paciente, respetuosa y accesible. Me encantaría poder ayudarlos en este nuevo camino del idioma español.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Mi enfoque son las clases conversacionales, creo firmemente que la mejor manera de dominar un idioma es practicándolo (hablando y más hablando) hasta lograr sentirnos cómodos con el mismo. Podemos tener conversaciones sobre cualquier tema de tu interés ya sea de viajes, diferencias culturales, música, incluso si quisieras adentrarte a un vocabulario en español con un tono más científico, mi trayectoria en la investigación y la industria podrían ser de gran utilidad para ti. 
Como tutor de español, mi objetivo es ayudarte a practicar el idioma a través del método de aprendizaje que mejor te funcione. ¡Tú decides cómo quieres practicar tu español!

course_info.trial_description:
Hola, muchas gracias por interesarte en esta clase. ¿Quieres mejorar tu español o inglés y poder comunicarte como un nativo? ¡Practiquemos juntos!
Una de las mejores maneras para perfeccionar tú fluidez es PRACTICANDO. Nosotros vamos a tener un ambiente cómodo y seguro para tener conversaciones divertidas y de calidad, un ambiente donde los errores solo serán el camino para la mejora. 
Podemos hablar de cualquier tema de tu interés como viajes, música, diferencias culturales, comida, deportes, lo que sea. México es un lugar muy diverso con muchas cosas interesantes que valen la pena compartir.
Con esta sesión de prueba podemos tener una visión general de cómo serían las clases juntos, ¡sería muy divertido probarlo!
__________________________________________________________________
Hi there, thanks for your interest in this class, do you want to improve your Spanish or English and be able to communicate like a native? Let's practice together!
One of the best ways to improve your fluency is to PRACTICE. What I offer is a comfortable and safe environment to have fun and quality conversations, an environment where mistakes will only be the path to improvement. 
We can talk about any topic of your interest such as travel, music, cultural differences, food, sports, you name it. Mexico is a very diverse place with many interesting things worth sharing.
With this trial session we can get an overview of what the classes would be like together, it would be a lot of fun to try it out! Hope to see you soon, Sayra 
(Auch, wenn Sie nur Deutsch sprechen. Wir können auch Spanisch üben, denn es gilt: Übung macht den Meister.)

pro_course_detail.title: ¡Practiquemos juntos!

pro_course_detail.title: Ciencia y Tecnología
pro_course_detail.description:
Hola, ¿quieres practicar y ampliar tu vocabulario técnico en español? No dudes en intentar esta clase. 
Soy una Ingeniera en Energías Renovables con experiencia en diversos centros de investigación en México y Fraunhofer ISE en Alemania. Realice mi tesis de licenciatura en el tema de energía solar térmica, con el modelado y simulación de una planta de calor de procesos Fresnel.  
En mi regreso a México tuve la oportunidad de formar parte de la industria en una compañía que se encarga de la instalación de concentradores cilindros parabólicos a nivel industrial.
Por lo que manejo un amplio vocabulario en temas de ingeniería, matemáticas, energías renovables, energía solar, termodinámica. Además del vocabulario técnico para escribir de manera formal en industria e investigación.
__________________________________________________________________
Hi, do you want to practice and expand your technical vocabulary in Spanish? Don't hesitate to try this class. 
I am a Renewable Energy Engineer with experience in several research centers in Mexico and Fraunhofer ISE in Germany. I did my undergraduate thesis on the topic of solar thermal energy, with the modeling and simulation of a Fresnel process heat plant.  
On my return to Mexico I had the opportunity to be part of the industry in a company responsible for the installation of parabolic trough concentrators at industrial level.
So I have a wide vocabulary in engineering, mathematics, renewable energy, solar energy, thermodynamics. In addition to the technical vocabulary in order to write formally both in industry and research.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English
pro_course_detail.description:
Hi there, thanks for your interest in this class, do you wish to improve your English and be able to communicate more fluently? Let's practice together!
One of the best ways to get better with a language is to PRACTICE. What I offer is a comfortable and safe environment to have fun and quality conversations, an environment where mistakes will only be the path to improvement. 
We can talk about any topic of your interest such as travel, music, cultural differences, food, sports, you name it. Mexico is a very diverse place with many interesting things worth sharing. Also, if you have a more technical background I would love to practice some science and engineering vocab with you... 
Hope to see you soon, S.

Beginners are welcome!
Come on! Let’s enjoy Japanese!
 You can use either
 
“Genki”
https://genki3.japantimes.co.jp/en/
 
or
 
Irodori (free learning material),
https://www.irodori.jpf.go.jp/en/index.html
 
depending on your preference.

I do understand some English,
but my lessons will be conducted in mostly Japanese.
 

レッスンの流れ

１　予習
レッスン開始前までに文法解説・新しい単語など
読んでおいてください

２　レッスン
発音中心に練習していきます。

３　宿題
次のレッスンまでの宿題を出します。
わたしのレッスンでは5分休憩を含みます。

Lesson Flow
 
1　Preparation
Please read the grammar explanation, new vocabulary, etc. before your lesson starts.
 
2　Lesson
We will focus mainly on pronunciation.
 
3　Homework
Homework will be given for the next lesson.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have been engaged in the field of Chinese as a foreign language since 2012, with 7 or 8 years of working experience. Many students have been taught, aged between 3 and 60. Most of them are Japanese. But there are also Europeans and America 、 I’ve received professional training to teach all levels of learners, from beginner to advanced. I also have a wealth of experience in preparing students for HSK exams.
これまで7年以上教育経験があります。私が住んでいる所は日本人が多く、今の生徒もほとんどが日本人です！私も日本語を学んだ時に、言語の学習にはたくさん話すこと、たくさん練習することがとても大事だと感じました。私は日本人への発音、文法、会話の指導を得意としています。きれいで、流ちょうな中国語を話したいと考えている方、私と勉強してみましょう。
我从2012年开始就一直从事对外汉语这个行业了，有着7,8年工作经验。教过的学生很多，年龄在3周岁到60岁之间。
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I prepare an easy to understand text for beginners and explain all the words and conversations in the textbook in English 、I also prepare the text for kids! When we are teaching, we play Chinese (Pinyin), play games, listen to Chinese songs, and study Chinese fun! I have next books for learning Chinese 、from beginner to advanced.I have learned Japanese ,so I know how important it is to speaking and  practicing for Chinese . I will try my best to help you speak fluent  Chinese .I really enjoy socialising and making friends with people from different cultures
私が住んでいる所日本人が多いですから、働いている中国語の教室の校長先生が日本人のために中国語発音マニアルを作りました。私も日本語でどう発音するのが説明ことができます。私はわかりやすいテキストを用意しています、教科書中の単語や会話など全部日本語で説明

course_info.trial_description:

体験授業の前にまずあなたと連絡して、あなたの中国語のレベルとあなたの需要を理解してから、授業を受ける時に私の授業のスタイルを見せます。

pro_course_detail.title: Chinese Conversation 【中国語】会話——-初級、中級、上級、分りやすいの方法で文法や単語を説明します。
pro_course_detail.description:
私は初級者のためにわかりやすいテキストを用意しています、教科書中の単語や会話など全部日本語で説明しています、勉強する時にもわからない所、私が日本語で説明することができます。中級者、上級者の授業もテキストを用意しています、もちろんテキストを使う授業が好きではなく、フリースタイルの授業がしたい方も遠慮なくご相談しましょう
I have an easy to understand text for beginners, All the words and conversation in the textbook are explained in English!I have also prepared simple textbooks for intermediate and advanced level people.

pro_course_detail.title: Chinese Pronunciation、 Conversation/中国语発音レッスン(发音会话）-日本人のために作った発音マニュアルできれいな中国語を学びましょう
pro_course_detail.description:
中国語を学ぶ人にしても、教える人にしても、まず最初にぶつかるのものは中国語の発音である。発音がちゃんとできない限り、いくら単語を覚えても、文法をマスターしても中国語が上手だと言えない。だから発音の勉強はとても大事です。私が住んでいる所日本人が多いですから、働いている中国語の教室の校長先生が日本人のために中国語発音マニアルを作りました。私も日本語でどう発音するのが説明ことができます。皆さん一緒に中国語舌を鍛えましょう！
Even the person who learns Chinese or the person who teaches is the Chinese pronunciation first. As long as pronunciation is not good, I can't say how much words I remember, but even if I master grammar, I'm not good at Chinese. Therefore, study of pronunciation is very important.I have rich teaching experience in this field！ I will correct and improve your Chinese pronunciation through continuous practice.

teacher_info.intro:
*SKYPE ONLY* - I do not use Italki Classroom or Zoom

I'm David, a TEFL-certified native speaker, from London. I've been travelling full-time since 2016 and have over 28k subs on my Travel YouTube channel. I am a BUSINESS ENGLISH COACH for adults mainly in RUSSIA and Europe. I've worked with HUNDREDS of individuals! I am open to any adult from B1-C2 level, from ANY country! I also focus on GENERAL CONVERSATION, IELTS PREP, and more! Send me a message with any questions you may have!

Most of my lessons are booked via my WEBSITE. My Italki calendar reflects the remaining slots available.
teacher_info.short_signature: London-born HR Manager turned Business English Coach, Travel Videographer & Digital Nomad!
teacher_info.introduction:
Hi! I'm David, I'm 35 years old from London in the UK. I left the UK in 2016 to travel full time while building a Travel YouTube channel. I am a TEFL certified English Teacher.

I was born and raised in London and have a London accent. I have always been passionate about the English language. I am keen to support students in gaining a better understanding of British English.

I worked as a Human Resources Manager for many years, therefore I am able to teach both regular English as well as Business English. The most important aspect of teaching to me, is that YOU as the student gains the most out of each lesson. Firstly we will conduct a Needs Analysis, to get to know each other, for me to discover your reasons for learning and English and what your needs are, whether it be grammar, vocabulary, conversational English practice, speaking, listening, reading or writing. 

In terms of lessons, I am very relaxed and I would want you to be relaxed too! You may simply want to practice your Conversational skills, or perhaps you want to study specific grammar points such as tenses, phrasal verbs, idioms or learn more about British Accents.

I do approximately 20-25 lessons a week generally from Thursday to Monday. The only things I ask are that you arrive on time, arrive prepared and motivated and remember to confirm your lesson as complete when we finish.

As a new student, I ask that you first book a TRIAL lesson (NOT a full hour lesson). I do not accept lesson requests from parents on behalf of their children as I do not teach students below the age of 16.
teacher_info.about_me:
*SKYPE ONLY* - I do not use Italki Classroom or Zoom

I'm David, a TEFL-certified native speaker, from London. I've been travelling full-time since 2016 and have over 28k subs on my Travel YouTube channel. I am a BUSINESS ENGLISH COACH for adults mainly in RUSSIA and Europe. I've worked with HUNDREDS of individuals! I am open to any adult from B1-C2 level, from ANY country! I also focus on GENERAL CONVERSATION, IELTS PREP, and more! Send me a message with any questions you may have!

Most of my lessons are booked via my WEBSITE. My Italki calendar reflects the remaining slots available.
teacher_info.about_teacher: For me, learning a language is all about CONFIDENCE. This is usually the key issue for students, along with the fact that no one ever corrects your errors! I love to supply my own material, from INSIGHTFUL 2022 conversation topics, my own B. English EBOOKS, articles to discuss, and more. I like to create a FRIENDLY, relaxed atmosphere where we can get to know each other, and share humour as well as learning! This isn't a classroom. You're not a student (you're a person!). Don't call me 'teacher' - my name is David! I look forward to meeting you and getting to know you!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
They aren't lessons. They're calls. I will send you examples of material for our calls beforehand. This could include - 

- My Business English Ebooks with over 100 conversational lesson plans, on behavioural topics, and post-pandemic issues such as REMOTE working and GENDER equality.
- Job interview questions and guidance
- Advanced 2022 topics for discussion
- Complex articles and videos from various websites for discussion

You are of course WELCOME to provide your own material! I LOVE that!

Throughout our lessons I will correct errors, recommend more suitable vocabulary, idioms, phrasal verbs and collocations, and give you recommendations on how to improve confidence in conversation.
teacher_info.cancel_policy: Please note that if a lesson is cancelled with less than 24 hours notice or the student does not attend, no refund or reschedule will be offered.

exp_info.job: HR Business Partner and other roles - Stores
exp_info.description: For many years I was a HR Business Partner with Tesco, a large retailer in the UK. Much of my role entailed the same attributes necessary as a teacher, including listening, supporting, motivating and coaching others in an empathetic manner. My role also had an emphasis on management interviews, coaching & development, recruitment, building capability and more!

I run a Youtube channel, website and blog relating to travel, becoming a Digital Nomad and teaching online. I have also written Ebooks and consulted new teachers and am currently pursuing photography.

In addition to teaching on Italki, I also offer (mainly) Business English lessons via my website to students who I source from social media, my YouTube channel and by approaching Russian companies who express an interest in me supporting their employees.

I have been teaching on Italki since 2017. It's a great platform which has allowed me to get to know so many people from around the world and learn about new cultures. In addition, I thoroughly enjoy witnessing students' progression. Most of my students on Italki are Business English focused and reside in Russian-speaking countries.

course_info.trial_description:
A trial lesson is structured as follows - 

10 mins - Speaking - You can tell me all about you. This allows me to judge your level of English. Talk about your job, family, hometown and particularly about your English - what is your motivation for using Italki? I will ask you questions throughout.

10 mins - Listening - I will tell you all about me. You can then ask me some questions so I can judge your listening skills.

10 mins - Describing lesson material used. It's important that we work together here as every student is different. Discuss if you prefer structured lessons with lesson material sent to you, or more relaxed lessons. I will describe my availability and how I work as a teacher! You can ask any questions throughout. It's all about being relaxed and natural!

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS or GENERAL CONVERSATION & Confidence Building using Planned Conversation topics
pro_course_detail.description:
Are you preparing for an IELTS exam? Would you like to have General Conversation with a native speaker? Perhaps your confidence is your main issue? Do you want someone to correct your errors and coach on you how to speak English in reality, rather than from a textbook?

In terms of IELTS, we will generally focus on SPEAKING and WRITING. We can firstly cover some general topics to build your confidence before tackling some mock exam topics. Throughout, you will be provided with feedback and recommendations. We can cover any specific grammar issues in more detail.

For General Conversation, we can either do it with a plan/structure, or without! I have an immense catalogue of conversation topics ranging from more simple ones, to complex/advanced topics. Many of these topics are up-to-date and current, such as issues relating to Remote Working and the pandemic. You are, of course, more than welcome to bring your own topics to the table!

pro_course_detail.title: BUSINESS ENGLISH - including IT, Digital Marketing, Sales, HRBP
pro_course_detail.description:
This course incorporates anything relevant to Business English as follows - 
 
- Use of my eBook - Business English through Coaching and Conversation
- Reading and Writing E-mails
- Business Phrasal Verbs & Idioms
- How to conduct yourself in meetings
- The language used in meetings
- How to influence colleagues and deliver a task using Business English

Due to my HR background, I generally focus more on behavioural aspects, however I have had many students working in IT, Digital Marketing, Sales and so on, so if you would like a more technical approach, let me know!

pro_course_detail.title: PRONUNCIATION
pro_course_detail.description: In this course we will primarily read articles while focusing on British English Pronunciation in detail, particularly Southern English accents such as Recieved Pronunciation, Estuary English, Cockney and South West. While reading, we will discuss and practice particular sounds in detail, from schwa sounds, glottal stops and more. We can take turns reading in order for you to mimic my pronciation. We can also mix things up a bit simply by speaking about a topic and focusing on pronunciation!

pro_course_detail.title: PROOFREADING - Academic texts, Business E-mails, Social Media posts, Essays, Texting
pro_course_detail.description:
If you're fine with speaking, reading and listening, but just want to improve at general writing, work e-mails, instagram captions, essays, work for University or even texting on Whatsapp, you can book this lesson. This doesn't have to include a face to face lesson on Skype. Just send me a Google Docs document and I can correct the text and write a short summary of points to work on (alternatively, we can have a call to discuss or go through it together).

Obviously the length and complexity of the text will influence the length of time it will take me, so we can discuss beforehand which lesson length you should book.

Generally, if it's a few emails or instagram posts, the 30 minute lesson should suffice.
Anything longer (such as an essay) will likely take the full 60 minutes.
University work or more academic texts can take up to 90 minutes

pro_course_detail.title: JOB INTERVIEW PREPARATION (IT, HR, Marketing, FAANG companies and more!)
pro_course_detail.description: In these lessons, we can focus on technical and behavioural interview practice. We may also focus on business discussion to build your vocab and speaking confidence. We can also focus on points such as the STAR technique, how to focus on your soft skills, and FAANG interviews (FB, Amazon, Apple, Netflix, Google).

pro_course_detail.title: LONG TERM STUDENT DISCOUNT *once you have completed 10 lessons*
pro_course_detail.description:
This package is especially for long-term students, ie ones who have completed 10 lessons. After your 10th lesson, you can benefit from a lower price....for life!

This applies to any type of lesson. I am all about long-term students... building a relationship is so important!

Note that is is available to C1 and C2 students but Italki there is no option to select these levels.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi Everyone! Would you like to practice your Korean with a native speaker? Do you want to start learning Korean with a Korean tutor? Then I can help you with that!

My name is Suhyun and I'm a native Korean speaker. Currently, I am studying at Hankuk University of Foreign Studies for a master's degree in Korean language education as a foreign language.

I love learning languages so I really understand how enjoyable and difficult it can be at the same time. I want to share my experiences with my students. I’m a very patient and easy-going person. I try to make my students feel comfortable and have fun during classes.

teacher_info.about_me:
Hi Everyone! Would you like to practice your Korean with a native speaker? Do you want to start learning Korean with a Korean tutor? Then I can help you with that!

My name is Suhyun and I'm a native Korean speaker. Currently, I am studying at Hankuk University of Foreign Studies for a master's degree in Korean language education as a foreign language.

I love learning languages so I really understand how enjoyable and difficult it can be at the same time. I want to share my experiences with my students. I’m a very patient and easy-going person. I try to make my students feel comfortable and have fun during classes.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I completed a 120-hour teacher training program of Korean language for foreigners and started teaching Korean online since 2019. Also, I got a certificate in Teaching Korean in 2021.
 
Students who learn Korean inspire me a lot. I really enjoy helping them with their Korean and achieving their goals. I think it is very important for students to speak Korean as much as possible during classes. So I will give them enough chances to speak and offer proper methods and corrections.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lessons are open to every level of learners. I tailor my class for each student’s individual needs.
 
For beginners I will use my learning material and specific books. For intermediate or advanced learners we can talk about many different topics. I offer verbal and written corrections and new vocabulary every class so that you can review it afterwards.
If you are interested in my class, please book a trial lesson to see my teaching style and discuss your learning goal. I look forward to our first lesson! See you soon.

course_info.trial_description: This is a trial lesson for new students. Please let me know your goals for learning Korean and your current Korean level after booking this class.

pro_course_detail.title: 📝 Korean for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
* Specialized in beginner classes. Classes are conducted with materials produced by myself by referring to various textbooks. 

*The Beginner Course consists of a total of 16 chapters, and each chapter takes about 2-3 hours. 

*Once you complete the Beginner Course, you will be able to communicate in basic Korean and will gain confidence in Korean, too.

* Provide homework for each class if a student wants.

* The goal of all classes is to be able to use Korean easily in your everyday life.

* I do not teach vocabulary or grammar that Koreans do not use frequently. I will teach you practical Korean that you can use right now.

*If you are an absolute beginner, we will start from learning Hangul (Korean alphabet). 

😊 Let's study Korean together in a comfortable atmosphere! I can be a Korean teacher and a Korean friend at the same time.

pro_course_detail.title: 💭 Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
★★★ It's not a grammar lesson :) Please choose this lesson to practice your speaking skill.

* This course is based on a conversation. We can talk about your daily life or a variety of topics. If you have any specific topics you want to talk about, please let me know in advance.
 
* During class, I type corrections of what you are saying so you can see the correct way to express your ideas in Korean. I show you alternative ways to express your ideas, as well.

* I help with pronunciation and vocabulary on the topics we discuss in a comfortable environment.
 
* After this course, you will be able to become more confident speaking in Korean and building up your vocabulary, expressions, and pronunciation.

pro_course_detail.title: Only for old students who started before July 2021
pro_course_detail.description:
- This is only for old students who started lessons with me before July 2021.
- If you are a new student, please book 'Korean for Beginners' or 'Conversational Practice'.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
Various methodologies are deployed in my class here are some examples:

Direct method:
For the direct method, all teaching is done in the target language, translations are not allowed in class, and the focus lies heavily on speaking instead of grammar. This makes the direct method a very student-centred strategy that has gained popularity in recent years.

Communicative language teaching method:
Communicative language teaching is perhaps the most popular approach among the methods of teaching ESL today. CLT emphasises the students’ ability to communicate in real-life contexts, and students learn to make requests, accept offers, explain things, and express their feelings and preferences.

pro_course_detail.title: English Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Hi! I am a native English speaker (Canadian) with a neutral accent, which will be useful during our informal tutoring classes based on conversation practice. This type of lesson is best for students that can hold a conversation and who are looking to improve their English skills, developing a better language learning experience. We can discuss various topics, such as musicians, ethics, business, and many other subjects, tailoring the lessons to your specific needs and areas you would like to improve. Corrections and feedback with regards to vocabulary and pronunciation will be a part of the classes in the hopes of improving your fluency and understanding your strengths and weaknesses. 

Please feel free to message me if there is a specific topic you would enjoy talking about, or to ask me any questions you may have.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn English through Grammar!
pro_course_detail.description: Learn English a different way. Learn it through learning English grammar. Learn modal verbs, prepositions, Verb tenses, and conditionals.

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS, TOEFL, and CELPIP Test Preparation
pro_course_detail.description: Hello are you looking to gain you permanent residency. I can help you prepare for all sections of the IELTS or the TOEFL. This includes speaking, writing, listening and reading.

pro_course_detail.title: Lessons for Kids
pro_course_detail.description:
A course centred around your child's needs, interests and preferred learning style. We can interpret articles together, create stories or give a presentation about our favourite things; the possibilities are endless!  

Please book a trial session so that we can get to know each other and I can get a base understanding of level and interests so that learning can be personalised.

The aim of my lessons are to be welcoming, engaging and to make your child feel more confident to express themselves in English.

pro_course_detail.title: Business English
pro_course_detail.description:
I use books, online material, and personal experience for these classes. You will learn business vocabulary, including idioms, phrasal verbs, and abbreviations. We can discuss accounting, advertising, human resources, information technology, project management, and other business areas. We can do role plays based on case studies. 

I can help you write or review your cover letter, resume, or even your business plan. We can also practice interview questions.

teacher_info.intro:
Me llamo Sofia, tengo 21 años, soy de un pequeño pueblo de Colombia y soy una estudiante de psicología apasionada por enseñar y aprender de las diferentes personas y sus culturas.
Me gusta mucho el deporte, los libros y las películas.
teacher_info.about_me:
Me llamo Sofia, tengo 21 años, soy de un pequeño pueblo de Colombia y soy una estudiante de psicología apasionada por enseñar y aprender de las diferentes personas y sus culturas.
Me gusta mucho el deporte, los libros y las películas.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Me caracterizo por ser muy paciente, comprensiva y carismática para dar mis clases. Me encanta enseñar a personas de diferentes edades y países. Mis clases son muy dinámicas y divertidas.
Conmigo aprenderás sobre gramática, vocabulario y pronunciación, además tendremos conversaciones sobre diferentes temas para que puedas mejorar tu español.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Mis clases se basan en enseñar de manera didáctica la gramática, vocabulario, pronunciación y tener conversaciones donde puedas practicar el español por medio de  fichas didácticas, imágenes, videos, noticas y presentación de diapositivas.

course_info.trial_description: Con esta clase de prueba nos conoceremos, me contaras cuales son tus intereses, tu nivel de español y que te gustaría aprender conmigo.

pro_course_detail.title: Improve pronunciation and learn vocabulary
pro_course_detail.description: Con esta clase podrás mejorar tu pronunciación, aprender mucho vocabulario con ejercicios prácticos y practica de conversaciones sobren cualquier tema. Además aprenderás de una manera divertida con canciones, videos y diapositivas.

pro_course_detail.title: Practice conversations
pro_course_detail.description: Podremos practicar conversaciones sobre cualquier tema para mejorar tu español y puedas adquirir habilidades de fluidez, confianza y manejar un amplio vocabulario.

teacher_info.intro:
Je m'appelle Guemo kenfack kevin je suis ètudiant professeur et j'aime la lecture . Pendant mes moments de loisir j'aime suivre de la musique , visionner des films ou series et parfois jouer aux jeux vidèo.

 My name is Guemo kenfack kevin I am a student teacher and I love reading. During my free time I like to listen to music, watch movies or series and sometimes play video games.
teacher_info.short_signature: professeur certifié avec trois ans d'expérience, adultes ⭐ jeunes ⭐ enfants ⭐ préparation d'examens
teacher_info.about_me:
Je m'appelle Guemo kenfack kevin je suis ètudiant professeur et j'aime la lecture . Pendant mes moments de loisir j'aime suivre de la musique , visionner des films ou series et parfois jouer aux jeux vidèo.

 My name is Guemo kenfack kevin I am a student teacher and I love reading. During my free time I like to listen to music, watch movies or series and sometimes play video games.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Je suis enseignant de français sa fait déjà trois ans, je connais les moyens et méthodes à utiliser pour permettre à l'étudiant de facilement s'améliorer. Durant mes cours je suis patient, calme, attentif, amusant et toujours a l'écoute des étudiants.


I have been teaching French for three years now, I know the means and methods to use to allow the student to easily improve. During my classes I am patient, calm, attentive, fun and always attentive to the students.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Mes méthodes seront centrés  sur les objectifs de l'étudiant , la prononciation des mots,les discussions, nous pouvons parler d'actualité et tout autre sujet afin de permettre à l'étudiantde se familiariséavec le françaiset de l'améliorer. Chaque début de leçon nous allons faire la répétition de la séance passé pour permettre à l'étudiant de vite s'améliorer .

My methods will be centered on the student's objectives, the pronunciation of words, discussions, we can talk about current affairs and any other subject in order to allow the student to become familiar with French and to improve it. Each beginning of the lesson we will repeat the previous session to allow the student to improve quick

course_info.trial_description: Mes leçons seront focalisés sur les objectifs de l'étudiant par exemple nous pouvons commencer par  la pronunciation,  la grammaire,  des discussions.  Nous pouvons aussi nous focaliser sur des textes et des petits exercices pour permettre à l'étudiant de facilement apprendre . Ne vous faites pas de soucis avec moi car je suis patient, sympa et calme à mes cours

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation pratique (pronunciation, lecture, grammaire)
pro_course_detail.description: Nous pouvons parler de nous ,nos relations avec notre entourage ou le milieu où nous vivons,  de ce vous aimer faire ou ne pas faire , de votre lieu de service ou travail, d'actualité et du climat.  Vous pouvez causer avec moi sur n'importe quoi car cella vous permettra d'améliorer votre français.

pro_course_detail.title: basic french for a beginner
pro_course_detail.description:
nous pouvons commencer par la présentation, la prononciation ,comment écrire, épeler les mots et les chiffres. nous pouvons aussi épeler et écrire les objets autour de nous par exemple sceau .

we can start with presentation, pronunciation, how to write, spell;words and numbers. we can also spell and write the objects around us for example seal.

I'm passionate about history, literature, philosophy, and sports. I love to write.  I am interested in learning about other cultures.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
He hecho oratoria desde hace diez años, para lo cual me he capacitado para hablar en público y redactar discursos. He tomado cursos para mejorar mi redacción. Por haber estudiado Derecho tengo conocimientos en inglés jurídico. Me encanta enseñar y compartir los conocimientos que he aprendido. 

I have been doing public speaking for ten years, for which I have trained in oral expression techniques and speech writing. I have taken courses to improve my writing skills. Having studied law, I have knowledge in legal English. I love to teach and share the knowledge I have learned.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
En primer lugar se establecerán las metas y objetivos del estudiante para adaptar el material de apoyo a sus necesidades. Se implementaran actividades para mejorar la pronunciación, expresión oral, redacción y entendimiento del idioma. Se apoyará para tener conversaciones más fluidas ya sea en el ámbito laboral o cotidiano. 

First of all, the student's goals and objectives will be established in order to adapt the support material to his or her needs. Support material will be implemented to improve pronunciation, oral expression, writing and understanding of the language. Support will be provided in order to have more fluent conversations, whether in the workplace or in everyday life.

course_info.trial_description:
¡Clase Prueba! 

La clase prueba tendrá cuatro objetivos principales: 

1. Conocerte a ti y tu nivel de español. 
2. Conocer tus metas y objetivos con el idioma. 
3. Tener la posibilidad de mostrarte mi forma de trabajo y método para enseñar. 
4. Proponerte un plan de estudio conforme a tus necesidades. 

¡Espero verte pronto en mi clase! 

Trial Class! 

The trial class will have four main objectives: 

1. Getting to know you and your level of Spanish. 
2. To get to know your goals and objectives with the language. 
3. To have the possibility to show you my way of working and teaching method. 
4. To propose a study plan according to your needs. 

I hope to see you soon in my class!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversación en Español /
pro_course_detail.description:
El objetivo de este tipo de clase será desarrollar tus habilidades para conversar en español, ya sea en un ambiente laboral o casual, tomando en cuenta tu nivel de idioma actual y con un plan de estudio estructurado. Podré ayudarte a desenvolverte mejor y a tener más seguridad al momento de hablar en español a través diversas técnicas de oratoria. 

La idea es que  la clase sea en un ambiente cómodo para ti, por lo que siempre buscaré ajustarla a tus intereses y objetivos.   Las actividades que se llevarán acabo serán en su mayoría de tipo prácticas pues ¡la práctica hace al maestro! 


The objective of this type of class will be to develop your speaking skills in Spanish, whether in a business or casual environment, taking into account your current language level and with a structured program. I will be able to help you to become more confident in speaking Spanish through various public speaking techniques. 

The idea is that the class will be in a relaxed and comfortable environment for you, so I will always try to adjust it to your interests and objectives. The activities that will be carried out will be mostly practical, because practice makes perfect!

pro_course_detail.title: Español para principiantes (Apto para niños) / Spanish for beginners (Suitable for children)
pro_course_detail.description:
¡Aprender español nunca fue tan fácil! 

En este curso me enfocaré en desarrollar tus habilidades de comunicación en el idioma español. Las clases estarán enfocadas en cuatro rubros: pronunciación, redacción, comprensión lectora y conversación. 

Ajustaré las actividades  conforme a tus necesidades y objetivo,s y buscaré formularlas atendiendo a tus intereses para lograr que el idioma te resulte más sencillo. 

Learning Spanish has never been easier! 

In this course I will focus on developing your communication skills in the Spanish language. The classes will focus on four areas: pronunciation, writing, reading and conversation. 

I will adjust the activities according to your needs and objectives and I will try to formulate them according to your interests in order to make the language easier for you.

pro_course_detail.title: ¡Corrección de Textos! - Text Correction!
pro_course_detail.description:
A través de esta sesión te ayudaré a revisar y corregir el texto que quieras, ya sea para el trabajo, escuela o cuestiones personales. La sesión no es vía videollamada sino que me deberás enviar el texto por e-mail y realizaré las correcciones necesarias. Máximo 3 cuartillas por 30 minutos y 6 cuartillas por 1 hora. 

Through this session, I will help you to revise and correct the text you want, whether it is for work, school, or personal matters. The session is not via video call, you will have to send me the text by e-mail and I will make the necessary corrections. Maximum 3 pages per 30 minutes and 6 pages per 1 hour.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Professeur de français depuis plus d'un an, reconnu comme le meilleur professeur de l'année au Mexique au sein de l’académie européenne.
J’adore le fait d'enseigner les langues car c'est une façon de redonner aux autres ce qu'ils m'ont appris.
Je suis très patient et progresser ensemble est ce qui me motive.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
TU choisis les thèmes de conversation en lien avec tes centres d’intérêts. 
TU décides de l'aspect que tu souhaites travailler en priorité (compréhension orale, écrite, production orale, écrite).
NOUS définirons ensemble tes besoins en français. 
NOUS progresserons dans un ambiance agréable.

course_info.trial_description: A trial lesson where you can practice your French by having a conversation with me about the subject that you want ! 🎯 Also, we will determine your goals, strengths and weaknesses in French.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation in Basic French 🗣🍷 / Pratique de la conversation
pro_course_detail.description:
You will choose the subject of the conversation ! I will be here to correct your pronunciation, your grammar and to give you some tips.
This will help you to speak as a French native speaker.
All this in an informal atmosphere.

teacher_info.intro:
✔ Speak Spanish with confidence, fluency, and accuracy! I’m a Certified Teacher, Systems Engineer, and a native Spanish speaker, with whom you can improve and develop your Spanish/English skills with productive and interesting sessions tailored to your needs.

With me, you can study all the aspects of the Spanish/English language (grammar, lexis, phonetics, functions, language skills) or you can practice your spoken Spanish/English. For conversational sessions, I offer a wide variety of subjects, all of them well structured. 

As a teacher, I love to teach in a structured way, step by step, and with clear aims. As a System Engineer, I love programming, networks, cybersecurity, and more.
teacher_info.short_signature: ✔ Certified Teacher and Systems Engineer with over 8 years of teaching experience.
teacher_info.introduction:
Thanks for to visit my profile. Spanish and English learners of all levels are welcome.

As a certified teacher for teaching, I have experience in language and background to language learning and teaching. I also have experience and knowledge about lesson planning and use of resources for language teaching. 

I've been teaching in classrooms for years and I know that there are many learning styles that the learners can have, that's why I adapt my teaching at the characteristics of learner's learning style.

I've been teaching to individual, small and large groups of students with different level of knowledge, for this reason, I'm very patient and collaborative in my classes.

I also have a bachelor degree in Computer Science and Technology, so I have wide experience on this topics because I've been working for many years in this area too. If you need to learn technical language and vocabulary about Computer Science and Technology, I can help you gladly. Just let me know.

Do you want to speak with confidence and fluency? Do you want to speak real Spanish?
Put your knowledge in action speaking real Spanish with this course: "¡LET’S SPEAK SPANISH NOW! Conversational sessions and communicative activities for all levels"
(For more information visit the link with the name of this course in the section "Professional Lessons" that is below)

Learners of all levels are always welcome. Book your trial session now and let's get started!

CURSOS Y SESIONES  DE INGLES:
-------------------------------------------------------
Si lo que buscas es mejorar tu INGLES HABLADO y ser comprendido en cuanto a tus posibles debilidades al expresarte en ingles, entonces te invito a mis sesiones y cursos estructurados de INGLES. Practiquemos ingles desde la primera sesión y aclaremos tus dudas de una forma práctica y amena. Tengo interesantes ACTIVIDADES COMUNICATIVAS con las cuales podrás poner en práctica tus habilidades lingüísticas del ingles (Listening, reading, writing and speaking).

During this lesson, we might assess your language skills for advising you on the best lesson plan.

Durante esta lección, podríamos evaluar sus habilidades lingüísticas para aconsejarle sobre el mejor plan de lecciones.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish from Scratch: For newbies
pro_course_detail.description:
Start speaking right away with this course. This course has clear aims for each lesson, and you’ll see them in the lesson plan that I’m going to give you at the beginning of the course.

Each lesson contains preliminary instructions, lesson notes, vocabulary, an audio file, and homework all focused on each lesson's aims. So, it means that at the end of each lesson you'll have all the material with which you can practice and reinforce your learning out of class.

The methodology of this course is progressive in complexity. The key of this course is the interaction, immediate support, and feedback that you will receive from me. In each session, I'm going to guide you when you want to try to express your ideas in Spanish.

In each lesson, we're going to practice all the language skills (listening, reading, writing, and speaking). So, I'm going to encourage you to speak in Spanish since the first class. 

So, let's begin to speak in Spanish now!

✔ Audio files
✔ Productive interaction
✔ Quizzes
✔ PDF notes for each session

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Spanish Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description:
Conversational and communicative activities for advanced, intermediate, and beginners Spanish learners. If you want to book a class after the limit allowed for booking a class, just let me know. I'm going to send you a lesson invitation that allows you to schedule a lesson 15 minutes before the start time. 

Let's speak Spanish now!

pro_course_detail.title: Informal English Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description:
Conversational and communicative activities for advanced, intermediate, and beginners English learners.

Actividades conversacionales y comunicativas para estudiantes de ingles avanzados, intermedios y principiantes.

pro_course_detail.title: Services: Spanish proofreading and interpretation/translation (Essays, scripts, and others) / Transcription (Audios or Videos in Spanish) from $us. 10 (Services without having a Skype videocall)
pro_course_detail.description:
SERVICE  #1: Spanish proofreading and interpretation/translation (Essays, scripts, and others)

If you need to proofread your writing text written in Spanish or to interpret/translate a text into Spanish without having a Skype session, please book the session according to the number of words:

Under to 700 words ==> 30 min/lesson
Under to 1000 words ==> 45 min/lesson
Under to 1300 words ==> 60 min/lesson
Under to 1600 words ==> 90 min/lesson

You can copy your text in the message box after booking, or you can send me your file to my email because my Skype ID account is my Hotmail email as well. At the date of the session, I'm going to send you your text proofread and corrected or interpreted into Spanish at the end of the booked lesson, so, you can check it. After it, you can mark our lesson as completed. If you need your text before your booking date, just let me know.

SERVICE  #2: Transcription (Audios/Videos)

If you need audio or video transcription without having a Skype session, please book the session according to the duration of the audio or video:

Video/audio in Spanish under to 5 minutes ==> 30 min/lesson
Video/audio in Spanish under to 10 minutes ==> 45 min/lesson
Video/audio in Spanish under to 15 minutes ==> 60 min/lesson
Video/audio in Spanish under to 20 minutes ==> 90 min/lesson

After your booking, I’m going to accept your request immediately and you will be able to send me your audio file, or video file by Skype; or even you can send the link to your video or audio (Youtube, SoundCloud, Drive, etc.). That’s up to you. At the date of the session, I'm going to send you the transcription in Spanish, so you can check it and confirm our lesson as completed.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish step by step: For beginners, intermediate and advanced learners
pro_course_detail.description:
Since every student's situation is different, I understand that the approach to tutoring must be individualized. One on One learning recognizes that there are factors that affect a student's ability to learn. Therefore, I begin the process of creating an individualized program by gathering as much information as possible regarding the student's academic and overall needs.

In this course, each lesson contains one dialogue, vocabulary, grammar point, exercises, a role play, and a complimentary activity (homework). During each session, you always will receive a PDF file with the lesson notes for that session.

Learners of all levels are encouraged to speak Spanish from the beginning, the sessions are specially customized to match the specific needs and requirements of every student, quality feedback, friendly and relaxed conversations between teacher and student.

✔ Audio files for each lesson
✔ Quizzes
✔ Productive interaction
✔ PDF notes for each session

Newbies, beginners, intermediate, and advanced learners this course is for you. Let’s begin!

pro_course_detail.title: Practical Conversational Spanish: For Intermediate Learners
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is focused on those who already know the fundamentals of the Spanish language clearly, and want to improve his or her confidence and Spanish conversational skills and become more fluent. For that reason, the sessions of this course are focused on developing the communicative skills the learner needs to communicate effectively in real-life situations. 

That’s why I’ve designed productive sessions with the most common communicative situations such as being at a store, asking for directions, making calls, and so on.

Each lesson includes:

   ✔ An audio file with a model conversation   
   ✔ Common Expressions
   ✔ Vocabulary  
   ✔ Communicative activities
   ✔ PDF Files

This course has clear aims for each session, and you’ll see them in the lesson plan that I’m going to send you at the beginning of the course.

Así que, ¡Hablemos en español ahora!

REQUIREMENTS: INTERMEDIATE STUDIES IN SPANISH REQUIRED.

pro_course_detail.title: ¡LET’S SPEAK SPANISH NOW! Conversational sessions and communicative activities for all levels & ORAL EXPRESSION IN SPANISH (For advanced learners)
pro_course_detail.description:
In this course, you have two options for choosing:

1. COMMUNICATIVE ACTIVITIES AND CONVERSATIONAL SESSIONS: All levels

Spanish language of every day, for learners of all levels. In this course, I prepare tailored Spanish conversational sessions through 'COMMUNICATIVE ACTIVITIES' and focus on conversation and language skills according to the student's needs. It includes quality feedback and materials for each session. ¡Hablemos en Español Ahora!

✔ Productive interaction
✔ Videos and audio files
✔ More than +120 different subjects for studying
✔ Lesson plans for each course

2 . ORAL EXPRESSION IN SPANISH (For advanced students): Speak with confidence and accuracy to your audience.

In these sessions, you’ll learn to use the appropriate register, expressions, and vocabulary for speaking to your audience. I’m going to help you with the correct pronunciation of your speech, and I’m going to help you with your doubts about the meaning of words and expressions that you aren’t sure about. So, it means that we’re going to focus on your topic that you need to speak in Spanish, that’s why the number of sessions will depend on the size and the characteristics of your subject. But at least I advise you two sessions because in one we’re going to check and talk about your topic and of course you will speak a lot about it. I’m going to give you feedback about how you are doing. And in the second session, we’re going to see if you have improved and corrected all the aspects that I’ve detected in the previous session.

These sessions are perfect for speaking on presentations, expositions, discourses, or if you want to speak about a specific topic with accuracy and fluency.

pro_course_detail.title: Communicative Activities for Intermediate/Advanced English Learners (PET/CAE)
pro_course_detail.description:
PET Course
-----------------
This course provides intermediate English learners with useful, enjoyable preparation, and practice for the exam PET (Preliminary English Test of Cambridge). It's suitable for intermediate English learners that are looking to improve their English communicative skills too. So, it's not necessary that you're preparing for taking this test (PET) for to take this course. There are many activities for this course and each activity is designed to provide lively and interesting lesson material with an emphasis on communicative language learning. Each activity is designed to take a complete lesson of between 60 minutes. You'll practice all your skills (Listening, Writing, Reading, and Speaking).

Let's develop your English skills with these funny and interesting communicative activities.

CAE Course
-----------------
English language of every day, for advanced learners. In this course, I prepare tailored Spanish conversational sessions through 'COMMUNICATIVE ACTIVITIES' and focus on conversation and language skills according to the student's needs. It includes quality feedback and materials for each session. Let's speak English now!

pro_course_detail.title: English from Scratch: For Newbies/Ingles desde cero: Para principiantes
pro_course_detail.description:
Empieza a hablar inglés enseguida con este curso. Este curso tiene objetivos claros para cada lección y los verás en el plan de lecciones que voy a darte al principio del curso.

Cada lección contiene instrucciones preliminares, notas de la lección, vocabulario, un archivo de audio (con la conversación a estudiar) y una tarea; todos enfocados en los objetivos de cada lección. Por lo tanto, eso significa que al final de cada lección tendrás todo el material con el que puedes practicar y reforzar tu aprendizaje fuera de clase.

La metodología de este curso es progresiva en complejidad. La clave de este curso es la interacción, el apoyo inmediato y la retroalimentación que recibirás constantemente de mí. En cada sesión, te voy a guiar cuando quieras expresar tus ideas en ingles.

En cada lección, vamos a practicar todas las habilidades del lenguaje (escuchar, leer, escribir y hablar). Por lo tanto, voy a animarte a hablar en inglés desde la primera clase.

¡Comencemos a estudiar inglés desde ahora!

✔ Plan de lecciones
✔ Archivos de audio con conversaciones
✔ Interacción productiva
✔ Practica para fuera de clase
✔ Archivos PDF para cada lección

pro_course_detail.title: Practical English for Travelers / Inglés Práctico para Viajeros
pro_course_detail.description:
Este curso está dirigido a aquellos que están planeando viajar por un país de habla inglesa y quieren mejorar rápidamente sus conocimientos básicos de ingles. Las sesiones se centran en desarrollar las habilidades comunicativas que el viajero necesitará durante el viaje, para que pueda comunicarse eficientemente en situaciones de la vida real.

Cada lección incluye:
  1. Archivos PDF 
  2. Vocabulario
  3. Expresiones comunes
  4. Practicas visuales
  5. Juego de roles
  6. Audio de ejemplo situacional

¡Pongamos en práctica tu ingles!

pro_course_detail.title: First Certificate in English (FCE) - Preparation course for intermediate English learners
pro_course_detail.description:
This course helps learners become aware of FCE exam requirements, offers details about the format and language in the exam, and helps candidates develop exam skills necessary for success.

I've taken this exam. So, I know how it is, this means that I have real experience, and for this reason, I can give you the best tips about it.

You'll be practicing reading, use of English, writing, listening, and speaking. The lessons include:

✔ Productive interaction.
✔ Audio files.
✔ Lesson notes.
✔ Worksheets.

pro_course_detail.title: English Step by Step: For Upper Intermediate English Learners
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is focused on the essential topics of the English language for upper-intermediate learners, and it has 10 Lessons. In each lesson, you’ll study a specific subject with clear aims. In this course, each lesson contains a dialogue (audio-file), vocabulary, grammar point, speaking practice, exercises, and a complimentary activity (homework). During each session, you will always receive a PDF file with the lesson notes for that session. So, you’ll be practicing your four language skills constantly (Listening, reading, speaking, and writing). In this course, the learner is encouraged to speak English from the beginning, the sessions have quality feedback, friendly and relaxed conversations between the teacher and the student.

Each lesson includes:

   ✔ Vocabulary     
   ✔ Reading activity
   ✔ Listening activity (An audio file with a model conversation)
   ✔ A grammar point
   ✔ Writing activity
   ✔ Speaking activity
   ✔ Vocabulary phrase usage
   ✔ PDF Files

This course has clear aims for each session, and you’ll see them in the lesson plan that I’m going to give you at the beginning of the course.

So, let's speak English now!

REQUIREMENTS:

BASIC AND LOWER INTERMEDIATE STUDIES IN ENGLISH REQUIRED

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I think conversations are the best way to teach and learn another language.  I like to go with the flow, and want you to feel at ease while talking.  I understand that not every student is on the same level, so I will adjust my pace of speaking to match your level. All of my classes are conversation based. 

If interested in grammar, please know, instead of teaching specific grammar rules or terms, I have focused classes on a certain grammar subjects. For example, if you are struggling with the past tense, I will ask questions specific to the past tense. This will get you thinking, talking and using the past tense. This will give you better practice with context and meaning.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I am here to listen and help you on your English learning journey. If you have a topic you want to talk about, we will do that. If you want more structure for conversations, I can send you an article/short story to read, then we can discuss that article during class. If you would like to work on listening skills, I can send you a video to watch, then we will discuss that during the next class. I am open and ready for our next conversation. 

I offer crosstalk for native Spanish speakers. Please look at my class page for more information on what crosstalk is and how it can help you! Cross talk can be a great way to learn if you are a beginner or completely new to English.

course_info.trial_description: In this trail lesson we will go over what you are looking for in conversation practice. We can use this as a get to know you session and see where you would like to take our future conversations together! Can't wait to meet you!

pro_course_detail.title: Crosstalk for Beginners (Spanish natives learning English)
pro_course_detail.description:
What is the crosstalk method? 

Crosstalk is a great way to learn another language. Crosstalk is a method of communicating with each other through pictures, drawings and guestures.

What will we do in class? 

I will speak in English the whole time to tell you a story, or to have a conversation with you. You do not have to know any English for this method, you can simply talk to me in Spanish or use English if the words come to you. All you have to do is listen and follow along with the story I am telling you. 

Who is this class for? 

This crosstalk class is for native Spanish speakers wanting to learn English, or wanting to improve upon their English speaking skills. 

What will I gain or learn from this class? 

This class will give you a lot of English input. You will be practicing your listening skills and learning new vocabulary in a fun and natural way.

¿Qué es el método crosstalk? 

El método crosstalk es una forma estupenda de aprender otro idioma. El crosstalk es un método para comunicarse con los demás a través de imágenes, dibujos y gestos.

¿Qué haremos en clase? 

Hablaré en inglés todo el tiempo para contarte una historia, o para mantener una conversación contigo. No es necesario que sepas nada de inglés para este método, simplemente puedes hablarme en español o utilizar el inglés si te salen las palabras. Todo lo que tienes que hacer es escuchar y seguir la historia que te estoy contando. 

¿Para quién es esta clase? 

Esta clase de crosstalk es para hablantes nativos de español que quieran aprender inglés, o que quieran mejorar sus habilidades para hablar inglés. 

¿Qué ganaré o aprenderé en esta clase? 

Esta clase le proporcionará una gran cantidad de información en inglés. Practicarás tus habilidades de escucha y aprenderás nuevo vocabulario de una manera divertida y natural.

**Some classes might include a 5 min break**

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's chat! Conversation practice is a great way to learn another language. We can talk about any topic you would like, I can come up with a topic, or we can simply just chit-chat. I enjoy having organic conversations, as this is the most natural way to practice speaking. 

In this class you will also have the opportunity to practice your speaking, pronunciation, listening and comprehension skills. I will adjust my questions, responses and pace of speaking to match or meet your level of English.

**Some classes might include a 5 min break**

Speaking and listening are still the #1 focus. 

Why do I recommend a textbook?  
✅A GUIDE: A textbook gives you a well-structured guide to improve your English.  
✅A STUDY RESOURCE: You can review and study the book.  
✅RELIABLE: I choose books from the best publishers in English language textbooks. These books match your level with appropriate vocabulary, listening speed, and so on.

➨ Lesson Plan:

2. Homework check: Optional. If I assigned homework, I will check the answers with you.
3. Textbook time: Study the textbook and other materials such as Powerpoint, listening, and worksheets.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation and grammar for beginners（にちじょうかいわができるようになろう！）
pro_course_detail.description:
このレッスンでは初級者のための会話を文法や語彙を学びながら勉強します。
テキストを使って文法を学んだり、シチュエーショントークをして会話を学びます。
日常的な簡単なやりとりが出来ることを目標に日本語を話しましょう！

For Beginners:
In these lessons, you will study beginner conversation while learning grammar and vocabulary.  I will teach based on a textbook. I will use “minano nionngo,GENKI,Irodori“ for beginners. 

For Intermediates: 
I will use “Marugoto”. 
If you have another textbook, please let me know. 
You will study basic Japanese grammar, and you will be able to speak in daily conversation.

✳︎Cancellation policy✳︎
As stated in the italki lesson policy, in case of no show or cancellation with less than 24 hour-notice, the lesson price will be charged in full. No make up lesson for the time lost.

pro_course_detail.title: Practice for Job-Hunting Interviews!！（就職活動のための面接を練習しよう）
pro_course_detail.description:
※このレッスンは中級者・上級者向けレッスンです

就職活動における面接の練習を行いましょう！
日本で就職活動中の留学生の皆さん、日本企業への転職を考えている社会人の皆さん！面接がうまくいなかいなとお悩みではありませんか？
日本での企業で面接官の経験のある私と一緒に面接練習をしませんか？就職面接にはコツが必要です！自分のことをわかりやすく話すコツをつかみましょう！

・希望があればエントリーシート＆履歴書を添削します
・レッスンでは模擬面接＆修正＆フィードバックを行います
・様々な質問をこちらで用意します。たくさんの質問に答えて本番で落ち着いて話ができるように練習しましょう。
※面接練習は模擬面接➕フィードバッグがあるため、６０分もしくは９０分をおすすめします。


※FOR INTERMEDIATE AND ADVANCED STUDENTS
International students who are looking for a job in Japan or working people who are thinking about joining a Japanese company! Are you worried about your interview not going well? 
Job interviews require tips! Let's practice communicating about yourself in an easy-to-understand manner. If you wish, I will correct your Japanese application and resume.


・ In these lessons, we will have a mock interviews and feedback. 
 ・I will prepare various questions and you will practice how to answer a lot of questions, so you can talk calmly in job interviews. 

*For interview practice, I recommend 60 minutes or 90 minutes since it will include a mock interview and feedback. 


✳︎Cancellation policy✳︎
As stated in the italki lesson policy, in case of no show or cancellation with less than 24 hour-notice, the lesson price will be charged in full. No make up lesson for the time lost.

pro_course_detail.title: Let's work for a Japanese company!（日本の会社で働こう！）
pro_course_detail.description:
※このレッスンは中級者・上級者向けレッスンです
※FOR INTERMEDIATE AND ADVANCED STUDENTS

このレッスンでは日本企業で働くために必要なビジネスマナーやビジネス日本語を学びます。
敬語では、敬語の基本からビジネスにおける敬語までロールプレイや、実際のビジネスで使う日本語を動画などをみながら学びます。電話応対やビジネス文章など、みなさんの要望に応じたレッスンを行います。自信をもって日本企業で働きましょう！

I  would give you a recording after class,and you could read after it, for one hour every day,and the most important thing is that you could record your own voice ,and find out the difference between your voice and the recording,then correct you pronunciation,and then record your voice again .I'll help you seek out the difference and correct again in the next class .Keep doing this for two or three months,I believe you would make a great progress.
