teacher_info.intro:
A certified Japanese teacher who speaks fluent English and conversational German. I have 10+ years of academic experiences at Tokyo university working with and translating English and German texts, so I can explain how Japanese language works differently compared to English or German.

I love Japanese traditional Noh theater, horseback riding and reading manga.

I have taught Japanese to many friends and have 3 years of experience as a full-time English teacher. I’ve done many online lessons, too, so I know some tricks to make learning fun and keep you motivated :-)
teacher_info.short_signature: Learn Japanese with a Tokyo university graduate with 3 years of language teaching experience
teacher_info.about_me:
A certified Japanese teacher who speaks fluent English and conversational German. I have 10+ years of academic experiences at Tokyo university working with and translating English and German texts, so I can explain how Japanese language works differently compared to English or German.

I love Japanese traditional Noh theater, horseback riding and reading manga.

I have taught Japanese to many friends and have 3 years of experience as a full-time English teacher. I’ve done many online lessons, too, so I know some tricks to make learning fun and keep you motivated :-)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Why on earth do you need a real teacher to learn Japanese, when there are so many good free materials for Japanese learners out there (textbooks, apps, Youtube videos, etc.) ?

My answer is: to give you FEEDBACK.

I am here to give you feedback on what you are doing right so that you stay motivated as well as give you feedback on your mistakes so that you can improve!

All lessons will be personalized. In my trial lesson, we will introduce each other, discuss your goals and what you want from my lessons, and make future study plans together.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I currently offer five kinds of Japanese lessons:

1) General Japanese language lessons for beginners (using a textbook – Marugoto or Genki series).

2) Conversation lessons for intermediate to advanced students
- We will find out what your weaknesses are and work on them with a consistent plan, be it your grammar, vocabulary or pronunciation.

3) Pronunciation clinic (Pitch-accent, devoiced vowels, intonation etc.)
- This is an area that many Japanese teachers don’t spend nearly enough time on… but it’s super important.
I highly recommend this for students of all levels.

4) JLPT preparation course

5) Reading intensive course – using a book/manga/any articles of your choice.

cert_info.institution: 日本国際教育支援協会
cert_info.certificate: 日本語教育能力検定試験

course_info.trial_description:
In the trial lesson, we will talk about:
- your previous Japanese language/learning experiences
- your wishes and goals
- my recommendations for you to achieve your goals

We can do all this in Japanese, English or German. (Mein Deutsch ist doch gar nicht perfekt, also bitte ich um Ihre Verzeihung im Voraus.)

pro_course_detail.title: General Japanese Introduction Course for Beginners - using textbooks (Marugoto or Genki series)
pro_course_detail.description:
In this course, we will use textbooks as our basis but I will throw in many additional practices and explanations that are not in the textbooks to help your learning. I don't just follow the textbook and have you repeat after me the whole time - my goal is to help you learn to understand and say what is relevant to your own life!

I use Marugoto series as it has a lot of online materials to go with the book (which will be part of your homework materials. I will specify which ones to work on after each lesson).
If you already have Genki, we could use that, too.

For each level (A1 or A2 for example), you need 2 Marugoto books - "Rikai" and "Katsudou". Each book has about 20 lessons. The suggested length for one lesson is 120 minutes. In theory, we can cover all the materials for A1, for example, in 80 hours. But it all depends on your preference and how much time you are ready to devote outside of the class!

pro_course_detail.title: Pronunciation clinic (for all levels)
pro_course_detail.description:
If you have studied Japanese but not confident about your pronunciation, this is for you!

In this lesson, I will have you read some texts of your choice (preferably conversations from a textbook that you have worked with before), give you feedback and explain the logic behind the correct pronunciations.

Better pronunciation improves not only your confidence but also your chance of being understood correctly by native speakers. Some Japanese people, especially those who are not used to listening to Japanese spoken by non-native speakers (like my grandmother, aged 92), tolerate very little deviation from expected pronunciation. In some cases, it instantly makes them decide that they can't understand you and give up all effort to figure out what is being said.

If you would like to practice in systematic and comprehensive ways, we could use books like "Introduction to Japanese Pronunciation - Theory and Practice" (Haruo Kubozono and Shin'ichi Tanaka, 1999) or『日本語のイントネーションーしくみと音読・朗読への応用』(郡史郎、2020). The latter is for advanced learners on C1-C2 level.

I also recommend learners of all levels to use online resources on Japanese pronunciation for input. For example, a well-known Youtuber, Dogen, has wonderful detailed video materials explaining Japanese pronunciation in English on Youtube for free and also a lot more on a platform called Patreon (for $10 a month).

I hope to see you in class!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation course for intermediate to advanced students (with emphasis on feedback)
pro_course_detail.description:
In this course, we will talk about various topics relevant to your life and interests so that you can improve your vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation.
My focus is on giving you productive feedbacks so that you can improve your Japanese speaking ability.
I will keep track of what we cover in each lesson and give you little quizzes in the next lesson so that I can make sure that you see clear improvements (which is important to keep you motivated!).

For the sake of clear explanation and understanding, I would like to use English (or German) when difficulties arise, but if you want strictly all-Japanese lessons (without any use of English or other languages) that can be done. Let me know your preferences :-)

pro_course_detail.title: JLPT Preparation
pro_course_detail.description:
Studying for JLPT but feel somewhat stuck?
Would like to take it but don't know where to start?

Here's my offer: personalized consultations for you to overcome your weaknesses.

Everyone's problem is different, so my JLPT lessons are all personalized.
I normally give students assignments to work on before the lesson so that during the lesson we can concentrate on clarifying whatever problems and difficulties you encounter doing the assignment :-)
I usually use 新完全マスター series, but if you already have a different textbook that you would like to use (or you have been using), please let me know!

pro_course_detail.title: Reading intensive course – using a book/manga/any text of your choice
pro_course_detail.description:
If you have a book or manga you would like to read in Japanese, but not quite yet there to do it alone only with the help of dictionaries...

If you have a book or manga you would like to discuss in Japanese...

Here's my reading intensive course for you, where we read texts of your choice together.
Just let me know what you'd like to read and, if I don't already have the book, I'll go get a copy to read it with you :-) We could also read any online articles of your interest.

Ideally, I would have you read some assigned pages on your own before the lesson so that it's clear which parts you have problems with, but it all depends on how much time you can spend outside the course. If you prefer, we could read everything together, too!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Korean and English are very different languages. 
The way people say thing is different and the word order is also very different.
(In Korean, the verb comes last). 

For example, in English, we say "What are you talking about?"
But in Korean, we say "What kind of saying is it? (=무슨 말이에요?)"

Also, in English, we say "Happy birthday."
But in Korean, we say "Birthday congratulations (= 생일 축하해요)."

Example like these show just how different English and Korean are. 
If we literally translate English to Korean, it sound very unnatural. 
So, when we study Korean, memorizing natural Korean sentences is very important.

I will teach you how to make natural Korean sentences.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
<Curriculum>

- If you are a beginner -

1. We can learn the Korean alphabet and practice reading Korean sentences.

2. And we can read natural Korean conversation books I have. 
(I will break down all sentences and explain all vocabulary and grammar structures of sentences.)


- If you are intermediate or advanced -

1. we can read natural Korean conversation books I have. 
(I will break down all sentences and explain all vocabulary and grammar structures of sentences.)

2. Or we can have conversation practice. 

I will help you say what you want to say in Korean, naturally.

I will also type every sentence we say on Google doc and give you the link.

So, you can review easily.

Also, we can talk about some specific subjects such as news, business, work-related, your major, etc.
 
During the class, I correct your sentence structure and pronunciation to a more natural Japanese if necessary, but I won't be correcting your every mistake to make you relax, gain confidence.

In this class, I don't use any textbook or teaching materials.

pro_course_detail.title: Japanese for Beginner to Pre-Intermediate
pro_course_detail.description:
- Do I need to know Japanese characters before the lesson? 
No problem at all. I can help you from learning Japanese characters. I can also use the materials with the readings in romaji for the first few lessons.

This lesson is for students who start to learn Japanese for the first time and who have learned Japanese but still a beginner.

I mainly use the textbook Genki, but other textbooks can be used if you would like to use them.
I can provide a textbook such as Genki(2nd edition), Minna no Nihongo, Marugoto.
If you have any special requests, please let me know.
Let's learn Japanese with me!!  :)

pro_course_detail.title: Japanese for Intermediate to Advanced
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is designed for students who have already mastered basic grammar and vocabulary and want to improve to a higher level.
I design the curriculum according to the students' objectives. 
If you have any special requests, please let me know.

pro_course_detail.title: Japanese for all levels 【10 Lesson package】
pro_course_detail.description: This course is for students who would like to learn for the long term. If you are thinking to take lessons more than 10 lessons, please book this lesson. I will tailor the curriculum for you after the first lesson or trial lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Japanese for Kids
pro_course_detail.description:
*Only 30-minute lessons are available
This class is for kids around 5 to 12 years old. I teach Japanese greetings, Basic Phrases, and vocabulary.

pro_course_detail.title: Group lesson for two
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is priced for a group lesson of 2 students.
**For kids, only 30-minute lessons are available.

teacher_info.intro:

teacher_info.about_teacher:

★日本語教師養成講座420時間修了済

I have experience teaching Japanese online.  So far, I have taught Japanese to students in countries like United States, Russia, Vietnam , China and so on.

У меня есть опыт преподавания японского онлайн. До сих пор я преподавала японский язык студентом во многих странах ,таких как США, Россия, Вьетнам, Китай.
★Завершены все требования курса подготовки учителей японского языка (420 часов выше).

course_info.trial_description:
Hi, everyone! Всем привет! こんにちは！
Let's enjoy studying Japanese with me!
Давайте наслаждаться изучением японского со мной !
わたしと一緒に楽しく日本語を勉強しましょう！

(My trial lesson is 25min. Thank you for your understanding.)

pro_course_detail.title: Free conversation / Свободный разговор / 会話(かいわ)の練習(れんしゅう) / 45*55min
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson, you can practice your conversation. Let's talk about anything you would like! 
For example, travel, sports, food, culture, etc. 
If you are the elementary level, you can practice simple conversations with me.
For example, "まいにち なんじ に おきますか"  "あなた の しゅみ は なんですか", etc. 
During the lesson, I will correct your grammatical mistakes and pronunciation.

На этом уроке, вы можете попрактиковаться в разговоре.
Давайте поговорим о чём угодно!
Например путешествия, спорт, еда, культура и т. д.
Если у вас начальный уровень, вы можете попрактиковаться в простом разговоре со мной.
Например "まいにち なんじ に おきますか"  "あなた の しゅみ は なんですか" и т.д.
Во время урока я исправлю ваши грамматические ошибки и произношение.

このレッスンでは、あなたのしたい話題(わだい)を話(はな)しましょう！
 例(たと)えば、旅行(りょこう)・スポーツ・たべもの・文化(ぶんか)など。
初級(しょきゅう)のひとは、かんたんな会話(かいわ)を練習(れんしゅう)しましょう。
例(たと)えば、"まいにち なんじ に おきますか"  "あなた の しゅみ は なんですか" など。
話(はな)しているとき、文法(ぶんぽう)や発音(はつおん)を正(ただ)しくなおします。

pro_course_detail.title: Learn Japanese with "Marugoto" for beginners / Учить японский с " Маругото" для начинающих / 初級日本語(しょきゅうにほんご) /45*55min
pro_course_detail.description:
【About this lesson 】
・This is a lesson for beginners (A1 / A2)
(Only students who have mastered hiragana and katakana will be accepted.)
・You don't have to prepare a textbook.
We use a textbook called "Marugoto".
・In this lesson, you can learn more practical Japanese.
・This lesson recommended for people who want to travel to Japan, live in Japan, or want to make Japanese friends.

【Об этом уроке】
・Это урок для начинающих (A1 / A2)
(Принимаются только студенты, освоившие нирагану и катакану.)
・Вам не нужно готовить учебник.
Мы используем учебник под названием "Маругото".
・В этом уроке вы сможете выучить более практичный японский.
・Этот урок рекомендуется для тех, кто хочет поехать в Японию, жить в Японии или хочет приобрести японских друзей.

【レッスンについて】
・このレッスンは初級(しょきゅう)のひとの授業(じゅぎょう)です(A1 / A2)
(ひらがな・かたかなを理解(りかい)しているひとだけレッスンできます)
・教科書(きょうかしょ)はじゅんびしなくてもいいです
"まるごと”という教科書(きょうかしょ)をつかいます
・このレッスンは普段(ふだん)の生活(せいかつ)でつかう日本語(にほんご)をべんきょうします
・日本(にほん)へ旅行(りょこう)したいひと・日本(にほん)にすんでいるひと・日本人(にほんじん)とともだちになりたいひとにおすすめです

pro_course_detail.title: Describe a picture / Описание фотографии / 写真(しゃしん)を日本語で説明(せつめい)しましょう! / 45*55min
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson, you will learn to explain in Japanese.
◆Lesson flow◆
1. I will show you some pictures.
2. Please answer all the words you know.
3. Please make sentences using the words you know.
4. I will correct your mistakes.
This is a very interesting lesson. Please try it !

На этом уроке вы научитесь объяснять на японском.
◆Порядок уроков◆
1. Я покажу вам несколько фотографий.
2. Пожалуйста ответьте на все слова, которые вы знаете.
3. Пожалуйста заставляйте предложения, используя слова, которые вы знаете.
4. Я исправлю ваши ошибки.
Это очень интересный урок. Пожалуйста попробуйте!

このレッスンでは、日本語で説明(せつめい)する練習(れんしゅう)をします。
◆レッスンの方法(ほうほう)◆
1. わたしはあなたに、いくつか写真(しゃしん)をみせます。
2. 写真(しゃしん)をみて、知(し)っている言葉(ことば)を全部(ぜんぶ)おしえてください。
3. 知(し)っている言葉(ことば)をつかって、文章(ぶんしょう)をつくってください。
4. わたしはあなたの間違(まちが)いをなおします。
このレッスンはとてもおもしろいです😊

pro_course_detail.title: 中級・上級者のための記事で学ぶ日本語 / Learn Japanese with articles for Pre-intermediate to advanced students / Учить японский язык со статьями для студентов среднего до продвинутого  / 45*55min
pro_course_detail.description:
【レッスンについて】 
・中級から上級の人のためのレッスンです 。(B1-C2)
・このレッスンでは、主に “MATCHA”という名前のウェブサイトを使います。
   難しい記事だけでなく簡単な日本語で書かれた記事もあります。　
・このレッスンで、語彙を増やし、読む力を付け、あなたの意見を言う練習をします。

【レッスンで扱うテーマ】
・旅行     ・食べ物     ・ファッション   ・スポーツ   ・芸術   ・買い物   ・建築
・歴史   ・自然   ・音楽   ・お祭り  ・アニメ / マンガ     など

◆最初のレッスンで、あなたが興味のあることを教えてください。
◆他に使いたいサイト、記事、本などがあったら、何でも言ってください😊

【About this lesson 】 
・This is a lesson for Pre-intermediate to advanced students. (B1-C2)
・In this lesson, we mainly use the website called “MATCHA”.
    On this website, there are not only difficult articles but also articles written by simple Japanese 
    for foreigners.
・This lesson help you learn new vocabulary, improve your reading skills and express your 
    opinion. 

【Topics covered in this lesson】
・travel     ・food     ・fashion    ・sports   ・art   ・shopping   ・architecture
・history    ・nature   ・music　　 ・festival   ・anime / manga     etc.

◆Please tell me what you are interested in when you take this lesson for the first time.
◆Fell free to tell me if you have any other websites, articles or books you would like to use in  
  our lesson.

【Об этом уроке】 
・Это урок для студентов среднего до продвинутого. (B1-C2)
・В этом уроке мы в основном используем сайт под названием “MATCHA”.
   На этом сайте есть не только сложные статьи, но и статьи, написанные на простом 
   японском языке для иностранцев.
・Этот урок поможет вам освоить новый словарный запас, улучшить навыки чтения и 
    выразить своё мнение.

【Темы, рассмотренные на этом уроке 】
・путешествие     ・еда     ・мода    ・спорт   ・искусство   ・покупки   ・архитектура 
・история   ・природа   ・музыка   ・фестиваль  ・аниме / манга     ит.д.

◆Пожалуйста, расскажите мне, что вас интересует, когда вы берете этот урок в первый раз.
◆Не стесняйтесь сообщить мне, есть ли у вас есть другие веб-сайты, статьи, или книги, 
    которые вы хотели бы использовать на нашем уроке.

pro_course_detail.title: New🤩【JLPT N1 N2 N3 N4】Grammar ＆ Reading comprehension / Грамматика & Понимание прочитанного / 文法 & 読解 / 45*55min
pro_course_detail.description:
⭐Please be sure to read before booking.
⭐Пожалуйста, обязательно прочитайте перед бронированием.
⭐予約する前に、必ず読んでください。

【About this lesson】
◆This lesson for those who want to prepare for the JLPT exam.
◆Not only for exam preparation, but also for those who want to relearn grammar and improve reading comprehension.
◆The textbook I use is mainly "日本語総まとめ" , but if you have a textbook you would like to use , please tell me before booking.
◆Especially for students take N4 and N3 grammar lessons, it is preferable if you can understand some English, as I will be giving some quizzes in the lesson using simple English.
◆Sorry, I'm currently preparing grammar lessons for N3. 
If you are interested in this lesson, please contact me first.

【Об этом уроке】
◆Этот урок для тех, кто хочет подготовиться к экзамену JLPT.
◆Не только для подготовки к экзаменам, но и для тех, кто хочет заново выучить грамматику и улучшить понимание прочитанного.
◆В основном я использую учебник "日本語総まとめ". но если у вас есть учебник, который вы хотели бы использовать, пожалуйста, сообщите мне об этом до бронирования.
◆Особенно для студентов, которые проходят уроки грамматики N4 и N3, желательно, чтобы вы немного понимали английский язык, так как я буду давать некоторые тесты на уроке, используя простой английский.
◆Извините, в настоящее время я готовлю уроки грамматики для N3.
 Если вы заинтересованы в этом уроке, пожалуйста, сначала свяжитесь со мной.

【レッスンについて】
◆日本語能力試験（JLPT）受験を目指す方のためのレッスンです。
◆試験対策だけでなく、文法を学び直したい、読解力を高めたいという方にもおすすめです。
◆教科書は、主に  "日本語総まとめ " を使いますが、他に使いたい教科書がある場合は、予約する前に教えてください。
◆特に、N4とN3の文法レッスンを受ける方は、レッスン中に簡単な英語でクイズを出しますので、少し英語が理解できたほうがいいです。
◆現在N3の文法レッスンは準備中です。
もし、このレッスンにご興味のある方は、まず私にメッセージを送ってください。

teacher_info.intro: I love traveling. I have been to Japan, Malaysia, Thailand, the United States, Canada, South Africa, Kenya, and Tanzania. I lived in Canada for 1 year for studying English, and I also lived in Tanzania for 6 months for studying Swahili, the East African language. When I first teaching Korean online, I was living in Chiangmai in Thailand for 3 months. I enjoy trying new food and meeting new people and seeing beautiful nature and experiencing different cultures. If you also like traveling, we can talk about many things. :)
teacher_info.short_signature: A Certified Korean Teacher / Teaching Korean Online since 2017 /  Recommendations Letter for GKS
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello, everyone! nice to meet you. I am Nyota. I am really looking forward to meeting you who are interested in Korean because you are the most motivated students who give me the pleasure of teaching Korean. The reason why I got the certificate for teaching Korean is that I want to let many people know how scientific and easy to study Korean is and also I hope that many people can use Korean practically in everyday life so that they live, work, travel and enjoy in Korea without difficulty. 
  I have experience of teaching Korean to children (aged 7-12) at Hangul school in Tanzania in 2011 and I have been teaching English to Korean students (aged 13-19). The most important thing when I meet my students is to respect each other. I try to respect not to discourage them. 
  If you are at the beginning level, I can help you from reading the Korean alphabet (consonants, vowels, and syllables) to useful expressions in daily life focusing on listening and speaking. If you are at the intermediate level, I can intensify your grammar, focusing on reading and writing. Why don't try my lesson?
teacher_info.about_me: I love traveling. I have been to Japan, Malaysia, Thailand, the United States, Canada, South Africa, Kenya, and Tanzania. I lived in Canada for 1 year for studying English, and I also lived in Tanzania for 6 months for studying Swahili, the East African language. When I first teaching Korean online, I was living in Chiangmai in Thailand for 3 months. I enjoy trying new food and meeting new people and seeing beautiful nature and experiencing different cultures. If you also like traveling, we can talk about many things. :)
teacher_info.about_teacher: I am a professional Korean teacher. I have been teaching on italki since 2017, but I first started teaching Korean in 2011. I was in an exchange program at the university in Tanzania. I helped some children speak and write in Korean at Hangeul school. It was a fresh experience for me and I had a great time with them. After that, I traveled to Southeast Asia where I met some foreigners who were interested in Korean culture, especially K-pop and K-dramas. While talking with them, I found out people feel happy to have a conversation in a foreign language with a native speaker. Those experiences made me think teaching Korean as a professional job might be one of the wonderful things I can do.
teacher_info.teaching_style: In my lesson, you don’t need to buy any books because I have special learning materials I made by myself using PowerPoint. The learning material has a lot of images and practice, so you will feel easy to understand what you are studying, and it will help you practice Korean. I share my screen during the lesson and write on the screen using the tablet. With my materials and tools, you will feel as if you were in a classroom. I will also correct your mistakes and organize the important sentences to send them to you after each lesson so that you can practice by yourself.
teacher_info.cancel_policy: No-show without any message in advance, I won't refund the fee.

exp_info.description: It is a confirmation that verify volunteer activities at Tanzania Hangul School

edu_info.major: Teaching Korean as a Foreign Language
edu_info.description: It is a certificate that I received the bachelor of Liberal Arts

cert_info.description: It is a certificate that  the minister of Culture, Sports, and Tourism authorized me to teach Korean.
cert_info.institution: the ministry of Culture, Sports, and Tourism

course_info.trial_description: We will figure out your level by asking a question or having a brief conversation and also decide how to study Korean.

pro_course_detail.title: Basic Korean Alphabet Lesson for the Beginners
pro_course_detail.description: Is this your first time learning Korean? Do you want to know how to pronounce the Korean alphabet? If so, I recommend this lesson. You will be able to read and write the Korean alphabet after taking 4 or 5 lessons. After a lesson, I provide the learning material.

pro_course_detail.title: Focusing on Pronunciation
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you still have problems with pronunciation even know how to read and write the Korean Alphabet?
This lesson is for the students who only focus on pronunciation. We are going to learn different Korean pronunciation rules such as Nasaliazation, Glottalization, Lateralization, and Palatalization, etc.
You will be able to speak and read naturally after taking 10 lessons. After a lesson, I provide the learning material.

pro_course_detail.title: Korean Grammar and Conversation for Beginner & Intermediate students (55 min)
pro_course_detail.description:
If you want to make a Korean friend or communicate in daily life, please try this one. You can learn useful conversational phrases, simple words, basic grammar. 
As your Korean skill improves, you need more intensive grammar and words. The main goal of this course is to increase your proficiency. This course matches the TOPIK level 1~4
* This lesson will provide the learning material after the lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Reading Korean Books (55 min)
pro_course_detail.description: If you are interested in any material written in Korean, please try this one. We will read books, articles, lyrics, and so on. I translate Korean text into English and I explain the grammars. For the lesson, please send me the text you want to translate and study in advance. Your accuracy will be improved.

pro_course_detail.title: Having Free Conversation (55 min)
pro_course_detail.description: 듣기와 말하기를 연습하고 싶은 분들에게 이 수업을 추천합니다. (If you want to practice just for speaking and listening, I recommend this course.) I have a list of hundreds of questions and topics, so you can have a meaningful conversation relevant to your life. Your fluency will be improved. While having a free conversation, I will correct grammar and pronunciation. After the lesson, I will arrange the sentences that you create during the lesson including corrections, and provide the grammar so that you can study by yourself even after the lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Customized Lesson & TOPIK Preparation - writing + recommendation letter
pro_course_detail.description: Deepen your understanding of the Korean language with fully customized lessons. This lesson is for the students who need more of the curriculum. Especially this lesson is made for the students who need writing lessons. Provide the learning material after each class.

teacher_info.intro:
みなさん。こんにちは！
私（わたし）の名前（なまえ）はChiharuです。
日本（にほん）の東京（とうきょう）生（う）まれ、埼玉県（さいたまけん）育（そだ）ちです。日本語（にほんご）のネイティブスピーカーです。

日本（にほん）では不動産（ふどうさん）のアシスタントとして働（はたら）き、英語習得（えいごしゅうとく）のため3ヶ月（かげつ）オーストラリアへ短期留学（たんきりゅうがく）をしました。
現在（げんざい）はさらに英語力（えいごりょく）を伸（の）ばすため、そしてレストランマネジメントを学（まな）ぶため、ハワイでインターンシップをしています。

Hello everyone!

I am Chiharu from Japan.
I born in Tokyo and raised Saitama-pref. I am a native speaker of Japanese.

In terms of my background, I used to work at a real estate company as an assistant. 
In order to improve my English skill, I went to Australia for three months.
At the moment, I’ve been staying and working in hawaii for taking a program of learning a restaurant management.
teacher_info.about_me:
みなさん。こんにちは！
私（わたし）の名前（なまえ）はChiharuです。
日本（にほん）の東京（とうきょう）生（う）まれ、埼玉県（さいたまけん）育（そだ）ちです。日本語（にほんご）のネイティブスピーカーです。

日本（にほん）では不動産（ふどうさん）のアシスタントとして働（はたら）き、英語習得（えいごしゅうとく）のため3ヶ月（かげつ）オーストラリアへ短期留学（たんきりゅうがく）をしました。
現在（げんざい）はさらに英語力（えいごりょく）を伸（の）ばすため、そしてレストランマネジメントを学（まな）ぶため、ハワイでインターンシップをしています。

Hello everyone!

I am Chiharu from Japan.
I born in Tokyo and raised Saitama-pref. I am a native speaker of Japanese.

In terms of my background, I used to work at a real estate company as an assistant. 
In order to improve my English skill, I went to Australia for three months.
At the moment, I’ve been staying and working in hawaii for taking a program of learning a restaurant management.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
子供（こども）のころから英語（えいご）を勉強（べんきょう）しているので、もしレッスン中（ちゅう）にわからないことがあれば英語（えいご）でのサポートもできます。
どの日本語（にほんご）レベルであっても、ゆっくり丁寧（ていねい）に教（おし）えることができます。

I could support in English a little bit if you need, since I've been learning English at the moment. No matter how Japanese level you are, I am confident that teaching Japanese carefully.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
私（わたし）のレッスンスタイルは日常（にちじょう）で使（つか）えるフリートーク形式（けいしき）・様々（さまざま）な質問（しつもん）
や疑問点（ぎもんてん）についての回答（かいとう）や日本（にほん）の文化（ぶんか）や習慣（しゅうかん）などについて、日本語（にほんご）を教（おし）えながら伝（つた）えていきます。

About my lesson, I would teach you how to speak Japanese more natural as you could use in general conversation. Furthermore, I could answer whatever you want to ask about Japanese language, cultures and customs.

But more than that, it's really cool that learning other language especially this current situation!

Looking forward to seeing you in my trial lesson!!

はじめて日本語を勉強（べんきょう）する方、日本語での挨拶（あいさつ）や簡単（かんたん）な
自己紹介（じこしょうかい）を、学ぶことができます。
その他にも日本語の表現（ひょうげん）について質問（しつもん）や疑問（ぎもん）があれば、
いつでもおこたえします！

In this lesson, you could learn how to greet, introduce yourself, and have easy conversation in Japanese. Beginners are always welcome! Also, if you have any question about Japanese, I am happy to answer anytime!

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish for kids
pro_course_detail.description:
would you like your kid learn Spanish? learning a second language can bring a lot of benefits:

Better and more advanced reading skills: A study undertaken by York University in Canada suggests that bilingual children’s knowledge of a second language gives them an advantage in learning to read.

Greater confidence: Children are always discovering new things, and for children learning a language comes to them more naturally and tends to be fun as they learn in play type activities.  This accomplishment gives them the confidence they need, as well.

Gives brains a boost: Research into the effects of bilingualism on children suggests that exposure to more than one language is an excellent way of flexing those brain muscles—and building them up, too! Bilingual children in one study reported in Nature showed a significantly larger density of “grey matter” in their brains. And those who had been exposed to a second language from an early age proved to have the most grey matter of all. Grey matter is responsible for processing information, including memory, speech and sensory perception.

teacher_info.intro: Hola Soy Laya venezolana y una apasionada del aprendizaje y la enseñanza, creo que la mejor forma de aprender algo es cuando estamos disfrutando durante el proceso por eso creo que es necesario probar diferentes estrategias hasta encontrar cuál es la que más nos gusta, cuento con varios años de experiencia en la enseñanza de niños, jóvenes y adultos y me encantaría poder acompañarte y durante este camino de aprender un nuevo idioma.
teacher_info.introduction: Hello my name is Laya, I'm from Venezuela and I am a native speaker of Spanish with experience in teaching children and adults. I am a psychologist and a professor of psychology in my country; however the experience as Spanish teacher online is a facet that has managed to become a passion for me because I enjoy learning from my students while they learn from me. I like to meet people from different places and have the honor of now being able to consider many of them as my friends. No matter what your level of Spanish, whether you are thinking of starting to learn the language or have an intermediate level or whether you are an advanced student and are interested in improving or understanding some aspect in specifics. I invite you to learn a new language where together we may improve the skills you already have. ♦Lessons for beginners or intermediate level : The lessons are personalized and focused on your needs and areas of interest. with a special method which enables you speak Spanish from the first lesson. In these lessons you will study grammar, conversation skills, daily life situations, vocabulary, songs. In the first session we will have time to talk about your goals and what would you like the lessons to be like, and also time to assess your level and have a trial lesson. ♦Lessons to improve your Spanish: personalized lessons for people who want to improve their Spanish and to be able to have a conversation. In these lessons we will talk about culture, current events, literature, music, sport etc. ♦ Spanish for Kids: With materials and strategies tailored especially for the little ones. oriented to vocabulary acquisition, development of listening, pronunciation, reading and writing. Speak Spanish equips children with a powerful tool that will open future opportunities for study and work abroad, and develop their learning potential in various areas. If you are interested contact me. Espero verte pronto en nuestra primera clase.

Welcome! I'm here to help you on your English learning journey. We will work together to achieve your goals for international migration, study and employment! Let's do it!

The skills I teach:
- IELTS/CAE/ISLPR/TOEIC/TOEFL exam preparation (speaking & writing): Improve your IELTS scores! Easily add 1 or 2 more bands! Let's work together so you get 6.5 and higher!

English Exam Preparation
I have experience preparing students for IELTS, CAE, ISLPR and TOEFL, both on iTalki and at English centres in Vietnam. 
Also, I was a TOEIC practice-exam examiner for a company in Hanoi, Vietnam.

Business English

pro_course_detail.title: Pronunciation - 25/55 minute lessons
pro_course_detail.description:
Are you having some difficulty with English sounds? 

Is it difficult to say sounds at the end of words (/s/ /t/ /d/ or /k/)? Maybe /r/ or /l/ are difficult? What about all the different sounds of a, e, i, o, u? 

Let me teach you some tricks to hear and produce the correct sounds. I'll help you find examples of similar sounds from your native language and use that knowledge to help you.

I will correct your pronunciation and grammar, and help you learn new vocabulary.

Please book a lesson! Or, send me a message with your availability to request a lesson. 

***My lessons finish 5 minutes early to allow me to prepare for my next lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS Speaking  -  Practice exams, techniques & tips - 25/50 minute lessons
pro_course_detail.description:
Are you preparing for an IELTS test? I have the resources and tips to help you prepare for the speaking part! Book a lesson with me! We can do a practice exam together! 

If you book a 30-minute lesson, the lesson will go for 25 minutes. 
This can include 1 IELTS exam. After the lesson, I will send you a score and my detailed feedback for grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, and fluency and coherence (You will receive this 2 - 24 hours after the lesson depending on my schedule)

If you book a 60-minute lesson, the lesson will go for 50 minutes. 
This can include two IELTS speaking tests.  
I will give you some tips after the first test, but I will send you my written feedback and score for both tests after the lesson. (You will receive this 2 - 24 hours after the lesson depending on my schedule)

pro_course_detail.title: Business English - Interview skills, CV/Resume & Applications - 25/55 minute lessons
pro_course_detail.description:
I can help you for any job in any industry, and any university 

Looking for your next job? Want a professional application for a University or Job? CV/resume and cover letter? Maybe some tips for how to prepare for an interview? Can you speak and write Business English?

Let's work together to make sure your best qualities shine through in your first impressions with employers and universities!

*** Each lesson finishes 5 minutes early to allow me to prepare for my next lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Writing -  IELTS, PET, CAE - Essays, reports, emails, letters, anything! - 55 minute lessons
pro_course_detail.description:
I am here to help you improve your writing! Essays, reports, emails, letters, creative writing, anything! 
One lesson includes both Task 1 and Task 2 IELTS edit. 
Or, if other type of writing, 500 words per hour.

Step 1. Book your lesson and message me what type of writing you want to practice. 
Step 2. I will send you clear information about how to write that type of writing.
Step 3. You will write something in that type of writing!
Step 4. You will send your writing to me via Skype or email before our lesson.
Step 5. We will have our class using Skype (or another live chat service) and I will share your writing via my screen. 
Step 6. I will get you to read your writing, one paragraph at a time, and I will correct it and I will give you live feedback, explain your mistakes and make corrections during the lesson (you will also get corrections on your pronunciation when you are reading your writing to me). 

*** Each lesson finishes 5 minutes early to allow me to prepare for my next lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Improve Your Speaking Confidence - 25/55 minute lessons
pro_course_detail.description:
Of course you want to improve your speaking confidence! And I am here to help and support you! 

Your lessons with me will be comfortable and productive, and your confidence will improve when we practice your English speaking and listening skills together!

I will provide instant corrections and feedback for:
- pronunciation
- grammar
- fluency 
- vocabulary

We can talk about any topic, I am here to support you and make you feel comfortable. 

Book a lesson with me today!

***My lessons finish 5 minutes early to allow me to prepare for my next lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS Speaking Class
pro_course_detail.description:
This class will help you to understand the ins and outs of the IELTS Speaking Task and the four areas of the speaking test which are Fluency/Coherence, Vocabulary, Pronunciation and Grammatical Range and Accuracy. 

We will look at the Rubric, Test Analysis, Task Practice and Strategies for each task.

These lessons are designed to help improve your speaking skills for the IELTS Speaking test. Each lesson focuses on a different part of the test and includes questions and tasks based on the real thing. Practice tests are also provided.

I look forward to our conversations and preparing you for the IELTS exam!

pro_course_detail.title: English for Kids :-)
pro_course_detail.description:
Welcome to Teacher Sarina's Kids Class! 

These lessons are a FUN way for young children to learn the basics of the English language, from the alphabet to simple words and sentences. Each class is customized based on the student's level and interests.

These English classes are catered to children (ages 5-12) so they will include plenty of images, songs, props and flashcards and games to keep the younger students engaged. My classes are fun and encouraging! I have a lot of material to keep them interested! See you in class.

pro_course_detail.description:
These lessons cover a wide range of language skills needed to succeed in an English-speaking business environment such as meetings, conversations and negotiations.
They use examples of common workplace situations to help students communicate in a professional and appropriate manner.

teacher_info.intro: I have more than 10 years of experience in teaching English to a wide range of students, from all over the world. I have a TESOL certificate, and experience in Skype teaching.
teacher_info.introduction: Hello, my name is Robert Sullivan, and I am an English teacher from Australia. I taught English for 10 years in Japan, where I worked in a wide range of environments such as junior high schools, conversation clubs, company offices and even over the telephone. During my time in Japan I came to realize that while many people have studied English grammar extensively, they do not have confidence in actually speaking the language in a practical way. More recently, I have found this to be the case with students from other countries, too. Therefore, I want to help you practice your speaking, and unlock some of the knowledge that you already have. I have developed many techniques to boost your competency and motivation, and I try to make lessons interesting and fun.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi there! My name is Zoe and I am a 19-year-old college student from the United States. I am a double-major in history and French at my university, and because of this I am used to working with words! 
I love to communicate, and I love love LOVE learning foreign languages. 
My passions include the arts: reading, writing, and singing all bring me so much joy. In addition to this, I love exercising and spending time with friends and family. 
I am curious and interested in trying new things. 
Most of all, I love PEOPLE, and hearing their stories! Feel free to tell me about your country, your life, even your pets! I can't wait to meet you.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi there! My name is Zoe and I am a 19-year-old college student from the United States. I am a double-major in history and French at my university, and because of this I am used to working with words!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am a patient and passionate teacher! I am eager to see you succeed as a student. Because I am also a language student, I know what it feels like—I am proud of each and every student for taking the step to speak with a Native speaker. I am here to support you! 
I am organized, and I will keep a record of our lessons—that way, if you choose to book another class with me, we can continue where we left off the last time. I focus on the progress of my students! 
As a teacher, I want to make sure that my teaching style fits your LEARNING style. I will value your feedback, and work to adjust to help you better.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lessons will be, above all, conversational. I want to give you a comfortable setting to improve your speaking and listening skills in English. My goal is to make you more confident in your English fluency! We can personalize our lessons--send me a message if you have a topic you would like to discuss. If you don't, I am happy to simply have a fun and engaging conversation with you!
When I studied acting in high school, I learned the importance of speaking clearly. Because of this, I am prepared to help you improve pronunciation! We can use games and tricks I know to practice this. 
Furthermore, we will build your vocab as we learn new words--I love to use things like songs and images!

course_info.trial_description: Feel free to book a trial lesson with me! During a trial lesson, we will get acquainted with one another, and you will be able to experience the materials and learning style I use. I will also get a sense of your English level so I can better prepare future lessons for you.

pro_course_detail.title: General English Conversation (Beginner to advanced)
pro_course_detail.description:
During these lessons we will have casual, flowing conversations on a variety of subjects! We will speak naturally with each other, focusing on improving pronunciation, vocabulary, and speaking confidence in general. 
If you have a specific topic you would like to speak about, please send me a message about that! I will be happy to prepare questions or a useful vocabulary list on it.

teacher_info.intro: Hello! My name is Yohan. I’m from Buenos Aires, Argentina 🇦🇷, though I’m currently studying Thai Cuisine  in 🇹🇭 Thailand. Teaching while traveling is one of my passions. Languages have opened doors for me, allowing me to experience new cultures and meet amazing people all around the world. I also love learning languages and have recently been trying to learn French. In my spare time, I also enjoy exercising, in particular swimming and water polo, and spending time with my 2 Labrador dogs. I look forward to hearing about your interests and discussing anything we may have in common!

teacher_info.about_teacher: I have been teaching English and Spanish, both online and in-person, for 3 years. I love teaching students from all over the world, so we can share about our experiences, cultures, and interests. I hold a 120-hour TEFL (Teaching English as a Foreign Language) certification, as well as a Bachelor’s degree in Education 📜  from the University of Modelo Lomas in Buenos Aires. As such, I have countless of great methods to make the learning process simpler.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I use a variety of materials, such as PowerPoints, readings, maps, audios, videos, etc. In this way, my students can develop the 4 modes of communication (listening, speaking, reading writing). I, like my students, I have learned foreign languages, so I know the difficulties that it entails. Thus, in each class, I try to create an interesting and captivating environment. While I provide feedback when appropriate, I generally try to conduct the class as though we are friends having a conversation. Our classes can be tailored to fit your needs, whether that be for business or for travel.

teacher_info.intro:
I am an actor, screenwriter, acting teacher, and Director living in Hollywood, California, USA. I was born in California, and I also lived in New York City for many years. I have been teaching Accent Reduction to actors here, who are then able to get booked for American roles. I have many interests including: History, Music, Physics, Health, Exercise, Photography, Filmmaking and Art, etc.

I have traveled the world as a musician, and have also met many different types of people as a teacher. I have studied French, Spanish and Russian. I am currently very focused on learning Russian and I have great teachers on Italki. Я говорю по-русски.

I am an actor, screenwriter, acting teacher, and Director living in Hollywood, California, USA. I was born in California, and I also lived in New York City for many years. I have been teaching Accent Reduction to actors here, who are then able to get booked for American roles. teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have been teaching most of my life. My mother was a teacher and my two sisters are PhD‘s teaching at universities. My father had his PhD in physics. Teaching is the primary profession of our family.

I first taught SAT college entrance exam preparation to Chinese students in New York. Back in California, I taught English for Berlitz, in Santa Monica and in Puerto Rico, and I also taught for two years at ELS Language Centers in Santa Monica, California. I currently teach acting, English and accent reduction in my Hollywood studio.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I enjoy teaching English. The most important thing is to encourage students to speak conversationally. Students quickly become more confident. I correct mistakes and explain why. This is the technique my Italki Russian teachers use. (Я говорю по-русски на среднем уровне. Это помогает моим русским студентам учиться быстро и легко.)

It’s very good to work from text. I use articles, stories or exercises with my students . We review these and start using the language in speaking or writing.

I help students with their writing, CV's, interviews, translations, business writing, tests, or case studies.

新年大吉！我非常喜欢教中国学生讲英语。

pro_course_detail.title: American English Conversation, with a Native Speaker
pro_course_detail.description: Hello! My name is Peter. I'm a native English speaker and I'll be happy to help you with the language. We can discuss any subject of interest to you. I have a wide spectrum of interests and knowledge, from music, acting and the arts, to science and history. We will also use teaching aids and materials to stimulate discussion. I can also help you with grammar and pronunciation. I am looking forward to working with you!

pro_course_detail.title: Accent Reduction -- Have the Standard American Accent!
pro_course_detail.description: I work with several international actors in Hollywood on improving their accent in English. I am now teaching Accent Reduction through italki for students who wish to have the American sound. I will teach you in a detailed way how to improve your pronunciation and your accent in English.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn English Through Aсting! Improve your speaking level through Dialogues and Monologues
pro_course_detail.description:
Improve your Acting and English online with help from an expert tutor with over 10 years of experience. One-on-one English Acting classes are designed to develop your language skills in a creative, informative environment. Through studying and playing out a variety of monologues and dialogues, you will improve your speech and grammar, reduce accent, and receive professional training in Acting. With years of teaching and on-set work in Hollywood under my belt, I strive to create the best lessons for students and put them on track to be fluent English speakers, or successful Actors. As a native English speaker, I also speak Russian as a second language.

Улучшите своё актёрское мастерство и английский язык при помощи онлайн классов с учителем с более чем 10-летним опытом преподавания. Индивидуальные занятия по английскому языку и актерскому мастерству разработаны для развития ваших навыков в творческой, информационной среде. Изучая и разыгрывая сцены с монологами и диалогами, вы улучшите свою речь и грамматику, избавитесь от акцента и получите профессиональную подготовку в области актерского мастерства. Имея за плечами годы преподавания и работы на съёмочной площадке в Голливуде, я преподаю лучшие уроки для взрослых и детей, стремящихся свободно говорить по-английски и стать успешными актёрами. Будучи носителем английского языка, я также говорю по-русски.

pro_course_detail.title: Acting Lessons in English -- All Levels.
pro_course_detail.description:
Acting is an Art, and it is also a great way to improve your English skills. I’ve been teaching acting for over 15 years. I have a studio in Los Angeles and I’ve done I several well attended master classes internationally. I have hundreds of scripts for two person scenes and monologues. Acting is the best way to work on your intonation, natural delivery of words and sentences, and believability. I have worked with Actors, beginning to advanced, from all over the world on connecting the character and understanding the script.

I look forward to working with you!

I am a patient and easygoing teacher. If you want to study Chinese or simply share about your life, I am very happy to help you.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I've been teaching Chinese for more than 5 years. I believe great teachers do more than teaching: They encourage and inspire! For adult learners, it would be best to combine learning objectives with practicality. For children, the best way is to learn while playing in comfortable surroundings with comprehensible language input, ultimately to achieve the purpose of output.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
In my class, I can create an immersive environment to build up your confidence in learning and using Chinese. I know you might struggle with various sentence structures, but don't worry, I can explain how Chinese language works and what is the proper way to express yourself in Chinese. I will make sure you feel comfortable and improve your Chinese level step-by-step.

 Currently, I offer several types of classes ,including comprehensive course, oral course,children's course,reading course,ect.

course_info.trial_description: Help you sound better to boost your confidence to speak Chinese. Please try a trial lesson and see if I can help you achieve your goal.

pro_course_detail.title: Comprehensive Course
pro_course_detail.description: I use textbooks, interesting PowerPoints and materials to suit your level. They will make a deep impression to help you learn Chinese efficiently. In class, I will record and explain anything you don't understand, and you will become familiar with vocabulary and sentence patterns through practice. After class, there will be homework for you to review.

pro_course_detail.title: Oral Course（including outdoor courses）
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is suitable for those who are aiming to master basic conversation. Upon completion of this course, you will be able to get by in everyday conversation if you travel to China, take a short business trip, or even make Chinese friends in your own country.

Plus, if you want to communicate in an authentic context, outdoor teaching is a popular way to learn. I will show you the life of ordinary Chinese, and learn the language naturally from it. (Outdoor courses need to send me a message to make an appointment before opening in the course calendar)

pro_course_detail.title: Children’s Course
pro_course_detail.description:
Students will follow the rules of second language acquisition through listening and reading then transitioning to speaking and writing, so children can master this language stress-free.
Note: This course is only for 30 or 45 minutes.

pro_course_detail.title: Reading Course
pro_course_detail.description: This course is designed for people who want to learn Chinese through reading. The materials I provide include articles, stories, and picture books. By reading and explaining these materials, you can learn how to understand，read, and retell Chinese stories step-by-step.

pro_course_detail.title: HSK
pro_course_detail.description: For students who want to take HSK, I have a full set of learning and tutoring materials for levels 1-6. It can help you pass this exam in a variety of forms.

teacher_info.intro:
An American 🇺🇸  from the state of Maryland, I came to Taiwan 16 years ago to teach English. My classes are LGBT+ friendly 🏳️‍🌈 🏳️‍⚧️, and I teach all ages, nationalities, & learning differences (ADHD, ASD).

Fluent in Mandarin 🇹🇼 🇨🇳, I also study French 🇫🇷 & Spanish 🇲🇽 🇪🇸 on italki!

Experience: 
In 6+ years at the Princeton Review, I was certified to teach TOEFL, SAT, & LSAT, and developed A1-C2 English courses for high school, college, & adult students.

Since 2014, I've coached 100s of international startup CEOs in 10+ countries & judged countless business competitions. I've hired many employees in my career, and helped numerous italki students prepare for job interviews.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
I'm happy to prepare our lessons to suit your goals & learning style.

CONVERSATION CLASSES 
I'll use your personal interests to plan our conversations, build your VOCABULARY, and catch GRAMMAR & PRONUNCIATION errors. We'll discuss fresh content like news articles, Netflix, YouTube, & more.

BUSINESS ENGLISH / JOB INTERVIEWS
We'll work on your specific goals, whether that's professional development, job interview practice, startup pitching, or presentations, focusing on both English CONTENT and confident SPEAKING. 
☝️For best results, don't book at the last minute!

TESTS
For TOEFL, IELTS, TOEIC, GEPT, or other tests, we'll make a plan based on your current scores and test schedule.

course_info.trial_description:
🙏  Before or right after signing up for a trial lesson, please click the CONTACT TEACHER button to tell me more about your level and expectations! 報名時，請記得填寫CONTACT表或message給我提供您的自我介紹，包括目前的英文程度和目標！ 🙏 

ABOUT TRIAL LESSONS:
Let's chat! In our trial lesson, here's what we'll do together:

◊ Talk about your learning goals
◊ Get a sense of where you need the most improvement
◊ Discuss a learning plan that will fit your level and your learning schedule

I'll share with you more of my background, specializations, and teaching methods, and you can feel free to ask any questions you'd like. Can't wait to meet you!

🚨 Note: Cancellations/schedule changes must be 24 hours in advance

👨‍👨‍👧👩‍👦PARENTS 👩‍👧‍👦👨‍👧👨‍👩‍👧‍👦
I'm happy to teach kids age 6 & up who already have at least an A1 level of English, but please let me know in advance if the lesson is for a child, and tell me more about the child's experience with English (i.e. what's their reading level?) and their learning styles & challenges. Please also tell me your goals for your child before we begin.

For young children (age 6 to 8), I expect a parent to be nearby during the lesson in case of behavior or technical issues.

For older children (age 9 & up), a parent may be present, or I'm happy to teach the child unaccompanied if they're very independent.

🏳️‍🌈 🏳️‍⚧️ Note to gender nonconforming students 🏳️‍⚧️ 🏳️‍🌈
Please don't hesitate to share your pronouns with me. You can feel comfortable bringing your whole self to class ❤️

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice with Vocabulary Boost | 🇺🇸  American English | A2-C2
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's talk! In our lessons, you'll have the opportunity to:

◊ Discuss any topic you'd like: hobbies, career, pop culture, news, social issues, & more
◊ Practice asking questions in informal & formal ways
◊ Receive feedback on grammar & pronunciation
◊ Learn American English slang & elision ("lazy" pronunciation used by native speakers)
◊ Increase your vocabulary related to the topics discussed

In each lesson, I'll provide typed comments & new vocab you can use to review after class. 

🚨 Note: Cancellations/schedule changes must be 24 hours in advance

⭐️ FIRST-TIME STUDENTS ⭐️
Please fill out the CONTACT TEACHER form and tell me more about yourself and your expectations. This allows me to prepare better for the class. Want homework? Want to meet several days per week? Just looking for unstructured conversation? Let me know! 🙏

Looking for a more specialized type of lesson, such as BUSINESS ENGLISH, JOB INTERVIEWS, or TEST PREP? Please select a different lesson type, or contact me before booking.

👨‍👨‍👧👩‍👦PARENTS 👩‍👧‍👦👨‍👧👨‍👩‍👧‍👦
I'm happy to teach kids age 6 & up and minimum A1 level, but please contact me before booking if the lesson is for a child, and tell me more about the child's level of English. Please also tell me your goals for your child before we begin. 
小朋友的課程：因為最近請求較多，所以報名前，請填寫【CONTACT FORM】跟我說小孩名字，年齡，英文學習經驗等。有空缺的話，我會馬上跟您確認，不然可以把資料放在候補名單。感謝您的理解 🙏

For young children (age 6 to 8), you may choose 30 mins (no break), or 45 mins (with a 5-min break). I expect a parent to be nearby during the lesson in case of behavior or technical issues.

For older children (age 9 & up), I recommend 45-minute lessons. A parent may be present, or I'm happy to teach the child unaccompanied if they're very independent.

🏳️‍🌈 🏳️‍⚧️ Note to gender nonconforming students 🏳️‍⚧️ 🏳️‍🌈
Please don't hesitate to share your pronouns with me. You can feel comfortable bringing your whole self to class. ❤️

pro_course_detail.title: Business ⭐️  Interviews ⭐️  Presentations ⭐️  Startup Pitching  | Advanced B2-C2 👩‍💼 👨‍💼 🧑‍🎓
pro_course_detail.description:
In these goal-based lessons, we will work to improve your speaking for a specific educational or professional need, such as:

◊ JOB APPLICATIONS & INTERVIEWS for new grads and career changers 
◊ PUBLIC SPEAKING for competitions, meetings, and lectures
◊ PRESENTATIONS for business meetings, conferences, and educational environments
◊ STARTUP PITCHING for pitch competitions, investor pitches, or media interviews

Have an upcoming speech or presentation? Regularly need to speak in front of groups? this lesson type is for you! We'll address the following, based on your needs:

◊ Making a good first impression with a strong introduction
◊ Using transition words & phrases so your audience can follow your key points
◊ Eliminating filler words like "um" or "like" to boost your professionalism
◊ Addressing pronunciation & grammar
◊ Ending a speech on a high note that leaves the audience impressed
◊ Interacting with an audience during Q&A

If you already have a written speech or slides, be sure to share them before or during our first lesson!

🚨 NOTES 🚨
1. Cancellations/schedule changes must be 24 hours in advance
2. Please note if you require an NDA before the class. Happy to accommodate!

⭐️ FIRST-TIME STUDENTS ⭐️
When booking, please fill out the CONTACT TEACHER form and tell me more about yourself and your expectations. This allows me to prepare better for the class. Want homework? Want to meet several days per week? Have a deadline? Let me know! 🙏

🏳️‍🌈 🏳️‍⚧️ Note to gender nonconforming students 🏳️‍⚧️ 🏳️‍🌈
Please don't hesitate to share your pronouns with me. You can feel comfortable bringing your whole self to class. ❤️

pro_course_detail.title: Academic English Literacy for University| Advanced Reading & Vocabulary 🗣🇺🇸
pro_course_detail.description:
Designed for advanced English learners who need to improve their reading and vocabulary for university, graduate, or PhD programs. 

My areas of expertise are particularly suited to students in social sciences and the humanities, and we will review skills such as:

∆ using Greek & Latin roots, prefixes, and suffixes to increase advanced vocabulary
∆ effective skimming of long texts
∆ recognizing conjunctions & transition phrases for better comprehension
∆ active notetaking while reading academic texts

We may use materials from your course of study, or I can provide academic English activities for you where relevant. During each class, I'll provide typed comments & new vocabulary you can use to review, and share additional reading materials.

Students who plan to take the TOEFL, IELTS, GMAT, LSAT, or other tests may benefit from this lesson type, but please note that these lessons focus on advanced English comprehension rather than testing strategies.


🚨 Notes 🚨 
1. Cancellations/schedule changes must be 24 hours in advance

2. Last-minute classes before any upcoming deadlines or tests will only give you limited improvement, so I recommend this lesson type for long-term students.

3. For students in programs with highly specialized vocabulary such as medicine or other advanced courses in STEM, I recommend you select an English teacher with expertise in your specific field.

🏳️‍🌈 🏳️‍⚧️ Note to gender nonconforming students 🏳️‍⚧️ 🏳️‍🌈
Please don't hesitate to share your pronouns with me. You can feel comfortable bringing your whole self to class. ❤️

teacher_info.intro:
こんにちは。こうすけです。
私は日本で生まれて育ちました。今は国際結婚をしてオーストラリアに住んでいます。
30歳になってから英語を本格的に勉強したので、外国語学習の大変さが良くわかっています。
趣味はハイキングやサイクリング、歴史（日本史/世界史）、サブカルチャーですが、皆さんの話を聞くのが大好きです。
楽しく会話しながら、皆さんが言いたいことを日本語で正しく言えるように、お手伝いします。 

I was born and raised in Japan. Currently I live in Australia. 
I started learning English seriously after I grew up when I was around 30 years old. I know how hard it is to learn foreign languages. (I am relaxed and easy going type of teacher.)
I like hiking, cycling, history, subcultures and love to listen to somebody’s story.
I would love to get to know about you, your passions, challenges on your Japanese.
I help you to express what you want to say in Japanese while having fun conversations.

日本とオーストラリアで15年以上ビジネスの経験(国際会議、海外出張含む）があります。敬語やビジネス日本語、面接も教えることがができます。

帰国子女の方、日本人のパートナーがいる方にも日本語の細かいニュアンスを教えることができます。

I am a qualified teacher of Japanese. I have more than 15 years corporate business experience in Japan and Australia. I can teach keigo (polite), business Japanese and help prepare for job interviews.
Based on my own experience of living abroad, I can help you learn Japanese words and native-like phrases in conversation which are not taught in textbooks.
I can also teach the nuances of Japanese language to native speakers returning home from oversees and those with Japanese partners.
Teaching in English and Japanese.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
My motto is “Try to be my students’ rainbow.” I aim to be a teacher who can brighten their students’ hearts, and would like to support them not only as a teacher but also as a good friend.

I started teaching Japanese as a professional teacher in February of 2021, and have been dedicating myself to offering enjoyable instructive lessons. Thankfully, I’ve met amazing students since the early stage of my career, and my passion for teaching has never stopped developing. It took me a while, but I feel so lucky and blessed to have finally found what I love to do.

While always turning my thoughts to you and standing with you, I will do my best to help you have confidence and achieve your goals.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
※ My Days Off ※
Sunday afternoons and Mondays (JST) are my days off. I will surely get back to you on Tuesday if you send me a message during that time. I am sorry if this causes you any inconvenience.

I will do my best to make my students feel at ease since I believe that will help them enjoy learning to the utmost of their abilities. It’s my goal to be a teacher/friend with whom they can have a pleasant and meaningful time.

***The Lesson Courses That I Offer to My Students***
・Grammar for Beginners with the Genki Textbooks
・Conversation Practice
・Reading and Writing
Please feel free to talk to me about your needs and ask me any questions!

pro_course_detail.title: English for beginners / How  to start your English learning journey in a practical, smooth, and full of fun way.
pro_course_detail.description: I will help you to start your English learning journey in a practical, smooth, and full of fun way. Join me for a trial lesson, and let's work together on the best ways to help you learn English.

pro_course_detail.title: English for beginners /  Concentrating on grammar, pronunciation, spelling, reading, listening, and writing.
pro_course_detail.description:
I have created lessons for English-speaking beginners who need help to understand the basics of speaking English.  We will use straightforward phrases and expressions to help you with your English speaking. We will also be working on grammar, pronunciation, spelling, reading, listening, and writing. 
I have hundreds of different courses and audio files to help you learn the basics. 
I will be looking forward to meeting you soon :-)

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice / Improve your Spoken English with lessons that cover many topics that you will face very often in your daily life.
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you have trouble making real English conversations? Do you want to improve your Spoken English quickly? 
Don’t worry. Let me help you.
First of all, you need to learn common structures and sentence patterns, common expressions, everyday phrases, and idioms that we use in daily life.
Next, you should learn daily conversations in English for speaking. Focus on every ESL conversation topic until you can speak English automatically and fluently on that topic before moving to the next one.
My lessons cover many topics that you will face very often in your daily life. Each lesson is designed in the form of ESL conversation questions and answers, followed by REAL English conversation, which will benefit your English conversation practice.

pro_course_detail.title: 托福, TOEFL, IELTS, TOEIC, TEFL 和 CELTA 考试准备 / TOEFL, IELTS, TOEIC, TEFL and CELTA exam preparation
pro_course_detail.description: I will focus on how taking TOEFL, IELTS, TOEIC, TEFL, and CELTA sample tests will significantly help you achieve your target score and ultimately be accepted into the program you have or will be enrolling into. I'll also use the best materials and resources, including official TOEFL exam simulators, free PDF, Worksheets, and so on.

pro_course_detail.title: I will expertly proofread, edit, and refine your document (essay, story, article, etc..) within our session
pro_course_detail.description:
In our session, I will thoroughly edit, refine and proofread your work, focusing on:
-Spelling, punctuation, grammar
-Repetition/redundancy
-Flow, coherence, consistency, clarity
-Syntax/style
-Word choice
-Tense
-Readability
-Substantive/structural issues
-Subject-verb agreement

I will provide thorough, in-depth proofreading & editing of your work. I can edit almost any type of content. My goal is to make your paper, email, or document shine! 
I will edit your blog post, press release, letter, essay, web content, personal profile, presentation, short story, marketing e-mail, research proposal, or technical document.

Do you have something in need of editing that is not on this list? Send me a message!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
My conversational style of teaching is based on discussions & primarily on modeling reading feedback exercises) about subjects that you find extremely interesting!    I will let you pick the topics if you like.

  I firmly believe in building up my Student's Confidence, so my feedback is structured on positive, honest, caring, kind, constructive, and encouraging feedback! 

   Teaching English to me is a phenomenal opportunity to help other people learn English!

  I would love to help you speak English clearer!

 Please think of our teacher/learner relationship this way, when I teach you, I'm 100% on your side to help you develop English speaking fluidity skills!  

See you soon in class!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Conversational English or free talk, reading clearly and pronunciation are my strengths & focus for students!      I will listen to you closely & pinpoint words/statements that I can help you to pronounce more accurately by going over interesting articles as I listen for precise words for you to improve your pronunciation.  

This primary form of teaching known as "Modeling" is well proven to help you sound more like a native speaker as your pronunciation improves. 

I will listen intently for any words that we can go back over to improve/break down and drill till we get your pronunciation better!    

If you are not satisfied with the lesson, I will refund the lesson.

Thank you!

Book a trial lesson today & let's get you started on your exciting path to improve your English speaking skills. 

I want to get to know you my new student & hear what are your goals for learning/improving your English. 

I am thrilled to help you gain the skills & confidence needed to really thrive speaking English !
 
Let's openly talk about what is the best strategy to improve your conversational English!
