Together let's discuss a custom tailored strategy to improve your English starting today!

Thank you!

pro_course_detail.title: English Conversation.   Everyday conversational English is one of my specialties.  Lets talk about any topic that interests you most!
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's Practice your English speaking skills with a True Native Speaker.  I was born in California and grew up in Minnesota where my schooling was Outstanding especially in clear English Pronunciation & Reading Correctly.    I will gently help you by correcting your Speech & Pronouncing words more Concisely, Clearly, and Fluidly!    We will always strive for a free-flowing intonation discussion.  I will stop you at times to help you with better word choices and restructure your sentences as I hear the need to make your English grammar better.
 
You are always warmly welcome to tell me you like or do not like the materials/topics were working with or the discussion we are having.  I want us to have our English conversations about issues that are highly interesting to you!

 I want to make every lesson a happy memorable respectful learning occasion, so please communicate your thoughts, so we can tailor the course to help you.

This lesson ideally is geared for us, to have a  "Conversation in English".

(Please know my specialty is speaking in English, communication or communicating in everyday English, proper clear pronunciation & outstanding reading skills).

P.S. If you want to learn how to speak as we speak in the United States of America on the street, at the office, at the mall, etc.   I have lived all over the United States for 50-years & I know how people talk thru-out America.   
 
Thank You, so much and I am eager for our first English class and many more to follow.


Finally, if for any reason you feel you did not like the lesson. 

 Please ask for a "Full Refund"  & you will get a "Full Refund" no questions asked!  Please don't leave a negative comment as I work very hard every single lesson to help you!
Thank you so very much!
See you in class!
Teacher Lawrence.

pro_course_detail.title: Reading & Pronunciation.   My Proven Method is called "Shadowing or Modeling"  I will read clearly first and then you will repeat it next! We will work hard to improve your pronunciation immediately!
pro_course_detail.description:
This fun-filled lesson will involve me showing you "How to Read more Accurately" & bringing that reading to life!    Accuracy is Key, not speed many need real assistance in this area!   A high percentage of students speak at a speed that does not allow them to be understood well.  I will analyze your entire speech pattern pitch, pace, fluidity, and every nuance of your reading!

 If you want to read with serious conviction this lesson is especially for you! 

The focus will be on helping the student pronounce words better!  Also to learn how to help you get people's attention if you have a public reading and bring those words to life!!!

 
I have some terrific books on conversational English books for adults .

I had a tutor who taught me how to read & pronounce words correctly & made me excel in reading and pronunciation!    I was always reading two grades higher and was one of the very best readers in my school!

If you or your child wants to learn how to truly read at a higher level, then contact me right away, and let's work together to make you start making an excellent reader!

Start pronouncing words better right away!   
See you in class soon.


P.S.  Just wanted to say to all the students I work with, I understand you may be busy and are unable to have classes from time to time.  Please never let that stop you from booking classes, I always look forward to seeing and hearing the voices of my students.    I view learning English as a lifelong pursuit and please if time goes by and you want a class comes on back I'd love to see you, work with you, and help you sharpen up your English pronunciation and verbal skills !!!

Finally, if for any reason you feel you did not like the lesson.  Please ask for a "Full Refund"  & you will get a "Full Refund" no questions asked! 

Please don't leave a negative comment as I work very hard every single lesson for my students!   

Thank you and have a wonderful day!
Sincerely & Respectfully:
Teacher Lawrence.

pro_course_detail.title: Job Interviews Preparation, College Entrance Interviews! *Any Important Interview.
pro_course_detail.description:
Are you preparing for a job interview?    This is your course to fine-tune you & improve your interview performance!

 I have helped numerous people just like you, who needed assistance.   Many expressed how they immediately became more confident, more concise, and prepared, and applied simple strategies to make them extremely prepared for their job interview.   

I love helping people prepare for job interviews or any interview!

We'll focus on..... 

1. Interview questions.  I have lists of possible questions you may experience during interviews.
We will rehearse many likely questions you may encounter during your job interview!  Together we will team up & practice these questions for you to be more relaxed & ready for the interviewer's questions.

2. Pronunciation, I will help you with your answers.  I want to help you emphasize your strength's to come through clearly & concisely.

3. Body language, I will analyze your body language & look for ways to improve your total message for the interview.    I offer suggestions to make you look even more professional.

4. Psychological techniques, I will teach you the way's to win mentally and emotionally during the interview process.   Rarely talked about.

I have interviewed many people & know what many interviewers look for & I have hired people for important positions.   I have studied this entire process extensively & was once one course away from becoming a therapist with my practice!   

Let me help you, experience what an experienced teacher can do to help you "Relax" & understand what it feels like to truly have someone build a confident interviewee!

Check out my profile and see the numerous students who I have helped to refine their interview skills & remember these lessons are a valuable investment in you!    

Finally, if for any reason you feel you did not like the lesson for any reason, private message me, so I can give you a "Full Refund"!   Please do not leave a negative comment, I can refund you instead!

pro_course_detail.title: Public Speaking/Speeches/Lectures for All Occasions!      I have helped people speak to large audiences ranging from hundreds to thousands !
pro_course_detail.description:
I have been going to school every week to improve my public speaking expertise for nearly 20-years!   I want to help you to learn my compilation of techniques & skills to get your message across more clearly and make the impact you desire!

I can help refine a speech you plan to give by helping you to make that speech more fluid and guide you from A-Z on how to present a dynamic powerful speech to make your audience remember more of what you're trying to say!   

So, whether it's a speech for your work, college, award acceptance, or any other reason you need to make the audience understand what is your message I can help coach you to greater success in your next Public Speech or Business Presentation!

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS   -   *Seasoned/Experienced & Highly Trained "IELTS" Speaking Test Examiner!
pro_course_detail.description:
Let me help you prepare for the IELTS  *Speaking Test!   (International English Learning Testing System).

I was trained by the "Cebu International Academy" to administer the IELTS test!

I will give you "All the knowledge I have to help you", to do your very best on the "IELTS Test"!    We will then drill, drill & drill Mock IELTS Tests as if you are performing the IELTS Test and I will actively give you feedback to refine your answers!

I was called in to give the IELTS Speaking Test to adults at the Cebu International Academy & now I want to do all I can to share my insights on *Actual IELTS Tests & work with you to help you do your very best on your IELTS Test.

   I will subtly give you "Real-Time Feedback" as I am hearing your answers to my IELTS questions.  This is why you must record out lessons to get the subtle restructuring of your answer as I hear the need.   This will not occur unless I hear a clear deficiency in your answer and you can then redo your answer on the spot!

My primary process to prepare you for the IELTS speaking portion of the test is to give you *Mock IELTS Tests, many times with feedback!   This process builds up your confidence as I will be giving you feedback as I hear or areas we can strengthen your response to typical IELTS questions!      
 I have had some of my students get an 8.5 on the speaking portion of the "IELTS Test".     *Results vary from student to student and there is no guarantee what any student will achieve on their IELTS speaking test after our classes, but it shows what has been achieved with great effort !!!  
 Please don't leave a negative comment...
If, for any reason, you are unhappy or dissatisfied with my lesson, please private message me for a "Full Refund".   

Respectfully:
Teacher Lawrence.

teacher_info.intro:
◉◉◉ NEW◉◉◉ Perfect Integrated Course ◉◉◉ for Super Advanced and Proficiency◉◉◉ 

Hello everyone! I’m Yukari. I’m a Japanese community tutor.
I grew up in Tokyo and then in Yokohama. I speak standard Japanese.

Now I live in France. My hobbies are running with my dog, yoga, swimming and playing the piano. Other activities I enjoy are skiing and hiking. My interests are art, architecture as well as sciences although I’m not an expert :) I am an open-minded person. I like meeting new cultures.

みなさんこんにちは。由香里（ゆかり）です。
東京と横浜で育ちました。標準の日本語を話します。

今はフランスに住んでいます。趣味は、愛犬と走ること、ヨガ、水泳そしてピアノを弾くこと。スキーやハイキングなどアウトドアのアクティビティも大好きです。関心があるのは、アートや建築、専門知識はありませんがサイエンスにも興味があります。そして、異文化に触れて新しい発見をするのが大好きです。
teacher_info.short_signature: Expert in publishing and advertising gives creative lessons to bring your Japanese to the next level
teacher_info.about_me:
◉◉◉ NEW◉◉◉ Perfect Integrated Course ◉◉◉ for Super Advanced and Proficiency◉◉◉ 

Hello everyone! I’m Yukari. I’m a Japanese community tutor.
I grew up in Tokyo and then in Yokohama. I speak standard Japanese.

Now I live in France. My hobbies are running with my dog, yoga, swimming and playing the piano. Other activities I enjoy are skiing and hiking. My interests are art, architecture as well as sciences although I’m not an expert :) I am an open-minded person. I like meeting new cultures.

みなさんこんにちは。由香里（ゆかり）です。
東京と横浜で育ちました。標準の日本語を話します。

今はフランスに住んでいます。趣味は、愛犬と走ること、ヨガ、水泳そしてピアノを弾くこと。スキーやハイキングなどアウトドアのアクティビティも大好きです。関心があるのは、アートや建築、専門知識はありませんがサイエンスにも興味があります。そして、異文化に触れて新しい発見をするのが大好きです。
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have worked in communication for over 30 years. My professional experiences in publishing and advertising have allowed me to identify where people tend to encounter the most difficulties in learning Japanese. Let me help you to tackle these problems! 
I am good at encouraging people to speak. I’ll do my best to make your learning engaging and fun!


30年間以上コミュニケーションに携わる仕事をしてきました。出版と広告で働いた経験から、外国語として日本語を学ぶとき、難関になるポイントを把握できるようになりました。私と一緒に、難関をラクラク突破しましょう！
ひとの話を聞くのが得意です。皆さんが楽しんで日本語を勉強できるよう、最善を尽くします！
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lessons are for elementary (understanding Hiragana and basic grammar), intermediate, advanced and proficient students. Starting the second session, they are tailored to meet each student’s personality, level as well as requests. I’m sorry, I do not teach children under 15 years old.
I would appreciate it if you could notify me at least 24 hours ahead of when you need to cancel or reschedule a lesson. Thank you for understanding!


初級（ひらがなと基本の文法がわかるレベル）、中級、上級、最上級の日本語学習者を対象としたレッスンです。２回めの授業から、それぞれの生徒さんのパーソナリティ、レベル、ご要望に合わせてカスタマイズします。15歳以下のお子さんを対象にしていません。

course_info.trial_description: The trial lesson is a great opportunity to know each other. Let's talk freely and ask questions mutually. It also allows me to prepare classes that would suit you.

pro_course_detail.title: ■■■ Strategic CONVERSATION Course (Intermediate to Proficiency) ■■■ 戦略会話コース（中級から最上級まで） ■■■
pro_course_detail.description:
Students practise speaking fluency and learn new vocabulary and expressions around a conversation. Themes, articles, videos or questions are provided beforehand according to their level and requests.
Prerequisites are understanding Hiragana and basic grammar. 
 
語彙を増やし、表現力を身につけて会話力を高めるクラスです。あなたのレベルや希望を踏まえて予め用意されたテーマや記事、ビデオ、質問などを中心に、どんどん話しましょう。
基本的にひらがなと初歩文法がわかることが前提です。

pro_course_detail.title: ■■■ Practical GENERAL JAPANESE Course  (Elementary to Proficiency)  ■■■ 実践日本語コース（初級から最上級まで） ■■■
pro_course_detail.description:
This course includes different aspects of the Japanese language such as grammar, special expressions, honorific use or writing in addition to a general conversation. Through the subjects of their interests or what’s going on in the world, students learn the language that they can practise in real life right away. 
Prerequisites are understanding Hiragana and basic grammar. 

一般会話に加え、日本語能力を高めるポイント（文法、特殊な表現、敬語の使い方、作文など）を習得するコースです。生徒さんの関心分野や社会の出来事などをふまえ、すぐに実践で使える日本語を勉強します。
基本的にひらがなと初歩文法がわかることが前提です。

pro_course_detail.title: ■■■ Perfect INTEGRATED Course  (Advanced to Proficiency)  ■■■ 特別総合コース（上級から最上級） ■■■
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is specially designed for learners of the most advanced and proficiency level to master the Japanese language. It consists of 4 different types of lessons that you will have alternately. The set of the 4 lessons enhances your abilities in reading, listening, speaking and writing while all the four lessons.
A: Reading an essay to extend your knowledge about the Japanese culture then holding a discussion B: Listening to a news analysis podcast program and expanding vocabulary to be able to hold social/political discussions C: Learning polished honorific expressions or (and) colloquial/informal expressions that are not in textbooks D: Writing a text on provided subjects.
Please have at least one conversation or general Japanese lesson with me beforehand in order to plan the course that suits you. 
 
上級から最上級の学習者に向けた総合コースです。４つの異なったレッスンを交互に続けることによって、読・聴・話・書　の全てのスキルを伸ばし日本語をマスターしていきます。
A：エッセイを読み日本文化への知識を高め、ディスカッションで意見交換します。B：ニュース解説ポッドキャストを聴き、いまの社会や政治を語る際に使われているボキャブラリーを覚えるとともに、発言に必要なテクニックを得ます。C：日本語テキストブックに載っていない一歩進んだ敬語、あるいは口語の表現を身につけます。D：その都度決められるテーマに沿って文章を作成します。さらに上級の表現や日本語らしい文章構成を習得します。
このコースを予約する前に、少なくとも１回戦略会話あるいは実戦日本語のレッスンを受けてください。その中で、あなたにピッタリのプランを計画しましょう。

pro_course_detail.description: 在这节课你将与我一起用中文进行交流，我作为中文母语者会与你讨论中国最热门的话题与新闻，为你带来最准确的指导和交流。In this class, you will communicate with me in Chinese. As a native speaker of Chinese, I will discuss the hottest topics and news in China with you. I'll bring you the most accurate guidance and communication.

pro_course_detail.description: 在这节课你将与我一起学习中文语法，我作为中文母语者会通过向你展示中国最热门的话题与新闻，为你带来最准确指导和交流。In this class, you will learn Chinese grammar with me. As a native speaker of Chinese, I will bring you the most accurate guidance and communication by showing you the hottest topics and news in China.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
As long as the students come to class, the teacher will prepare everything for you! 

Before class: understand the current level of students, design teaching plan for students.

In class: prepare PPT, use picture display method, listening and speaking method and other teaching methods, teach students according to their aptitude, and use different teaching methods for different students. Guide the students to speak more, help them correct their mistakes and make them understand the complicated grammar better.

After class: according to the students' shortcomings, assign the corresponding homework, and carefully check the students' homework.

pro_course_detail.title: HSK1-2初级汉语（Elementary Chinese）
pro_course_detail.description:
*Update*If you cannot find a time that suits your shedule,please send me a message to coordinate an alternative time.
_________________________________________________________________
This course is for beginners of learning Chinese,In the class,It includes HSK1 and HSK2.
HSK1:There are 15 lessons in HSK1,I will arrange courses according to your Chinese level,We will learn Pinyin、Word、Grammar、Text、Pronunciation、Characters.After finishing HSK1,you will grasp 150 words and basic grammar like the Interrogative pronoun"什么、谁、哪、几、哪儿、怎么样“，“在....呢”，“是.....的”etc.
HSK2:There are 15 lessons in HSK2,After fininshing HSK2，you will grasp 300 words and basic grammar like the 比sentence,Complements of State,the Aspect Particle 着.
After you finish hsk2, you can have a simple communication with Chinese people.
I will provide:
1.Textbook(PDF)
2.Workbook(PDF)
3.Homework
......

pro_course_detail.title: HSK3-4中级汉语（Intermediate Chinese）
pro_course_detail.description:
*Update*If you cannot find a time that suits your shedule,please send me a message to coordinate an alternative time.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________
This course is for intermediate of learning Chinese who want to improve their Chinese or pass the HSK exam.In the class,It includes HSK3 and HSK4.
HSK3:There are 20 lessons in HSK3.We will arrange the course according to your level.We will learn Word、Grammar、Text、Characters、Common Saying in the class,After finishing HSK3,you will grasp 600 words and some important grammar like the 把sentence,被sentence,又...又，越A越B，一边...一边......
HSK4:There are 20 lessons in HSK4.We will arrange the course according to your level.We will learn Word、Grammar、Text、Characters、Culture,After finishing HSK4,you will grasp 1200 words and some important grammar like the 不仅...而且，即使....也，既...又/也/还......
I will provide:

3.Homework
......

teacher_info.intro:
Hi! Thank you for taking the time to look into me!

My name is Luke, and I am from the UK. I hold a degree in History and Politics, and have worked in a variety of industries including: UK Civil Service, NHS, and multiple high end international retail brands.

I am based in Brazil and have a basic understanding of Portuguese as well as Italian.

Beyond work, I enjoy visiting art exhibits, travelling and meeting new people! In addition, I have a fondness for writing and currently have 2 published collections of poetry!
teacher_info.short_signature: Private English teacher for 2 years, with experience in public facing roles in various industries!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi! Thank you for taking the time to look into me!

My name is Luke, and I am from the UK. I hold a degree in History and Politics, and have worked in a variety of industries including: UK Civil Service, NHS, and multiple high end international retail brands.

I am based in Brazil and have a basic understanding of Portuguese as well as Italian.

Beyond work, I enjoy visiting art exhibits, travelling and meeting new people! In addition, I have a fondness for writing and currently have 2 published collections of poetry!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
My style is more of a relaxed, informal approach. I will obviously have a structure to the lessons, but wish to adapt them according to what the student requires.

So if you are seeking lessons in basic spoken English, or all the way to suitable professional level proficiency in English, I am more than happy to help.

If nothing else, I can only give encouragement and I will be happy to support anyone who wants to try! That is the key to learning anything - showing eagerness to want to learn and effort!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My initial lesson will be used to measure the students grasp of English, and to understand what they seek from the lessons. I will adapt my lessons accordingly from there, so if you are looking to improve your written work, I am here for you as much as I am here to support you in saying your first words!

I have experience teaching children (I taught at a school while at university), and believe in having patience and supporting! I am here to give feedback too, and reassure students that English, while a daunting language, is not as daunting as it may first seem.

course_info.trial_description: Hi! This lesson is suitable for those wishing to learn English (I am British, but can speak American/US English as well). If you have any enquiries regarding this lesson please let me know!

pro_course_detail.title: English for Beginners/Intermediate/Advanced
pro_course_detail.description:
If you are having difficulty understanding English (American or British), or needing assistance with developing your own conversational abilities (informal or formal), then this is the lesson for you!

Below are some examples of the topics covered in the lesson:

- Work place etiquette
- Improving pronunciation
- Discussing current affairs and the news
- Discussing hobbies and interests
- Expressions/Idioms used in conversation
- Life in the UK, and how English can differ region to region
- Reading articles (suitable to your level) and helping with pronunciation and terminologies. Typically followed with discussions about the article

If you have any enquiries please feel free to message me!

teacher_info.intro:
みなさん、こんにちは！私の名前は「のぞみ」です^^
日本語教師(にほんごきょうし)の資格(しかく)を持(も)っています。
私の授業(じゅぎょう)では基本的(きほんてき)に「日本語」で「日本語」を教(おし)えます。そして会話中心(かいわちゅうしん)の授業です。

これだけ見ると難(むずか)しそうだと思(おも)うかもしれません。
しかし！私はひとりひとりに合わせた日本語で授業を進(すす)めます^^
ですから、みなさんはリラックスして日本語の授業を受(う)けることができます^^

안녕하세요! 저는 노조미라고 합니다.
작년에 일본어교육능력검정시험에 합격되어서 여기 italki에서 일본어강사 일을 시작되었습니다.

그리고 일본사람이지만 일본어에 대해도 공부하고 있습니다.
여기서는 여러분께서 긴장하지 마시고 편하게 보실 수 있는 수업을 하겠습니다!
teacher_info.short_signature: 韓国語を話すことができる教師
teacher_info.about_me:
みなさん、こんにちは！私の名前は「のぞみ」です^^
日本語教師(にほんごきょうし)の資格(しかく)を持(も)っています。
私の授業(じゅぎょう)では基本的(きほんてき)に「日本語」で「日本語」を教(おし)えます。そして会話中心(かいわちゅうしん)の授業です。

これだけ見ると難(むずか)しそうだと思(おも)うかもしれません。
しかし！私はひとりひとりに合わせた日本語で授業を進(すす)めます^^
ですから、みなさんはリラックスして日本語の授業を受(う)けることができます^^

Hello!
My name is Nozomi. I am a qualified Japanese teacher.
Here at italki we offer conversation-based Japanese lessons!
For more information, please watch my introduction video:)

안녕하세요! 저는 노조미라고 합니다.
작년에 일본어교육능력검정시험에 합격되어서 여기 italki에서 일본어강사 일을 시작되었습니다.
지금은 일본어강사양성강의에 다니고 2022년5월쯤에 수료 예정입니다.
원래 어학에 대한 관심이 많아서 지금은 한국어와 영어 공부를 하고 있습니다!
그리고 일본사람이지만 일본어에 대해도 공부하고 있습니다.
여기서는 여러분께서 긴장하지 마시고 편하게 보실 수 있는 수업을 하겠습니다!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
私の授業では基本的に「日本語」で「日本語」を教えます。そして会話中心の授業です。
これだけ見ると難しそうだと思うかもしれません。
しかし、私はみなさんそれぞれのレベルに合わせた日本語で授業を進めますので、リラックスしながら日本語の授業を受けることができます^^

◎キッズレッスンは受け付けておりません。予めご了承ください。

In my class, I basically teach "Japanese" in "Japanese". And it is a conversation-oriented class.
You may think it looks difficult when you look at it this way.
However, I teach in Japanese that is suited to each student's level, so you can take Japanese classes while relaxing ^^.
◎Kids' lessons are not accepted. 

저희 수업에서는 일본어로 일본어를 가르치겠습니다.
하지만 저는 여러분의 레벨에 맞는 일본어로 수업을 하기 때문에 여러분께서는 릴랙스하면서 일본어 수업을 보실 수 있을 겁니다!
그리고 저는 약 1년동안 한국인 친구한테 일본어를 가르친 경험이 있습니다!
그러므로 한국어를 쓰면서 일본어를 가르칠 수도 있으니 편하게 말씀해 주세요!!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
私の授業は2種類あります。
①ニュースを読む授業
(NHK NEWS WEB EASYなどを使って、ニュースに出てくる語彙や発音、文法について学んだあとニュース内容についてディスカッションをします。)

②フリートークの授業
(フリートークの内容はなんでも大丈夫です！とにかく日本語で話してみましょう！

〇ビデオを付けないで授業をすることも可能です。レッスン予約後、メッセージでご連絡お願いします^^

I have two types of classes.
(1) News reading class.

(2) Free talk classes
(You can talk about anything in free talk! Let's talk in Japanese anyway!)

◯It is also possible to have a lesson without video. Please contact me by message after booking a lesson ^^.

제 수업은 종류가 2 가지 있습니다!

1. 뉴스를 읽는 수업.
[NHK NEWS WEB EASY등을 사용해서 뉴스에 대해 같이 디스커션을 하거나 뉴스에 나온 한자, 조사, 접속사...등을 배우는 레슨.]

2. 프리토크나 수업. 
[내용은 아무거나 괜찮습니다! 아무튼 일본어로 이야기해 봅시다!^^] 

○비디오 오프로 레슨하는 것도 가능합니다. 그 경우에는 레슨 전에 연락해 주세요!

cert_info.description: この資格は日本語教師に必要とされている資格の一つです。
cert_info.institution: 日本国際教育支援協会
cert_info.certificate: 日本語教育能力検定試験

course_info.trial_description:
このトライアルレッスンは、
・ニュースを読むレッスン
・フリートークレッスン
・ディスカッションレッスン
の中から選ぶことができます^^

レッスンリクエスト後、メッセージでご希望のレッスンをお伝えください。

이 레슨은
・뉴스를 읽은 레슨
・프리토킹 레슨
・디스커션 레슨
 이것들 안에서 고르실 수 있습니다^^

레슨 신청하신 후, 메시지로 어느 레슨을 받고 싶으신지 말씀해 주세요.

pro_course_detail.title: Read and discuss the news(N1-N3)
pro_course_detail.description:
≪このレッスンでできること≫
◎書き言葉の表現を学ぶことができます！
◎自分の意見を日本語で話す練習ができます！
【読む力】がつきます！
～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～
この授業(じゅぎょう)では、NHK NEWS WEB EASYやNHK NEWS WEBなどを使(つか)って、一緒(いっしょ)に日本語(にほんご)でニュースを読(よ)んだ後(あと)、ニュースについて話(はなし)をします。
≪読む力(ちから)≫　≪聞(き)く力≫　≪話(はな)す力≫　が身(み)につきます^^

≪レッスンの内容≫
①ニュースを読みます。
②単語を確認します。
③ニュースの内容についてディスカッションをします。

【English】
In this class, we will use NHK NEWS WEB EASY and NHK NEWS WEB to read the news together in Japanese and then exchange opinions about the news.
You will acquire the ability to read, listen, and speak.

【한국어】
이 수업은 NHK NEWS WEB EASY나 NHK NEWS WEB등을 사용해서 같이 일본어로 뉴스를 읽은 후, 그 뉴스에 대한 의견을 교환합니다.
[읽는 힘] [듣는 힘] [말하는 힘] 이 몸에 붙입니다^^

※レッスン後、FBを送ります※

pro_course_detail.title: Free Conversations  30/45/60 min（N1-N5）
pro_course_detail.description:
≪このレッスンでできること≫
◎日本人(にほんじん)と日本語(にほんご)で話(はな)すことができます！
◎自分(じぶん)が言(い)いたいことを日本語(にほんご)で言(い)えるようになります！
◎【話(はな)す力(ちから)】【聞(き)く力(ちから)】が身(み)につきます！

外国語(がいこくご)を学(まな)ぶ上(うえ)で大切(たいせつ)な事(こと)はアウトプットをすること！
まずは日本語(にほんご)で話(はな)してみましょう^^

◎授業(じゅぎょう)が終わった後にFBを送ります。

The most important thing in learning a foreign language is to produce output.
Try speaking in Japanese first!

◎I will send you a FB message after the class.

외국어 공부의 비결은 바로 아웃풋을 하는 것입니다!
우선 일본어로 많이 이야기해 봅십다!!

◎수업이 끝난 후, 피드백을 보내드리겟습니다♪

teacher_info.intro: Hi, I am Caren from Hawaii, US. I have been teaching English for 17 + years and I am excited to help you with your English language journey.
teacher_info.introduction: Hello, my name is Caren and I would like to help you improve your English. I have 10 + years of English teaching experience. I enjoy helping people achieve their goals and will work with you to find the methods that work best for you. I provide a comfortable, safe and fun approach to language learning. I am a polyglot myself and enjoy learning languages, as a result I am aware of the challenges you face learning English. Do not worry, I will help you succeed. I have experience teaching children as well as adults. I am currently employed as a teacher outside of Italki as well.
teacher_info.about_me: Hi, I am Caren from Hawaii, US. I have been teaching English for 17 + years and I am excited to help you with your English language journey.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I enjoy helping people achieve their goals and will work with you to find the methods that work best for you. I provide a comfortable, safe and fun approach to language learning. I am a polyglot myself and enjoy learning languages, as a result I am aware of the challenges you face learning English. Do not worry, I will help you succeed. I have experience teaching children as well as adults. I am currently employed as a teacher outside of Italki as well.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My style is informal. I want you to feel comfortable and for the lesson to be as fun as possible. That said, I do alter my teaching techniques to adapt to your English goals. I use lots of different materials to meet your needs and learning style.
teacher_info.cancel_policy: Because I believe learning should be fun and without stress I have a flexible cancellation policy. Just let me know in advance and we can usually reschedule the class, if you need to miss it.

course_info.trial_description: Welcome. Let's give this a try. I am looking forward to meeting you.  This will be a fun, informative class where we get to know each other in a relaxed, no-pressure setting. :) We can also talk about a plan for for future lessons based on what works for you.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal English Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description: Do you feel scared to speak in English? If you want to gain confidence with a patient and understanding teacher, I am here for you.  I also learn languages and know what it is like to feel afraid to speak.  We will work together to develop your comfort and confidence with English using tools that make it fun. Your time will 'fly by' and before you know it, you will be more proficient with speaking. Come practice with a native and have fun!

pro_course_detail.title: English for Living in the USA
pro_course_detail.description: Have you ever visited or lived in the USA and realized you could not understand what people were saying? If so this course is for you. In this course you will learn everyday language and expressions. You will practice dialogues with a native speaker and practice using new expressions while talking about everyday life situations. There are a total of 21 Lessons in this course.

pro_course_detail.title: English through Reading
pro_course_detail.description: In this course students will read books with a native teacher (students can pick from teacher's library or choose another source with teacher approval). Though reading students will develop correct pronunciation, vocabulary and sentence structure all while having fun reading books. 30 minute lessons are geared towards children and young adults, 18 and younger only please.

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Sarah. I’m an avid language learner myself, and I hold a bachelor degree in English Language Teaching. I’m Mexican, and I live in the north of Mexico. I’ve taught English and French, but it is Spanish which is my mother tongue and the language that brings me here to italki!
I love reading, taking walks, watching movies and series, as well as learning new languages. I’ve been learning Italian for the last three years, and that is something I thoroughly enjoy.
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Sarah. I’m an avid language learner myself, and I hold a bachelor degree in English Language Teaching. I’m Mexican, and I live in the north of Mexico. I’ve taught English and French, but it is Spanish which is my mother tongue and the language that brings me here to italki!
I love reading, taking walks, watching movies and series, as well as learning new languages. I’ve been learning Italian for the last three years, and that is something I thoroughly enjoy.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I’m a firm believer that language is one of the strongest elements that bind people together. Learning a new language is learning a new world view. 
I’m a flexible and student-centered teacher. I propose to you primarily, conversation-focused lessons. I enjoy talking about many topics specially about culture, history, and society. I can also work with you on lessons oriented to other areas such as reading, writing or listening comprehension.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
As I’ve mentioned before, my teaching method is focused on the learner. Lessons will be tailored to your interests and needs. 
I teach adult students from beginner to advanced levels. 
In my lessons I use tools such as videos and texts that elicit oral production in students. I also use textbooks, presentations and other digital resources to support the language learning process. 
I hope to see you in one of my trial lessons. 
¡Hasta pronto!

course_info.trial_description: This is a brief introductory lesson. We will discuss your needs, interests, and goals for your language learning process. We can do little warm up exercices to assess some of your skills in Spanish.

pro_course_detail.title: ¡Aprendamos español!
pro_course_detail.description: In this type of lesson you will be able to practice different linguistic skills for your Spanish learning process. This will be practiced with exercises and activities customized to your interests and needs.

pro_course_detail.title: ¡Conversemos en español!
pro_course_detail.description: In this type of lesson you will be able to practice and improve your speaking skills in Spanish. This will be practiced with topics, exercises and activities customized to your interests and needs. Pronunciation, enunciation and fluency will be reinforced.

teacher_info.intro:
Soy Patricia, una mexicana apasionada del aprendizaje de lenguas y de su enseñanza. Me motiva ayudar a otros a alcanzar sus metas relacionadas al dominio del idioma (CERTIFICACIÓN DELE A2, B1, B2 y C1) y que su uso te abra puertas y oportunidades que jamás imaginaste.
Do not worry if you are beginner, I speak English as well and a little bit of French.
teacher_info.about_me:
Soy Patricia, una mexicana apasionada del aprendizaje de lenguas y de su enseñanza. Me motiva ayudar a otros a alcanzar sus metas relacionadas al dominio del idioma (CERTIFICACIÓN DELE A2, B1, B2 y C1) y que su uso te abra puertas y oportunidades que jamás imaginaste.
Do not worry if you are beginner, I speak English as well and a little bit of French.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Me considero una tutora amable, paciente y bromista. El nivel de estrés al aprender un idioma lo mantengo al mínimo porque sé que se desarrollará mejor una clase cuando se disfruta.
Si deseas preparación para CERTIFICACIÓN DELE te puedo ayudar principalmente el la parte de la producción oral y comprensión oral.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Mi enfoque es comunicativo centrado en la producción oral y comprensión oral, ya que considero que el habla es el vehículo de interacción entre seres humanos. El aprender un idioma debe ser para aplicarlo en la vida real y que solucione problemas o permita el desarrollo del individuo en otro contexto sin sentirse limitado.
Utilizo materiales y ejercicios similares a los desarrollados en la CERTIFICACIÓN ELE PRODUCCIÓN ORAL, los hacemos juntos y te doy retroalimentación sobre posibles errores de gramática y/o pronunciación. 
Si tienes un tema gramatical en específico también te proporciono explicación, ejercicios y juegos. 
Recuerda que la mejor forma de aprender un idioma es hablándolo.

course_info.trial_description:
¡Vamos a conocernos mientras prácticas tu ESPAÑOL!
Conoce mi forma de enseñar, la cual es enfocada en escuchar y hablar. 
Recuerda que la mejor forma de hablar un idioma es hablándolo.

pro_course_detail.title: ESPAÑOL CONVERSACIONAL
pro_course_detail.description:
Práctica de comprensión oral y producción oral. 
Práctica de pronunciación y corrección de posibles errores. 
Creación de mapa mental para ayudar en la producción oral.

teacher_info.intro: Hello, my name is Addie! In 2022 I graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Education from The Ohio State University, double majoring in World Language Education and Spanish and minoring in World Literatures. I am passionate about learning languages, meeting new people, and engaging in cultural discussion. I would love to help you practice your English!
teacher_info.short_signature: BSED in World Language Education from The Ohio State University
teacher_info.about_me: Hello, my name is Addie! In 2022 I graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Education from The Ohio State University, double majoring in World Language Education and Spanish and minoring in World Literatures. I am passionate about learning languages, meeting new people, and engaging in cultural discussion. I would love to help you practice your English!
teacher_info.about_teacher: My teaching philosophy is centered around immersion and experiential learning. I believe that engaging in meaningful intercultural exchange is one of the best ways to grow in the target language. As a World Language Education and Spanish double major, I understand the nuances of language acquisition and I'm excited to help you navigate the English language!
teacher_info.teaching_style: My lessons follow a flexible, conversational structure and will be personalized to suit your language goals. As we chat, I will help you refine your fluency by offering tips and corrections. When needed, we can supplement our discussions with explanations of grammatical and structural concepts. I understand that mistakes are an important part of the learning process and encourage my students to take risks and have fun with the language!

course_info.trial_description:
ADULT LEARNERS
Let’s chat! ¡Charlemos! This customized, informal lesson is ideal for experienced beginner, intermediate, and advanced learners who want to practice their conversational skills in English. I will suggest corrections and tips to refine your fluency and enable you to better express your ideas in English! Depending on your learning goals and/or preferences, you can send me a discussion topic in advance or I can pose questions to guide our conversation. See you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice (Adult Learners)
pro_course_detail.description: Let’s chat! ¡Charlemos! This customized, informal lesson is ideal for experienced beginner, intermediate, and advanced learners who want to practice their conversational skills in English. I will suggest corrections and tips to refine your fluency and enable you to better express your ideas in English! Depending on your learning goals and/or preferences, you can send me a discussion topic in advance or I can pose questions to guide our conversation. See you soon!

teacher_info.intro:
¡Hola! Me llamo Franz, soy de Chile y me encantaría poder ayudarte con tu español/inglés/portuguésl :)
Hello! My name is Franz, I'm from Chile and I'm here to help you with your Spanish or Portuguese!
Oi! Meu nome é Franz e gostaria muito de ajudá-lo com seu espanhol ou inglês.

I have studied geology, I am very passionate about meeting new people from different cultures and also I enjoy to learn more about different topics like science, economy, history, etc. Oh! And actually the music is one of my biggest hobbies! I would be more than happy to help you with everything you need! Do not hesitate to contact me anytime if you have any questions :)

Hope to see you soon!
teacher_info.about_me:
¡Hola! Me llamo Franz, soy de Chile y me encantaría poder ayudarte con tu español/inglés/portuguésl :)
Hello! My name is Franz, I'm from Chile and I'm here to help you with your Spanish or Portuguese!
Oi! Meu nome é Franz e gostaria muito de ajudá-lo com seu espanhol ou inglês.

I have studied geology, I am very passionate about meeting new people from different cultures and also I enjoy to learn more about different topics like science, economy, history, etc. Oh! And actually the music is one of my biggest hobbies! I would be more than happy to help you with everything you need! Do not hesitate to contact me anytime if you have any questions :)

Hope to see you soon!
teacher_info.about_teacher: I've already had experience teaching at schools and I have been able to work with children and adults as well, so I can easily adapt myself to every student.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My lessons are going to be focused on all the important topics when you learn a new language, that said, we will go through conversation, reading and of course all the specific points needed when learning another language (grammar, speaking, listening and reading comprehension, the four main aspects). Anyway, it all depends on every student because everyone has their own methods to learn something new!

course_info.trial_description:
This lesson would be perfect to meet each other and also to check what's your language level, so I can be able to adjust the next lessons according to your level and needs :) I'm more than open to hear any opinion and to talk about whatever you want! :)

If you have any questions, feel free to contact me :)
Hope to see you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: Let's talk in Spanish!
pro_course_detail.description:
If what you need is a special space to practice your spoken Spanish, then this is the right lesson for you! I'm more than happy to talk with you about any topics of your interest (for example, music, cultures, different hobbies, science, food, etc). You will be the one in charge to choose the subject and I will make sure to prepare a great and interesting lesson for you!
If you have any questions, feel free to contact me! :)
Hope to see you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: Ready to learn Spanish?
pro_course_detail.description:
Hello! If your goal is to learn more about this wonderful, worldwide spoken and interesting language, then you're in the right place! This lesson will be organized according to your needs and you can also learn more about the specific skills needed to overcome any test in the future :)

If you have any questions, feel free to contact me :)
Hope to see you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: Are you scared of grammar?
pro_course_detail.description:
Hey there!
If what you really need is to get better with your grammar sentence structure, to learn more about the rules within the Spanish language or just to overcome your doubts with some special cases or topics, then this would be perfect for you! Every lesson will be personalized to ensure that after this, you can be able to express your ideas in the right way with no mistakes!

If you have any questions, feel free to contact me :)
Hope to see you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: ¿Quieres comenzar a aprender inglés? :) / Queres aprender inglês? :)
pro_course_detail.description:
¡Estaré feliz de poder ayudarte desde la base de este importante idioma hasta temas más avanzados y complejos, también podemos practicar cosas de tu interés y, si cada alumno lo desea, puede haber tarea :)
Cualquier consulta, me puedes escribir sin problemas.
¡Nos vemos!

pro_course_detail.title: Você quer falar português?
pro_course_detail.description:
Olá! Como você está? Estou aqui para ajudar você no início da sua viagem com o português.
Seria um prazer para mim!
Espero poder ver você em breve!

teacher_info.intro: ✨ I'm Cinthia, an English & Spanish teacher and interpreter from Argentina. ✨  I have a Degree in English teaching, and have been teaching both languages for ten years. I've lived in the U.S. working as a Foreign Language Teaching Assistant at Gardner-Webb University, N.C. I've also graduated as a Conference Interpreter. Teaching is my greatest passion! I'm also into traveling and getting to know different people and cultures.
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified teacher and Interpreter. ✨SPECIAL PRICE ON THE “Debatamos” and "General English" classes!
teacher_info.introduction: **Special price January - March** I'm a Spanish and English teacher and Simultaneous interpreter from Argentina. I have a Degree in English teaching, and have been teaching Spanish for six years. Thanks to a Fulbright Scholarship, I've lived in the U.S., teaching Spanish at Gardner-Webb University, N.C. Teaching is my greatest passion! I teach all levels. Whatever you need to improve on, I'd be glad to help! If you need to start from scratch, we can do that too! My classes are dynamic and fun. I focus on the student´s needs and interests, using a variety of materials, ranging from newspaper articles, videos, songs, to coursebooks and grammar activities. Contact me!
teacher_info.about_me: ✨ I'm Cinthia, an English & Spanish teacher and interpreter from Argentina. ✨  I have a Degree in English teaching, and have been teaching both languages for ten years. I've lived in the U.S. working as a Foreign Language Teaching Assistant at Gardner-Webb University, N.C. I've also graduated as a Conference Interpreter. Teaching is my greatest passion! I'm also into traveling and getting to know different people and cultures.
teacher_info.about_teacher: My classes are dynamic and fun. I consider myself a very resourceful person who's always looking for different materials and activities to bring color to the classes. When I use course books, they function as the backbone, so I always prepare extra material, be it videos, songs, news articles, writing and grammar exercises, and so on. If my student needs to prepare for something specific, let's say a business presentation, a job interview, a trip, I come up with activities to focus on that.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My lessons are tailor-made to the students' needs and interests. If they need to concentrate on conversation, I prepare activities that trigger debate, asking and answering questions, etc. I use a range of materials to be able to discuss interesting, current topics such as education, technology, climate change, relationships.... I also think the fours skills are important, so I always make sure I pay attention to them - speaking, listening, writing and reading.

exp_info.company: University of Buenos Aires (UBA) - Language Lab
exp_info.description: I was in charge of planning and delivering the classes. These were large groups (15 people aprox.) I was also responsible for testing and scoring the students. Teens and adults.
I taught Business and General English in companies. My students were employees (Jr., Sr. and managerial positions.)
I was awarded a Fulbright Scholarship to work and study in the US for two semesters. I was a Spanish Teaching Assistant at the same university.
On Verbling.com, I teach Spanish as a foreign language to people all around the world, using Google Hangouts. All levels, all skills.

edu_info.description: I have learned Italian. I love languages and this one is one of my favorites - apart from Spanish and English!

edu_info.institution: Instituto Superior del Profesorado Joaquín V. González

teacher_info.intro: Arquitecto, amante de la cocina, cultura, me gusta interactuar con las personas, aprender de ellas y que ellas aprendan de mi.
teacher_info.introduction: Hello friends around the Word, I am Eduardo Rosales, I am a young boy from Venezuelan west, I am studying the 4th year of architecture, the most I like are languages because it helps me to learn about other cultures and to communicate with other people, I like sports and cooking too. I offer Spanish tutoring in which I can help you to practice your fluency and improve your pronunciation, to expand your vocabulary or even to clarify any doubts about grammar. I speak English very well and when is necessary we can communicate in English. My lessons will be guided according to your needs and interests, we can also talk about different topics such as sports, food, culture, politics, news or whatever you want, hoping that you can enjoy each class to the maximum. I hope to see you soon, it will be a pleasure to help you. Bye. Hola amigos de todo el mundo, se dirige ante ustedes Eduardo Rosales, soy un joven nativo del occidente de Venezuela, estudiante del 4to año de arquitectura, apasionado de los deportes, la cocina y la repostería, pero sobre todo de los lenguajes ya que es necesario para aprender de diferentes culturas alrededor del mundo y comunicarte con otras personas. Ofrezco tutorías de español para todos los niveles, en las que puedo ayudarte a mejorar tu pronunciación y fluidez, ampliar tu vocabulario y aclarar dudas de gramática. Tengo un nivel avanzado de Ingles y por lo tanto de ser necesario puedo explicarte en ingles cualquier tema. Mis lecciones estarán orientadas a tus necesidades e intereses, podemos hablar de diferentes tópicos como deportes, comida, cultura, política, actualidad o de lo que tú desees, para que mejores tu español de forma divertida, dinámica y donde el protagonista seas tú. Espero verte pronto, será un placer ayudarte. Hasta luego.

pro_course_detail.title: Spanish lessons . (Pronuntiation, vocabulary, conversation and grammar)  😉
pro_course_detail.description:
The main objective of this class is that you use the spanish you know. even if it's a little it does not matter.  The more you use the language the more you will improve.
In this session I am going to help you with your spanish pronunciaton so you can have a better understanding of the language and I am going to try to use spanish as much as I can so you can get used to the language, but if for any reason you need some help in english I would switch to it. 
And finally  we are going to study some daily vocabulary and grammar  to complement the class. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
El principal objetivo de esta clase es que uses el español que conoces. aunque sea un poco no importa. Cuanto más uses el idioma, más mejorarás.
En esta sección te voy a ayudar con tu pronunciación en español para que puedas tener una mejor comprensión del idioma y voy a intentar usar el español tanto como pueda para que puedas acostumbrarte al idioma, pero si por alguna razón necesitas ayuda en inglés, podemos usar ingles.
Y finalmente vamos a estudiar algo de vocabulario y gramática diaria para complementar la clase. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you need a break , you can let me know and we can take a little break!

pro_course_detail.title: Let's Learn Grammar!
pro_course_detail.description:
During this lesson students will be able to choose from Conversational English to Grammar Practice!  Students can choose from the following: 

Conversational English: 
1. Basic phrases and expressions for having conversations in everyday English
2. Focus on sociolinguistic competence. It includes dialogues (with audio) 
3. Pronunciation practice

Let's Learn Grammar :
1. Simple Verb Tenses
2.Perfect Verb Tenses
3.Prepositions
4. Articles
5.Phrasal Verbs & Collocations
6.Sentence Constructions

pro_course_detail.description:

1. Researching  the company 
2. Do’s/Dont’s
3. Interview Prep /(Dress code)
4. Resume/CV Prep
5. Interview Questions/Answers
6. Mock Interview

pro_course_detail.title: Let's Talk Law
pro_course_detail.description:
Are you ready to understand the American legal system? This is the class for you! During this lesson, students will look at landmark cases that are taught in American law schools.  See below the cases that we will cover during this lesson and their description. 

*Students have the choice to choose from any of the cases listed below*

-Brown v. Board of Education (1954)
School Segregation, Equal Protection
-Dred Scott v. Sandford (1857)
Slavery, Due Process, Missouri Compromise
-Roe v. Wade (1973)
Abortion, Right to Privacy
-United States v. Nixon (1974)
Watergate, Executive Privilege, Checks & Balances
-Miranda v. Arizona (1966)
Self-Incrimination, Due Process
-Engel v. Vitale (1962)
Prayer in School, Freedom of Religion, Separation of Church and State
-Plessy v. Ferguson (1896)
Equal Protection, "Separate but Equal"
-Texas v. Johnson (1989)
Flag Burning, Freedom of Speech
-Tinker v. Des Moines (1969)
Student Speech, Symbolic Speech

pro_course_detail.title: Cooking in English
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is designed for students who enjoy cooking! During this lesson, we will learn some common Southern meals that I grew to love as a child. This is a fun lesson for both adults and children. During the last lesson, we will cook a meal together virtually. 

What you can expect during this lesson: 
-New Vocabulary words
-Idiomatic Expressions 
-New Recipes

teacher_info.intro: My name is Julie and I'm from the United States but have lived in many different countries. In February of 2016, I began teaching English and traveling. Since then, I've taught over 7000 online lessons, as well worked in classrooms in China and South Korea. I also rediscovered my own love for language learning while traveling and have learned a little of many different languages. However, I've focused my long-term learning on German and Italian. I realized that there are much better ways to learn languages than those typically taught in schools and applied them both to my own learning and how I teach in the classroom. I've helped many people find the techniques that work for them.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
I like to set long-term and short-term goals. These help you keep track of your progress and make it easier to reach your desired skills. If you’re unsure of your goals, I can help you establish them. They can be as small or big as you'd like. If your goals change, let me know!

In class, some people excel by playing games in their target language or role-playing, but others don't. I want to do what works best for you. 

For all learners, I want you to participate and use English as much as possible, but I will always help you when you need help. I can provide prompts or sentence frames, depending on your level. I also take notes to give you feedback and help you improve.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is for you if you want to:
* Spend less time translating in your head
* Speak for longer time frames without getting tired
* Learn phrases to help with any situation

Beginners: Even beginners should practice speaking in their target language! I’ve seen many people improve quickly this way. I’ll also use body language and write down anything you need as we talk.

Intermediate: Together, we can work on confidence and fluency techniques or just chat about a topic that interests you. We can also work on fixing common mistakes in your speech or develop more natural expressions.

Advanced: Maintain your English or practice expressing more complicated subject out loud. Although I have my own set of topics we can you, I encourage advanced learners to choose the topics themselves. That way, we can focus on whatever area of English you most want to practice.

During conversation practice, I let students finish their thoughts before correcting them. I am always willing to help if you’re searching for a word or phrase. I also take notes in the chat so you can review them after class if you’d like.

pro_course_detail.title: General English
pro_course_detail.description: This course is for you if you want to improve in a combination of areas, such as speaking, listening, reading, and writing. We can also work on pronunciation, grammar, or other areas that you want to improve. It’s good to have a rounded experience in a language, and this course provides that.

pro_course_detail.title: Science Discussion, Vocabulary, and/or Writing: Physics, Marine Science, Space, Cognitive Science
pro_course_detail.description:
* Physics
* Ocean / Marine Science
* Space
* Cognitive Science 

Do you need to learn science related words for school, a job, or even a hobby? I can help! I have a bachelors degree in physics and an interest in marine science, space, and cognitive science. Marine science is a hobby of mine that I picked up while scuba diving and especially enjoy talking about corals and sea life. Space has always been of interest, and I did some cognitive science research while accomplishing my other bachelors degree in linguistics. 

I can also help with many grade school science, but please message me before booking a class if you’re interested in a different upper level science so we can discuss if I’ll be a good fit for your goals.

course_info.trial_description:
Trail course is for us to get to know each other. We will introduce ourselves, and you will know my teaching style. If you think my style fits you, welcome to book my courses😊.

Trail lesson for Chinese Mandarin ➡️ I will give you a brief introduction to the Chinese language and characters as well as teaching you some basic conversations.

Trail lesson for Manchu ➡️ I will introduce you the history of Manchu people and features of the Manchu language. If there is time remaining, we will get into the pronunciation part a little bit.

Trail lesson for English ➡️ It is just like a free conversation practice lesson. We can chat on any topics using English.

For Wu Chinese, there are no trail lessons since this is an advanced course and its learners are expected to be minority.

体验课的目的是为了我们能和对方有初步的认识。在课堂上，我们会互相介绍自己，您可以了解我的教学风格。如果您认为我的教学风格适合您，欢迎您订阅我的课程😊。

汉语普通话体验课➡️我会向您介绍汉语和汉字的特点，并教您一些简单的对话。

满语体验课➡️我会向您介绍满族的历史，以及满语的特点。如果有空余的课堂时间，我们可以开始学习部分音节的发音。

英语体验课➡️和常规的对话练习课一样，我们可以在全英文的环境下讨论任何话题。

吴语课程没有体验课，因为这是一门高阶课程，并且预计将成为一门小众的课程。

pro_course_detail.title: Chinese Mandarin for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
This is an elementary course designed for students who know little about the Chinese Mandarin. We will begin from Chinese Pinyin (pronunciations) and then move forward to Chinese characters, vocabularies, and basic grammars. I will customize the course package according to effectivenesses of different students.

这门课程是针对汉语普通话的初学者制定的。我会从汉语拼音开始教学，然后过渡到汉字、词汇和基础的语法。我会根据不同学生的学习效率定制不同的课时数量。

pro_course_detail.title: Free Conversation Practice on Chinese Mandarin
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a course designed for students who want to improve their pronunciations and spoken language of Chinese Mandarin. Feel free to come up with topics that you would like to discuss with me before classes.

这门课程是针对想要练习汉语普通话发音、提升口语水平的学生定制的。我们可以在课堂上讨论任何你感兴趣的话题。

pro_course_detail.title: 吴语正字教学 Orthography for Wu Chinese
pro_course_detail.description:
吴语是汉语族十大方言之一，常以“吴侬软语”闻名。吴语保留了中古汉语的入声调以及声母的清浊对立和尖团音对立，这些都是普通话所没有的。吴语中还有很多独特、古雅的表达方式。同时，学习吴语正字能扩充对汉字的认知，但是学习吴语及其正字的前提是学好汉语普通话哦😊！

Wu Chinese is one of the ten dialect groups under the Sinitic languages that is famous for its pleasant-sounding. It keeps the checked tone, voiced sounds, and sharp sounds from the Middle Chinese, which had disappeared in Mandarin. There are also some special and traditional expressions left in Wu Chinese. Meanwhile, learning the orthography of Wu Chinese can extend your knowledge on Chinese characters, but the prerequisite is that you can handle Chinese Mandarin.

pro_course_detail.title: Manchu Script, Vocabularies, and Phonetics for Beginners 满文、满语词汇和语音（初学者）
pro_course_detail.description:
The Manchu script is a beautiful writing system derived from the traditional Mongolian script. In this course, students will acquire basic knowledge on read and writing in the Manchu script and expand their Manchu vocabularies. Meanwhile, students will also learn some phonetic changes in Manchu to make their spoken Manchu more natural.

满文是一种衍生自传统蒙古文的文字，它的形态十分优美。在本课程中，学生将会获得满文阅读和书写的基本知识，并扩充满语词汇。另外，学生还将学习满语中一些语流音变的现象，以提升口语水平。

pro_course_detail.title: Manchu Grammar for Beginners 满语语法（初学者）
pro_course_detail.description:
What to expect for this course? ⬇️
— Students will be introduced basic grammars on variety topics, including nouns and pronouns, verbs, converbs, auxiliaries, numerals, time and calendar, adjectives, classifiers, and postpositions.
— I will use the Romanization script in this course so that students are not necessary to take the Manchu script course as a prerequisite.

Why you want to learn Manchu? ⬇️
— Manchu has many interesting agglutinative grammars such as suffixes and infixes and vowel harmony
— There are huge amounts of archives written in Manchu left from the Qing Dynasty. Many of them do not have Chinese versions. Leaning Manchu can help you know deeply about the history of the Qing Empire.
— The Manchu language is an invaluable key for sinologists to understand Chinese history and culture, as it is easier for Europeans and Americans to learn than Chinese.
— The Qing government had organized scholars translating lots of classic Chinese books to Manchu, which are much easier to read, as the Manchu language is vernacular while classical Chinese is hard to understand.

我能在本课程中学到什么？⬇️
— 学生将会学习满语的基础语法，包括名词和代词、动词、副动词、助动词、数词、时间和纪年、形容词、量词、后置词等等。
— 我会采用满文的罗马转写来进行教学，所以学生不需要先学习满文。

为什么要学习满语？⬇️
— 满语有很多非常有趣的黏着语语法现象，例如大量的后缀和中缀，以及元音和谐律。
— 清代有大量的满文典籍存世，很多重要的档案没有汉文版本。学习满语能帮助你更好地了解清朝历史。
— 满语对于汉学家来说是非常有用的工具。相对于汉语，欧美人更容易学习满语。
— 清政府曾组织人力将大量的中国古代典籍翻译成满语。相对于晦涩难懂的古汉语文言文，书面语都是白话文的满语更容易阅读和理解。

pro_course_detail.title: 吴语对话练习 Free Conversation Practice in Wu Chinese
pro_course_detail.description:
吴语是一种语音优美的方言，常以“吴侬软语”著称。我从小在吴语区长大，会说三门吴语方言——杭州话、上海话和绍兴话。如果您想提升您的吴语口语水平，快来找我一起练习吧😊！

Wu Chinese is a beautiful dialect group which usually famous for its pleasant-sounding. I was born and raised up in the Wu Chinese area and can speak three Wu dialects, Hangzhounese, Shanghainese, and Shaoxingnese. If you would like to improve your spoken language of Wu Chinese, welcome to book my course.

pro_course_detail.title: 英语对话练习 English Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
提高英语能力，尤其是口语能力，最好的办法就是用英语开口说话。在课堂上，我们可以用英语讨论任何话题，帮助你打破“哑巴英语”、提升自信，欢迎订阅😊！

The best way to improve one's spoken English is to chat with people in English. In the lesson, we can discuss any topics according to your preferences and I'll help you improve your confidence. Welcome to book my lessons 😊!

pro_course_detail.title: 【Advanced Course】繁體漢字與文言文 Traditional Chinese Characters & Classical Chinese
pro_course_detail.description:
繁體漢字作為通行於古代東亞儒家文化圈的傳統文字，具有獨特的美感和豐富的內涵。在當今的華人世界中，繁體漢字依然被廣泛用於書法、廣告、招牌、電視劇，以及港澳台地區的日常生活中。簡體字體系下許多多義字在繁體字體系下對應多個不同的字。學習繁體漢字有助於提升對漢字的理解。

文言文是古代東亞文化圈共同的書面用語，具有詞法靈活、語句優美、語言精煉等特點。由於文言文與現代漢語差異較大，因此系統的學習和大量的積累對於想要通過文言文一窺古代中國文化的同學們來說非常重要。

本課程僅對高階水平的學生和漢語母語者開放。對古代中國文化感興趣同學們歡迎前來預約😊！

As the common writing system in ancient East Asia culture sphere, traditional Chinese characters have their own sense of beauty and rich connotations. In the present-day ethnic Chinese world, traditional characters are still used in calligraphies, advertisements, signboards, TV dramas, and everyday life in Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan. Many polysemantic characters under the simplified Chinese system are corresponding with two or more different traditional characters. Learning traditional characters help with understanding Chinese characters.

Classical Chinese is the common written language in ancient East Asia, with flexible morphology, beautiful phrases, and simple sentence structures. Since classical Chinese is very different from modern Chinese, training and practicing are critical if one wants to browse traditional Chinese cultures through classical Chinese.

This is an advanced course for advanced students and native Chinese speakers only. Welcome to book my lesson if you are interested in traditional Chinese cultures.

teacher_info.intro:
Are you interested in learning Portuguese and reach the next level? Or you just want an informal conversation to know more about Brazil? In both cases, I can be helpful to you! 😇

My name is Bárbara, I'm living in Porto Alegre. Also, I lived in other states of Brazil, which gave me a lot of knowledge about our rich culture! 

Some facts about me: I'm a law student who loves to discover new things, challenging situations and such. I'm also a language lover passionate about what I do ❤
Some hobbies of mine:  hiking, singing, horror movies etc

I can help you with English and Spanish in case you’re an absolute beginner in these languages, let’s go 🤓

I'm curious about you 🥰
Let's get started!

teacher_info.about_teacher: My intention as a teacher is to help with love and patience, those who wish to improve their skills in the Portuguese language. I have been teaching online for over 9 months. I am demanding with my students, and I do my best to make them practice Portuguese as much as they can, inside and outside of classes. And just like you, I am also a language learner, so don't be afraid to make mistakes!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My teaching style is aimed at conversation. However, I also provide support in other areas such as reading, translation etc. I can offer extra content after class, specific materials according to the need of each student and correction of diction, grammar, writing and idiom expressions. But I focus a lot on the pronunciation. The pronunciation is one of the most needed topics while learning. We really need to improve the pronunciation, simply because your pronunciation is exactly what you expect to hear from somebody else. If your pronunciation is off, your listening will be more difficult to assimilate.

*I always take a 5 min break in all my classes!

course_info.trial_description:
Apresentação do aluno ao professor; traçar um perfil individual específico de acordo com seus objetivos; introdução do método de ensino e resposta a eventuais dúvidas.

Presentation of the student to the teacher; definition of the student's objectives as a language learner; draw a specific individual profile according to student's goals; introduction of the teaching method and answers to any doubts.

pro_course_detail.title: 5 Lessons Pack (GET 1 FREE LESSON❗) - FOR REGULAR STUDENTS ⭐
pro_course_detail.description:
⚠️This class is exclusively intended for regular students who take at least one lesson per week⚠️

- In this class, the student chooses wether he prefers FORMAL or INFORMAL Portuguese, with slang and idioms, and everything happens spontaneously. The teacher points out the topics to be improved further at the end of each class.
I like sending documents, screen sharing and many other contents. Additionally, I provide homework according to the needs of my students.

*I always take a 5 min break in all my classes!

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Conversation / Conversación Informal 🗣
pro_course_detail.description:
- In this lesson, the students talk about any topic of their preference. It is aimed at exchanging cultural information, curiosities or any other subject that does not necessarily have to do with the Portuguese language. Students who just want to have a sporadic or relaxed conversation are welcome!

- En esta lección, los alumnos hablan sobre cualquier tema de su preferencia. Está dirigido al intercambio de información cultural, curiosidades o cualquier otro tema que no necesariamente tenga que ver con la lengua portuguesa. ¡Los estudiantes que solo quieran tener una conversación esporádica o relajada son bienvenidos!

*I always take a 5 min break in all my classes!

pro_course_detail.title: Formal Portuguese - Law and Business 📚
pro_course_detail.description:
Are you interested in Brazilian business and legislation? As a law student at one of the most renowned universities in the country, I can help you on this journey! 
In this class we will discuss specific topics related to the Brazilian scenario in the area of business and law, focusing on books, articles and news based on such topics. Subjects you are interested in will be addressed, or I will suggest debates in relation of current Brazilian events. Portuguese will be spoken in a more formal way, according to the standards used in Brazil. Let's start?

*I always take a 5 min break in all my classes!

teacher_info.intro:
¡Hola! Mi nombre es Marina, tengo 20 años y soy boliviana. Soy una persona paciente y responsable en cualquier actividad y casi siempre intento que la gente se sienta cómoda.
Actualmente estoy cursando el 6° semestre de la carrera de Lingüística Aplicada a la Enseñanza de Idiomas. Uno de mis objetivos es obtener una beca para estudiar en el extranjero dentro de mi profesión.
Entre mis actividades favoritas está leer libros o cómics y también me gusta mucho ver series. Asimismo, me encanta ir al cine con amigos y salir a cenar.
Estoy muy interesada en el intercambio cultural.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Durante el tiempo libre que tengo, aprovecho para dar pequeñas clases de inglés a estudiantes universitarios. Además, les doy un poco de apoyo con otras materias como matemáticas y lenguaje.
Gracias a mi experiencia siempre busco crear confianza con la persona para poder crear un ambiente más agradable para aprender.
Dentro de una clase no me gusta considerarme ni ser percibida como alguien que está por encima de los demás, prefiero ser vista como una amiga que te ayuda a aprender cosas nuevas sin miedo a preguntar algo o equivocarte.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Sobre mi método de enseñanza, me gusta trabajar de forma dinámica e implementando nuevas herramientas, materiales y técnicas para que temas como la gramática de un idioma sean más llevaderos y fáciles de aprender.
Un ejemplo que puedo dar es comentar el capítulo de una serie en español con el fin de potenciar la capacidad oral del alumno. Así mismo, dar una clase de comida boliviana en español me parece una excelente idea para aprender el idioma.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone! My name is Anastasia, but you can call me Ana. I teach Finnish and English here on Italki! I'm from Southern Finland and I'm currently studying Mandarin Chinese, linguistics and cultural research at university. I love learning new languages, and I hope to help others enjoy language learning as much as I do!

In addition to learning languages, I have many hobbies. I love everything from watching movies and playing video games to cooking and painting! Travelling is also something that is very close to my heart.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello everyone! My name is Anastasia, but you can call me Ana. I teach Finnish and English here on Italki! I'm from Southern Finland and I'm currently studying Mandarin Chinese, linguistics and cultural research at university. I love learning new languages, and I hope to help others enjoy language learning as much as I do!

In addition to learning languages, I have many hobbies. I love everything from watching movies and playing video games to cooking and painting! Travelling is also something that is very close to my heart.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am a community tutor here on Italki. I have previously tutored pupils at primary schools, and I constantly help my friends learn Finnish and English!

I am a patient, kind and positive teacher. I believe in teaching things that you will actually be able to use in your life. Therefore, I do not think that constant tests and quizzes are the main focus of learning. I will help you with topics that you want to learn, and teach you both grammar and vocabulary in a balanced way.

When it comes to Finnish, I can teach you both spoken and written Finnish, and we can even dabble in some slang that people use in daily conversations in the capital region.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I believe that everyone learns differently. Together we will create a suitable way of learning for you. My main aim is to create a fun and relaxed atmosphere, so that you do not feel stressed or nervous to attend lessons! Do not worry if you're shy, I will never make my students do anything they don't want to. I believe that learning should be enjoyable, and that lessons should be built around the preferences of the student, not the teacher. 

Together we will build your confidence in the language!

course_info.trial_description: A trial lesson is a lesson for new students! During the trial lesson we will get to know each other, establish your language learning goals and discuss learning methods that suit you.

pro_course_detail.title: Finnish Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Conversation and pronunciation practice! All lessons and topics are adjusted according to the student's needs and wishes. Please let me know in advance if you have special topics you want to talk about!

- We can practice all levels of formality.
- I can teach you expressions and structures used by native speakers in everyday conversations.
- I can also help you with slang used in the capital region.

pro_course_detail.title: Finnish for intermediate and advanced learners (B1-C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
Finnish lessons for intermediate and advanced learners! All lessons and topics are adjusted according to the student's needs and wishes. Please let me know in advance if you have certain topics you want to learn about.

During the lessons we will go over vocabulary, grammar, native pronunciation, writing, reading, listening and speaking. If you are interested, we can also discuss Finnish culture.

For the very advanced learner, we can also look at complicated topics, such as:

- looking at the differences between puhekieli and kirjakieli
- trying to understand different dialects and regional differences
- understanding the psychology behind sayings and idioms in Finnish
- reading Finnish poetry
- going through specific complicated grammar, e.g. medical, legal, mathematical, etc.
- stadin slangi (slang mostly used in and around Helsinki)
- common Swedish words and phrases often used in daily Finnish conversations
- common Russian words and phrases often used in daily Finnish conversations

pro_course_detail.title: English Conversation Practice (all levels)
pro_course_detail.description:
Conversation and pronunciation practice! All lessons and topics are adjusted according to the student's needs and wishes. Please let me know in advance if you have special topics you want to talk about!

- We can practice all levels of formality.
- I can teach you expressions and structures used by native speakers in everyday conversations.
- Let's work on making your English sound more natural!

pro_course_detail.title: Learn Finnish through music!
pro_course_detail.description: The right class for all of you who love music! In this class, we will look at a Finnish song of your choice (or I can prepare one for us), going through the vocabulary, grammar structures, idioms, slang words, etc.

teacher_info.intro: Hello! My name is Michele, and I grew up in New York City. I now live in New Jersey in the United States.  I work as a teacher, and I am also a mother to two children. I enjoy meeting new people, traveling, going to great New York City museums, and reading. As I spent several years studying and working in France, I have experienced firsthand the challenge and thrill of learning a second language and living abroad.

I enjoy meeting new people, traveling, going to great New York City museums, and reading. As I spent several years studying and working in France, I have experienced firsthand the challenge and thrill of learning a second language and living abroad.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I am an experienced ESL teacher and have taught in both France and in the United States.  I have taught beginner, intermediate, and advanced classes and have experience teaching in classrooms and also giving online classes. I received my Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages  (TESOL) Certificate  from Teachers College, Columbia University.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I truly believe that language learning should be fun and interesting. In my classes, I  have a learner-centered approach to teaching and help students to achieve their language goals. My classes will prepare students to tackle real-life situations in English. Each lesson will be adapted to a learner's needs and goals.

exp_info.description:
• Provide English classes remotely to children and adults (up to six students in a virtual classroom)
• Teach using Total Physical Response (TPR)
• Incorporate realia into all lessons

• Give in-person and remote customized general English lessons to intermediate and advanced adult learners
• Advise learners regarding their language goals and assess progress

• Prepared and delivered elementary classes (A1) for adult English language learners
• Assessed students and provided feedback
• Used authentic material in lessons and had students regularly engage in pair and group work
• Incorporated technology into classroom lessons and gave virtual classes using Zoom when needed

• Designed lessons for an intermediate ESL class with an emphasis on English for everyday use
• Promoted a communicative classroom environment

•Co-taught weekly language classes for a class of lower-intermediate ESL students
• Employed focused and interactive activities to provide students with opportunities to feel engaged in the classroom
• Edited international market research evaluations and insured compliance with quality standards
• Edited international guest service research reports
• Provided training for over 50 engineers and prepared participants for business interactions in English

• Created custom English classes for managers and teams (beginner to advanced)
• Guided management through mock presentations of the company or site
• Assisted with the preparation of business presentations and development of English content for online use

edu_info.institution: École Supérieure des Sciences Économiques et Commerciales,

course_info.trial_description:
Join me for a trial lesson! I am a native English speaker and have a TESOL Certificate. I also have experience teaching in a classroom setting, providing online classes, and giving business English lessons onsite.

In the trial lesson, we will first discuss your language goals. Next, I will explain how I can help you reach these goals and the kind of activities that would be the most helpful.  We will also conduct a mini English lesson on one of the following themes.

1. Fun and Useful English Expressions (Idioms)
2. Interviews in English (Overview and Role-Play)
3. English Shopping Vocabulary (Level appropriate)
4. English for Travel (Vocabulary and Role-Play)
5. English Food Vocabulary (Role-Play and Key Terms)

pro_course_detail.title: Interview Preparation
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you have an upcoming interview in English? In this class, we will look at commonly asked interview questions and discuss different strategies for answering questions. We will also do mock interviews. If you need to get ready for an interview, this is the class for you.

I am a native English speaker and have a TESOL Certificate. I am patient and always encourage students to ask questions.

pro_course_detail.title: Business English (Meetings, presentations, and industry specific vocabulary)
pro_course_detail.description:
This class will focus on English for business settings. Lessons will include industry specific vocabulary and business etiquette. You will also have a chance to make business presentations and practice persuasive speech.

I am a native English speaker and have a TESOL Certificate. I also have a business degree. This class allows me to combine my English teaching experience and business knowledge.

pro_course_detail.title: General English for All Levels Beginners to Advanced (A1 to C1)
pro_course_detail.description:
In this class, you will practice English through acquiring new theme based vocabulary, reviewing and applying grammar rules, and having many opportunities to express yourself in English on the lesson topic. Classes can include role-plays, games, and grammar and writing exercises. Each class will be on a specific theme. For example food, greetings, email writing, shopping vocabulary, key phrases for travel, English for use at the bank, etc.

I am a native English speaker and have a TESOL Certificate. I have taught English both in the classroom and online. I am patient, speak clearly, and always encourage students to ask questions.

pro_course_detail.title: English Pronunciation
pro_course_detail.description:
This class will focus on pronunciation. English learners will have the opportunity to practice sounds and words that are challenging to say in English. Feedback and pronunciation tips with also be provided.

I am a native English speaker, and I have a TESOL Certificate. I have many years of experience providing one-to-one classes to English language learners.

pro_course_detail.title: English Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
In this class, you will have the opportunity to practice speaking English on a preselected theme. I will provide feedback on pronunciation and highlight key theme related vocabulary words.

I am a native English speaker and have a TESOL Certificate. I also have many years of language teaching experience and have taught English in France and in the United States. I am patient and speak slowly.

pro_course_detail.title: English for Kids (Ages 5+)
pro_course_detail.description:
Learning English should be fun! In this class, children will have the opportunity to learn new vocabulary and to review key grammar skills. Classes can include role-plays, singing, reading dialogues, theme related vocabulary, and grammar review exercises done in a fun and friendly online teaching environment.

I am a native English speaker and have a TESOL teaching certificate. I have experience teaching children (ages 5 - 17) online. I am patient and speak slowly.
