I am LGBTQ+-friendly! <3
I have been teaching both my native language German as well as French for almost 3 years now at a language school in Austria to students from all over the world (Italy, Korea, Albania, Austria and Germany), ranging from complete beginner level to higher intermediate level. I can speak English, French and Italian fluently as well as intermediate-Spanish. So if your native language is one of those, we can definitely switch to it whenever it can help you. Having learned quite a few languages myself I can definitely feel all the struggles and fears that may come with it. So don't feel shy, we'll work through it together!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I like my lessons to be light and personal while always keeping in mind your goal of why you want to learn German or French.

My lessons differ according to type of lesson that you choose. Conversational lessons are very free and chill while grammar lessons or beginner lessons are more structured.

course_info.trial_description: Feel free to book a trial lesson with me to have a nice little chat in order for us to get to know each other. I will tell you about my teaching style and will also ask you questions to understand  what you want to learn and improve in your language practice.

pro_course_detail.title: German: Let´s chat! :)
pro_course_detail.description: Talk, talk & talk - that's what is going to really improve your level! Bring up a topic yourself if you want to (I prefer that!) or I give you some ideas to chose a topic from and then we´ll just chat our way through it! ;) Depending on your wishes, I will give you new input when it comes to vocabulary or correct your grammatical errors from time to time (I prefer to collect them and talk about them after we finished discussing a topic but I can also correct you right away). The goal is to help you bring across what you want to say quicker and easier.

pro_course_detail.title: German: Detailed grammar practice
pro_course_detail.description: You are struggling with a specific grammar topic and always wanted to learn how to use it correctly? Let´s look into it and practice it in depth using different types of exercises! I can also introduce you to new grammatical structures to help you improve your quality of speaking.

pro_course_detail.title: French: Detailed grammar practice
pro_course_detail.description: You are struggling with a specific grammar topic and always wanted to learn how to use it correctly? Let´s look into it and practice it in depth using different types of exercises! I can also introduce you to new grammatical structures to help you improve your quality of speaking.

The goal is to help you bring across what you want to say quicker and easier. Allez, on y va!

pro_course_detail.description: You have never learned German before or know only very little (like Autobahn or Hallo?) No problem at all! l will get you talking full sentences within our first lesson and you will see how easy it is! :)

teacher_info.intro: Hello, my name is Snow! I am a Chinese teacher, born in Inner Mongolia. My mother gave birth to me in the winter time and on the day I was born there was heavy snowfall. My parents therefore named me:  Xia Xue, I think you must remember my name now! I earned a master’s degree in education from Northeast Normal University with a major in International and Comparative Education. My Mandarin is standard and I am a part-time host in my student time.

teacher_info.about_teacher: I am a university counsellor, giving students career planning courses et al. In my opinion, the generation of language in ancient times allowed humans to communicate more effectively with each other. This paved the way for humans to evolve at a quicker pace than other species and thus leaving them behind. In contemporary society, more effective communication between different languages will promote the development of our world and human civilization.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I am an outgoing and enthusiastic person, open to discussing various topics. My proposal is that the function of language communicates passion and enthusiasm. Chinese as you know is a very interesting language and as such being fluent in same makes for more versatile connections. I will combine your requirements and level to plan each course. I look for topics that are meaningful and can be applied in real life to discuss and learn. If you have your own proposal or requirements for learning Chinese, you may leave me a message. I hope to help you to enhance your knowledge of Chinese.

teacher_info.intro: IELTS preparation teacher - I will teach you how to answer questions in the IELTS style with particular attention to details.
teacher_info.short_signature: I will practice your IELTS questions with you !
teacher_info.introduction: British born Canadian ESL teacher. TESOL certification. I prepare students for the IELTS speaking test. I use the actual questions that are currently used all over the world. I can also help you with your writing of course. I also correct CVs, essays and personal statements. A typical IELTS lesson depends on where your weaknesses are. Some students want to focus on the Cue card and discussion questions and some want writing correction as well. I provide 24 hour access to my Dropbox folder which has lists  of the questions and also mp3 audio files of the answers to the questions. They are my answers and they should be able to help you make your answers longer if they are not long enough and help you learn some common expressions/idioms. Although the IELTS test is a test based on formal English, the speaking part is not. You really do receive a higher score if you can speak using these expressions occasionally.
teacher_info.about_me: IELTS preparation teacher - I will teach you how to answer questions in the IELTS style with particular attention to details.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I have a clear accent which is easy to understand, please see my video.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I will ask you questions from the speaking test and we will use the current ones in the test now.
The questions from the Academic and the General speaking test are the same questions.
Part 1 = The interview
Part 2 = The topic question
Part 3 = The discussion questions
Books and study materials including videos all accessible from my google drive folders.
teacher_info.cancel_policy: I expect a 24 hour cancellation notice. If you are 15 minutes late for a lesson without notice then I will consider it cancelled and the student will pay for it..

exp_info.description: I teach at a private English school in Vietnam.
IELTS Tutor/General English teacher

course_info.trial_description: 2 part 1, 2 and 3 questions. I will transfer you some questions through Skype/Zoom/email and I hope you will prepare for these questions but you don't have to, if you don't have time.

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS Preparation Speaking
pro_course_detail.description: General and Academic! These lessons are for students that are going to be taking the IELTS exam. I will ask you IELTS questions and all of them are used in the actual exam. Your grammar and pronunciation will be corrected and I will help you with your answers of course. I will also give you study material to help you prepare. You will receives files for study and real question that have been asked recently for the IELTS test. Your essay questions will also be from the IELTS test. We are never going to prepare from made up questions like the Cambridge books do, just real questions. I will only do simple corrections on the essays. I will tell you if your writing makes sense and if you will need a tutor or not. I do not teach writing.

pro_course_detail.title: Prepare for your job interview in English
pro_course_detail.description: All job interview questions. You will sent what type of job your profession is and I will ask you questions, no matter what job. The 50 most common job interview questions. This is not for school or University.  I ask you the questions and help you give better answers. If you have done any research and you are aware what questions will be asked you can supply them to me. I will send you the list in advance if you would like to prepare before the lesson. Job interviews can be very stressful, so practice is good!

pro_course_detail.title: A guide to conversation!  From pre-intermediate to advanced users.
pro_course_detail.description: 1. Most people want to talk, if you need help, I can help you. We will do the questions from the IELTS test but there will be no time constraints. You can have as much time as you want to answer and I will help you answer. 2.  If you need help with sentence structure, pronunciation or help talking about your job/life, we can do it together. To begin with we talk about life experiences  or family. If you are beyond that an if you are more comfortable with your English we can talk about anything. YOU PICK THE TOPIC, or we can go through the list of questions I have.

- Ampliar tu vocabulario. 
- Mejorar tu gramática. 
- Mejorar tu escucha y entendimiento del idioma español. 

Si eres completamente nuevo en el idioma podemos empezar desde cero a que comprendas el español de una manera divertida y didáctica (If you are completely new to the language, we can start from scratch so that you can understand the spanish in a fun and educational way).
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Me gusta que mis clases sean divertidas y didácticas.
Trataré en todo momento de que te sientas en un lugar seguro para hacer preguntas al mismo tiempo que no tengas miedo a equivocarte, porque solo equivocándonos es como aprendemos. 
Mis clases las organizo basándome en tu caso particular como estudiante, tomando en cuenta tus necesidades.
Siempre estoy abierto a recibir feedback y opiniones sobre como mejorar. 
Finalmente, siéntete libre de pedirme recomendaciones de películas, canciones o libros. 

Espero verte pronto en las clases :D

course_info.trial_description: Sesión relajada para conocernos y poder idear el plan de acción mas adecuado a tu situación conforme al idioma, ya sea en sesiones conversacionales o en clases de gramática, o una combinación de ambas.

pro_course_detail.title: Sesiones conversacionales.
pro_course_detail.description: Reuniones para hablar sobre cualquier tema de tu interés. Durante la plática tu me podrás hacer preguntas acerca de tu pronunciación, tu gramática, tu formulación de oraciones, entre otras cosas. Al mismo tiempo yo intentaré ir puliendo tu forma de expresarte en el idioma, haciéndote sugerencias y alguna que otra corrección.

pro_course_detail.title: Beginners and intermediates
pro_course_detail.description:
Conversational lessons with really easy topics. Doesn´t focus a lot in the grammatics, but they are still used to support the topic. 
The point is to first speak the leaguage and then to learn the grmmatics. Like a kid learning a lenguage for the first time. Learning first to speak and then going to the kinder garden to learn how to write and read, and then to understand gramatics. 

As the title says is for begginers and intermediates that want to learn from the ground or to improve their hability to speak spanish.

teacher_info.intro: Soy un colombiano de 27 de años de edad, musico profesional y apasionado por el lenguaje y la enseñanza. Tengo experiencia enseñando música, ingles y español  además de tener bastante experiencia hablando con nativos del ingles.
teacher_info.about_me: Soy un colombiano de 27 de años de edad, musico profesional y apasionado por el lenguaje y la enseñanza. Tengo experiencia enseñando música, ingles y español  además de tener bastante experiencia hablando con nativos del ingles.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Soy muy organizado, me gusta tomarme enserio lo que hago, me preocupo por el proceso de mis estudiantes y así mismo  aprecio el esfuerzo que ponen en el aprendizaje.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Trato de variar las actividades dentro de  la clase para así  mantener al estúdiate concentrado y motivado en su aprendizaje, Mientras se explican los temas me gusta poner a prueba las habilidades del estudiante en cada momento, usando las diferentes posibilidades que tenemos a disposición; audio, video, YouTube, tests, temas para debatir, PowerPoint etc. herramientas con las que el estudiante puede interactuar directamente,  buscando un aprendizaje realista y provechoso  del idioma en el que se prioriza  la capacidad de hablar y entender el idioma fluidamente.

course_info.trial_description: Principalmente en esta clase me gustaría llegar a conocerte un poco, que me cuentes tu experiencia con el idioma hasta el momento y las metas y/o intereses que puedas tener con el. Podemos decidir el plan a seguir para ayudarte de la mejor forma a mejorar, y por supuesto podemos resolver algunas dudas que puedas tener.

pro_course_detail.title: Hablemos un rato/ let's talk for a while
pro_course_detail.description: Durante la clase se entablara una conversación habitual y relajada entre el estudiante y el docente, sobre temas acordados en común, con el propósito de  mejorar la escucha y la fluidez al  hablar. Se harán correcciones y se trabajara con ejercicios simples para que dichas correcciones sean recordadas por el estudiante y aplicadas de manera correcta en futuras conversaciones, también se aprenderán oraciones clave para que el estudiante añada estas a su vocabulario  con el fin de lograr comunicarse de una forma mas adecuada y natural.

pro_course_detail.title: Temas específicos/ specific topics
pro_course_detail.description: En este tipo de clase el estudiante escogerá previamente el tema que quiere empezar a aprender o mejorar, de tal forma, esta  clase será  diseñada específicamente para dicho estudiante. en la clase no solo se aprenderá la conceptos gramaticales de dicho tema sino que se buscara ponerlo en practica usando los diferentes materiales disponibles; texto, video, audio, conversación etc. buscando resultados que puedan se aprovechados en realidad.

pro_course_detail.title: Corrección  de documentos
pro_course_detail.description: En este tipo de clase el estúdiate tendrá a disposición alguna clase  de documento; ensayo, discurso, script etc.  con el cual tenga dudas sobre el correcto uso del español, de tal forma dentro de la clase será corregido además de ser explicados los temas pertinentes para que el estúdiate aprende de los errores cometidos.

teacher_info.intro:
I'm Muhammad from Jeddah, Saudi Arabia. I am grateful to say that I have built rapport with so many of my students that I would like to call friends. I have helped them learn/improve their Hijazi-Saudi dialect or MSA. I am passionate about having conversations that match the learners interests and keep the class intriguing for the whole time. 

After each class I send expressions along with voice notes to help you improve your pronunciation and learn new expressions. I also, use sheets/docs to document the students' new learned expressions and improve errors.

teacher_info.intro:
I’m Atsushi. 44 years old.
I was raised in Osaka. I will live in Hokkaido from June 2022！

I worked as a coffee shop manager for 20 years until last year.  
I can teach you about Japanese hospitality and services, and business Japanese and honorifics.

I started an online coffee shop from last year,
so I can talk about coffee.

I am also a volunteer leader. 
 I am working to connect local working people and high school students. 
 It's a meaningful activity that makes me feel rewarded and motivated to contribute.

 I love helping people and making them happy!
 I would like to help learners around the world through my lessons!

I am currently studying to qualify as a professional Japanese teacher.

 Also, I am learning English on italki.
 I can understand the learner's feelings, such as the frustration when the phrase do not come out easily, and the fun when you can communicate clearly.

 I will be patient and encouraging during the lessons.
And I also want to value the connection as a person.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
①free conversation
We can talk about different topics such as culture and history, religion, politics, economy and each business of each other's countries!  
Of course, we can talk about life in Japan, hobbies, anime and music, movies, books and more!

② reading Japanese news  
You can practice reading 2-4 Japanese news articles！
 I will teach you how to read Kanji.  
After that, let's discuss the content of the article.  
You can find out about what Japan is today.

③ honorifics or interview practices 
You can practice daily conversation with honorifics only or practice interviews for work！
I have 20 years of Japanese service and 10 years of interview experiences.

course_info.trial_description:

お互いの国の文化、生活のことや、あなたの好きなことや日常のこと、いろいろ話をしましょう！
Let's talk about each other's culture, life, your favorite things and everyday things!

pro_course_detail.title: ★casual conversation in Japanese 日常会話！
pro_course_detail.description:

Let's talk about each other's culture, life, your favorite things and everyday things!

I've been studying world history, religion, languages, etc. lately, so I welcome such topics!
Of course, you can talk about anime, music, and movies!

such as the language used when serving customers in Japanese.  

I want to support you as much as possible!

日本やあなたの国の文化や生活習慣、また趣味などについて会話をしましょう！

もちろん、アニメや音楽、映画の話もOKですよ！

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone! My name is Meli, I'm an Italian and Spanish tutor, born in Argentina and raised in Italy. 
As a teacher, actor, and artist, I have been perpetually amazed by the joy and power of communication. So that I might share this joy, I have been teaching languages, and loving it, to people of all ages, from 2 year old kids to adult. I've worked in kindergarten, school and as a private teacher. 
I'm an actress, to me art is a wonderful way through which humans communicate. It is another kind of language.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello everyone! My name is Meli, I'm an Italian and Spanish tutor, born in Argentina and raised in Italy. 
As a teacher, actor, and artist, I have been perpetually amazed by the joy and power of communication. So that I might share this joy, I have been teaching languages, and loving it, to people of all ages, from 2 year old kids to adult. I've worked in kindergarten, school and as a private teacher. 
I'm an actress, to me art is a wonderful way through which humans communicate. It is another kind of language.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Teaching at its best is an act of communication, a precious sharing not just what you know, but most of all, who you are. It is an act of constant giving and receiving. 
As your tutor, I'll try to be there for you wherever you are. I'll listen and be extremely patient, because I myself have experienced how great an effort a new language requires. I endeavor to teach each student just like I imagine my own dream teacher would teach me.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Theatrically speaking, in our lessons you'll star as the main character. I'll help you feel as comfortable as you can possibly be so that we, together, can create the perfect ambiance for you to learn effortlessly and joyfully. My goal is to find a personal approach that works for you, improving your confidence and moving you in a direction of discovery. 
You will be amazed as your chosen language grows within you!

course_info.trial_description:
To me the most important thing is that we get to know each other, as language is all about connecting with the person we are communicating with. That is the very basis of my approach to any type of lesson. 
To me you're not just a student, you are a person. We start from there.

pro_course_detail.title: Practice your Italian
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson I'll meet you at your level and take you through the process of finding this beautiful language inside of you. By doing this, you no longer need to struggle to improve your Italian, it will become an entertaining and joyfull journey, full of many, many beautiful heart-warming conversations.
I will help you with your vocabulary and pronunciation in an absolutely personalized way.
If you have a specific goal, we'll completely focus on it, keeping the same approach to the language.

pro_course_detail.title: Italian for KIDS!
pro_course_detail.description:
Teaching kids is one of the things I love the most in life. I have 10 years of experience working with children of all ages. 
I'm a caring, patient and fun teacher. My main goal is to make your child feel comfortable so that she/he can enjoy our time together and learn in the most entertaining and pleasant way. 
Our approach to Italian will be completely based on the student, starting from her/his level, and exploring a fantastic world full of games and activities.  As soon as I get to know her/him better, I will be happy to create an entirely customized lesson plan for her/him.
Above all, I'll treat your child with love and respect. 
Let's start our journey together!

pro_course_detail.description: If you are a Spanish learner beginner, you are overwhelmed with so much information and you don't know where to start, then this course is for you! Sentence structures, vocabulary, everyday phrases, grammar, basic writing and reading practice, and everything you need to take your first steps in the Spanish language, get used to it and lose your fear!

teacher_info.intro: こんにちは！わたしはKen(けん)です。 I live in Tokyo but was born & raised in Shiga (famous for Lake Biwa, the biggest lake in Japan)  in western Japan. After graduating Osaka University of Arts, majoring in broadcasting, I’ve worked as a manager in movie theaters in Tokyo. Now I write movie review articles on the net and help Japanese aspiring directors so that their movies will be shown in theaters. My passion is movies...Godzilla, kaiju, horror...my favorite directors are George A Romero, John Carpenter, Ishii Teruo and more. I also like Japanese history, especially the Sengoku period. I've been living in Tokyo for more than 20 years but friends say I still have a bit of Kansai accent.
teacher_info.short_signature: 映画、歴史、文化、ニュースなど、好きなトピックで日本語の会話を楽しみましょう！

course_info.trial_description:

As for anime, I don't really watch recent ones but I'm a big fan of Oshii Mamoru, and I like talking about the culture, art, concept behind Japanese anime. It's not a Japanese anime but I also like Gravity Falls. My lesson will be conversational and fun. I can only speak/understand little English and my lessons will be conducted in all Japanese. I will help you with the Japanese vocabulary and phrases. Please tell me about the movies, anime or anything that you like. The most important thing is to have fun! I prefer to use Zoom. Thank you.

teacher_info.intro:
New students of any level are welcomed! Also 30-minute and 45-minute lessons are welcomed! Please ask me anything!

こんにちは、わたしの名前（なまえ）はKOZOです。日本（にほん）で生（う）まれ、東京（とうきょう）で育（そだ）ちました。アメリカに４年間（ねんかん）ほど住（す）んでいたことがあります。いくつかの会社（かいしゃ）で翻訳（ほんやく）や通訳（つうやく）をしたことがあり、現在（げんざい）は日本（にほん）に移住（いじゅう）してくる人（ひと）たちが、日本（にほん）での生活（せいかつ）になじめるように、通訳（つうやく）や翻訳（ほんやく）したりして、援助（えんじょ）しています。

My name is Kozo. I was born in Japan and raised in Tokyo. I've lived in the U.S. for 4 years and worked for several companies as a translator and an interpreter. I'm helping people who move to Japan to get used to Japanese culture with my translation and interpretation.
teacher_info.short_signature: With the experience of  over 3000 lessons and with 300 students, let's enjoy learning Japanese!

New students of any level are welcomed! Also 30-minute and 45-minute lessons are welcomed! Please ask me anything!

こんにちは、わたしの名前（なまえ）はKOZOです。日本（にほん）で生（う）まれ、東京（とうきょう）で育（そだ）ちました。アメリカに４年間（ねんかん）ほど住（す）んでいたことがあります。いくつかの会社（かいしゃ）で翻訳（ほんやく）や通訳（つうやく）をしたことがあり、現在（げんざい）は日本（にほん）に移住（いじゅう）してくる人（ひと）たちが、日本（にほん）での生活（せいかつ）になじめるように、通訳（つうやく）や翻訳（ほんやく）したりして、援助（えんじょ）しています。

My name is Kozo. I was born in Japan and raised in Tokyo. I've lived in the U.S. for 4 years and worked for several companies as a translator and an interpreter. I'm helping people who move to Japan to get used to Japanese culture with my translation and interpretation.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
わたしは翻訳者（ほんやくしゃ）、通訳者（つうやくしゃ）の視点（してん）から日本語（にほんご）を解説（かいせつ）することができます。また、英語（えいご）を勉強（べんきょう）した経験（けいけん）があるので、言語（げんご）の学（まな）び方（かた）について自分（じぶん）の経験（けいけん）から教（おし）えることができます。
いろいろな国（くに）から日本（にほん）に越（こ）してきた人（ひと）たちに、日本（にほん）での生活（せいかつ）について説明（せつめい）するのが今（いま）の仕事（しごと）なので、皆（みな）さんに同様（どうよう）の説明（せつめい）をすることは、皆（みな）さんにとって益（えき）になると思（おも）います。

As a translator and an interpreter, I can not only teach but also explain Japanese. Since I've experience of learning English, I can teach you how to study language from my experience. 
Explaining the life in Japan to those who moved to Japan is my job right now, I have confidence that doing the same thing to you will benefit your study.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
● Freestyle Conversation Class 
Using 75 topics, we have conversation. If we find the areas you need to strengthen, we study those points together by using several text books.

● Conversation Using Daily Expressions
From we wake up until going to bed, we study expressions.

● Using Text Book, "GENKI", "MINNANO-NIHONGO", "Japanese For Busy People", "TOBIRA" Class
You can get lessons using them.

● Preparation for JLPT Class (N5, N4, N3, N2, N1)
You can get the lesson for JLPT test. 

● Japanese Grammar Class

●ビジネス日本語（敬語、尊敬語、謙譲語）
就職活動、メールの書き方、電話応対、ビジネスマナー等、日本語を使って働きたい方、働いている方のためのレッスンです。

● English Class is for Japanese People
英語のレッスンを希望する方は、気軽にメッセージをくださいね。

Feel free to ask me anything!
teacher_info.cancel_policy:
About Each Lesson. In case of canceling a lesson, students should send canceling or re-scheduling request by 24 hours before the start of the lesson. If students couldn't make it come to the classroom on time, I will wait for them for 15 minutes in the classroom. Then lesson fee will be charged and I will leave the classroom.
About Packaged Lessons. If you purchase packaged lessons, lesson fee will be charged automatically when the expiry date would have come. So, please be careful. Thank you for your cooperation and understanding in advance.

pro_course_detail.title: 楽しく英語を勉強しましょう！（30分レッスンも歓迎）
pro_course_detail.description:
レッスンの概要
英語のレッスンでは英語や日本語を交えて、英語を勉強していきます。基本的なコンセプトは、二つあります。
1.　ネイティブとのレッスンが受けられるように日本人を援助することです。
2.　現在中学校で採用されている英語の教科書を用いて、中学で学ぶ英語を勉強する、または復習することです。

使用する教科書
Essential Grammar in Use (Cambridge)
English Grammar in Use (Cambridge)
Advanced Grammar in Use (Cambridge)
One World 1 (教育出版)
One World 2 (教育出版)
One World 3 (教育出版)
教科書ワーク1年、One World 教育出版版　（文理）
教科書ワーク2年、One World 教育出版版　（文理）
教科書ワーク3年、One World 教育出版版　（文理）
現在これらの教科書を用いて、現役中学生を含めてレッスンをしています。
昔勉強した英語をもう一度勉強したい。復習したい。今学校で習っている英語をもっとわかるようになりたい等、生徒さんの目的に合わせてレッスンを行っています。

質問等ございましたら、お気軽にお問い合わせください。

teacher_info.about_teacher:
日本語はその独特な文化と相まってとてもユニークな言語の体系を形成しています。その日本語に世界中の人々が触れることは、私にとって大きな喜びです。
私自身、日本語で生活しているなかで、なぜ日本語ではこういう言い方をするのか不思議に思うことがたくさんあります。そして、それについて納得した答えが得られたとき、あらためて日本語の面白さや楽しさを感じます。
日本語で話し、伝えたいという学習者の方の思いをサポートしつつ、日本語の面白さや楽しさも伝えられるレッスンを目指します。

Japanese, combined with its unique culture, forms a very unique language system. It is a great pleasure for me that people all over the world come into contact with the Japanese language.
While living as a Japanese, I often wonder why I say it that way in Japanese. And when I get a convincing answer about it, I feel interest and fun.
I will aim to provide lessons that convey the fun and enjoyment of Japanese with supporting learners.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
私が目指すのは、「小さな何かが、ひとつできるようになること」です。そのために、レッスンの目標を決めます。その目標を達成するために、教科書を使うこともありますし、スライドやカードを用いたレッスンをすることもあります。
私は日本語で日本語を教えます。学習者の方に適した日本語の速度や語彙の難易度を選んで話します。
限られた時間でたくさん日本語を話せるようレッスンを組み立てます。

・If you cancel within 24 hours, you will have to pay the lesson fee.
・Reschedule within 12 hours cannot be approved. 
By booking my lesson, I will assume that you agree to the above cancellation policy.

cert_info.description: 文化庁指針420時間準拠の日本語教師養成講座の終了証です。
cert_info.institution: ヒューマンアカデミー

course_info.trial_description:
初めて会って、お話するのはだれでも緊張するものですね。
でも、安心してください。私もあなたと同じように緊張しています。
私とあなたはお互い別の人間だけど、「日本語」という共通のキーワードを持っています。
だから、きっと、このトライアルレッスンが私たちの”良いご縁”の始まりとなります。

私の提供するレッスンが、あなたにとって有意義なものか確認してください。
レッスンの時間を最大限活かせるように、前もって次のことを教えてください。
あらかじめ準備します。

日本語で、
１）なにについて　話したい　ですか？
２）なにを　知りたい　ですか？
３）できるようになりたいことは　なんですか？

お会いできるのを、楽しみにしています（^o^）

Everyone is nervous to meet and talk for the first time.

Although I and you are different people, we share the common keyword "日本語(nihon-go) ; Japanese language".
So, surely, this trial lesson will be the beginning of our " good ご縁(go-en); relationship".

Please make sure the lessons I offer is enjoyable and helpful to you.

in Japanese language,

2) What would you like to know?
3) What would you like to be able to do?

I'm looking forward to seeing you (^ o ^)

大学（だいがく）と大学院（だいがくいん）で日本語教育（にほんごきょういく）について勉強（べんきょう）しました。
日本語教師（にほんごきょうし）の資格（しかく）も、もちろんあります。
中国（ちゅうごく）の大学（だいがく）、日本（にほん）の日本語学校（にほんごがっこう）、オンラインでいろいろな人（ひと）に教えた（おしえた）ことがあります。
2018年（ねん）～2021年（ねん）まで、日本語（にほんご）の試験（しけん）をつくる仕事（しごと）をしていましたので、JLPTなど日本語（にほんご）の試験（しけん）のことをよく知って（しって）います。

I majored in Japanese language education in an university and graduate school(having a master degree).
Of course, I am a qualified teacher.
I have taught a lot of learners at a college in China, language schools in Japan, and online.
Also, I was working on writing several Japanese exam questions from 2018 to 2021, so I know a lot about Japanese exams, such as JLPT.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
まず、あなたの目標（もくひょう）を教えて（おしえて）ください。
私（わたし）は、あなたに合った（あった）ベストな学習（がくしゅう）プランを作り（つくり）、あなたに合った（あった）レッスンを行（おこな）います。
LPTや留学試験（りゅうがくしけん）などの日本語（にほんご）の試験（しけん）をよく知っている（しっている）ので、試験（しけん）に合格（ごうかく）したい人（人）へのレッスンができます。
また、日本（にほん）の学校（がっこう）や幼稚園（ようちえん）、保育園（ほいくえん）で使う（つかう）日本語（にほんご）のことも、よくわかります。日本（にほん）で子ども（こども）を育てて（そだてて）いる外国人（がいこくじん）のお母さん（おかあさん）、お父さん（おとうさん）を助ける（たすける）ことができます。
At first, let me know your goals. I will make the best study plan and offer customized lessons to your goals.
I know a lot about Japanese exams, so I can help you to pass them.
Also, I have kids and know much about Japanese that is used in schools, kindergartens, or nurseries in Japan . I can help parents who are bringing their kids up in Japan.

pro_course_detail.description:
日本（にほん）で子（こ）どもを育（そだ）てているお母（かあ）さん、お父（とう）さん、
学校（がっこう）や幼稚園（ようちえん）、保育園（ほいくえん）の先生（せんせい）、他（ほか）のお父（とう）さん、お母（かあ）さんと話（はな）すのは難（むずか）しいですか？
学校（がっこう）や幼稚園（ようちえん）、保育園（ほいくえん）から来（く）るお便（たよ）りがわかりませんか？
そんなお母（かあ）さん、お父（とう）さんのためのレッスンです。
日本以外（にほんいがい）の国（くに）で、日本語（にほんご）を使って（つかって）子育て（こそだて）をしている、お母（かあ）さん、お父（とう）さんにも　おすすめです。

※準備（じゅんび）に時間（じかん）がかかるので、レッスン料金（りょうきん）が少（すこ）し高（たか）くなります。

This lessons are for parents who are parenting their kids in Japan. I can teach you how to communicate with teachers or caretakers in their kindergartens, daycares, or schools, how to communicate with other parents, or how to read and write letters from them.
This lesson is also recommended for parents who are parenting their children in a country other than Japan using Japanese.

※Price is included the time for me to prepare the original materials for you (can share the materials with you).

pro_course_detail.title: Japanese for passing JLPT（N1, N2, N3, N4, N5)
pro_course_detail.description:
JLPTに合格（ごうかく）したい人のためのレッスンです。
文法（ぶんぽう）、漢字（かんじ）やことば、読解（どっかい）、聴解（ちょうかい）など、あなたの苦手（にがて）なことを中心（ちゅうしん）に勉強（べんきょう）します。
※準備（じゅんび）に時間（じかん）がかかるので、レッスン料金（りょうきん）が少（すこ）し高（たか）くなります。

This lessons are for learners who want to pass JLPT exams. I plan your lessons focused on your weakness, such as grammar, vocabulary, reading or listening.
※Price is included the time for me to prepare the original materials for you (can share the materials with you).

pro_course_detail.title: Basic Japanese using Irodori（いろどり）(free textbooks)
pro_course_detail.description: If you don't have any textbooks but still wants to start studying Japanese, I recommend you to take this lesson. In this lesson, we will use the free PDF textbooks that are full of communicative practices and improve your communication skills in Japanese.

pro_course_detail.title: Japanese reading comprehension practice（読解）
pro_course_detail.description:
会話（かいわ）はまあまあできるけど、読解（どっかい）は苦手（にがて）ですか？
JLPTの読解（どっかい）ができなくて、困って（こまって）いませんか？
このレッスンでは、あなたの興味（きょうみ）のある小説（しょうせつ）、ニュース、マンガ、SNSの投稿（とうこう）などを一緒（いっしょ）に読んで（よんで）、読む（よむ）力（ちから）をつけましょう！

Are you able to speak fairly well, but not so good at reading comprehension?
Are you having trouble with reading comprehension on the JLPT?
In this lesson, we will read novels, news, manga, SNS posts, etc. that interest you together to improve your reading skills!

pro_course_detail.title: grammar and vocabulary lesson（文法・語彙）
pro_course_detail.description:
助詞（じょし）や動詞（どうし）の活用（かつよう）が苦手（にがて）で、自分（じぶん）の日本語（にほんご）に自信（じしん）が持て（もて）ませんか？
語彙（ごい）が少なくて（すくなくて）、いつも同じ（おなじ）表現（ひょうげん）を使って（つかって）しまいますか？
このレッスンは、文法（ぶんぽう）と語彙（ごい）が苦手（にがて）な人（ひと）のためのレッスンです。
最初（さいしょ）のレッスンで、あなたの苦手（にがて）な文法（ぶんぽう）や語彙（ごい）について詳しく（くわしく）教えて（おしえて）ください。
わかりやすく説明（せつめい）し、実際（じっさい）の会話（かいわ）などで使える（つかえる）ように練習（れんしゅう）します。

Do you have trouble using particles or conjugating verbs, and lack confidence in your Japanese?
Do you have a limited vocabulary and always use the same expressions?
This lesson is for those who are not good at grammar and vocabulary.
In the first lesson, please tell me in detail about the grammar and vocabulary you have difficulty with.
I will explain it to you in an easy-to-understand way and practice so that you can use it in real conversations.

pro_course_detail.title: Free conversation（会話）
pro_course_detail.description:
話したい（はなしたい）ことを　何でも（なんでも）話して（はなして）ください！
何を（なにを）話したら（はなしたら）いいか　わからないときは、私（わたし）がトピックを用意（ようい）します。
レッスンのあとで、あなたがうまく言え（いえ）なかった語彙（ごい）や表現（ひょうげん）のリストを送り（おくり）ます。

Please talk about　whatever you want to talk about!
If you don't know what to talk about, I will prepare some topics for you.
After the lesson, I will send you a list of vocabulary and expressions that you did not say well.

I have been teaching for 4 years in schools and 2 years virtually. I love music, new food and sports. I am gym rat haha. 
I am open to talk about almost anything and learn a little more about your culture. I look forward to meeting you :)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Tengo experiencia desde hace 4 años enseñando el inglés en colegios y a adultos. He enseñado español también. Me gusta crear un ambiente amigable para mis estudiantes. Me considero una persona muy paciente, me gusta crear un ambiente adecuado para que las personas se sientan confiadas y hablen. Me gusta que se arriesguen y cometan errores, todos lo hacemos, y es una manera eficaz de aprender. 
Me gusta enviar lecturas cortas o artículos de interés para que estudiante aprenda sobre cosas que suceden en mi país, nuevo vocabulario y expresiones.
teacher_info.teaching_style: En mis clases me gusta mucho que los estudiantes hablen. Me gusta mucho desarrollar el speaking y el writing, ya que creo que son las partes más importantes para comunicarse con los demás a la hora de hablar con extranjeros. Trabajo mucho con canciones y con videos, considero que es una manera más amena de aprender el idioma. Utilizo mucho presentaciones (slides) con muchos ejemplos e imágenes.  Busco incentivar el interés y las ganas de aprender un nuevo idioma y conocer más sobre las demás culturas. Me gusta enseñar el Español formal, el que normalmente encontrarías en los libros, pero asi mismo, el informal.

cert_info.description: 英语水平考试

1．能讲普通话，口齿清楚，熟练掌握《汉语拼音方案》，能辨别和纠正错误的语音语调；
2．能分析学生常犯的汉字、词汇、语法错误，并掌握科学的纠正方法；
3．熟悉简繁两种汉字字体，掌握汉字笔顺规则，书写正确、工整；
4．有较强的汉语口语和书面表达能力；
5．有一定的外语水平，熟悉教学用语，能进行日常生活会话，能借助工具书阅读专业书刊。
教师资格证书
除考察应试人声母、韵母和声调的发音外，还要考察上声变调、儿化韵和轻声的读音。考察应试人用普通话朗读书面材料的水平，重点考察语音、连读音变（上声、“一”、“不”），语调（语气）等项目。考察应试人员全面掌握普通话词汇、语法的程度。考察应试人在没有文字凭借的情况下，说普通话的能力和所能达到的规范程度。

pro_course_detail.title: Daily Life Chinese
pro_course_detail.description:
This class is for adults of various levels wishing to learn or improve their Chinese. 

My classes are tailored to your needs.  Beginning with the basics of speaking, listening and writing, you can then progress to your specific needs. 

Whether you wish to learn conversation, reading, business Chinese, Grammar, or just how to get around China on holiday, I can help you.

To ensure fluency and better memory recall, i would suggest 2-3 lessons per week, My lessons provide the study books and worksheets necessary. All this, and at the same time having fun and learning about Chinese culture and history. I hope you will join me in this learning experience.

pro_course_detail.description:
First time learners and those struggling with their school Chinese are welcome.   

My classes cater for individual needs of the students to give them a strong foundation in the Chinese Language in areas of speech, reading, writing, and grammar ; while at the same time, with the use of  games,painting, songs,pictures,interesting topics, videos and racing game and so on,I aim to make learning Chinese a happy experience to encourage life-long learning independently.

Hey guys, 
I’ve been living in South east Asia for 9 years. I worked in broadcasting for 20 years as a presenter for the biggest radio networks in Paris before becoming Program and Marketing director for radio stations all over Europe. 
In 2013, after a world tour through 55 countries, I decided to leave my Parisian comfort zone to live my dream in Thailand where I taught French in schools and in one to one. Now I’m based in Bali. I’m still working as a broadcasting consultant, life coach and French teacher.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
For general lessons:I'm going to use PPP(presentation,practice,production)teaching method to teach new vocabulary,phrases,sentence strucures etc.
For conversational lessons:In this lesson,you'll gain the most practical Chinese and how to express yourself in a native way. You can prepare in advance the topics you would like to talk about or I can prepare learning materials for your level if you're happy with.Practice your spoken Chinese in a friendly environment.I look forward to seeing you in my class.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! I'm from Washington State, USA (West Coast). Now, I live in Malaysia. I have four years experience teaching English. I love meeting new people. I'm an intermediate French speaker and I also speak a bit of Malay, so I understand what it's like to be a language student too! My other interests are playing with my cat, hiking, reading books, playing video games, traveling, and watching TV shows.

** I only teach adults. **
teacher_info.short_signature: Conversationalist & certified teacher who specializes in American pronunciation
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello! I'm from Washington State, USA (West Coast). Now, I live in Malaysia. I have four years experience teaching English. I love meeting new people. I'm an intermediate French speaker and I also speak a bit of Malay, so I understand what it's like to be a language student too! My other interests are playing with my cat, hiking, reading books, playing video games, traveling, and watching TV shows.

** I only teach adults. **
teacher_info.about_teacher:
As someone who loves stories and learning about others, I enjoy doing conversational practice with my students. Reading and keeping up-to-date with what's going on in the world is my passion, so I can provide you with an endless amount of unique topics in all areas. 

I'm an easy-going and patient person with an open mind. I'm also familiar with various speaking exam formats, including IELTS. 

I speak with a North American accent (West Coast), and can adapt my language to whatever level you are at. 

I can provide you with material including news articles, story excerpts, audio files, and lesson worksheets. I will also provide and correct homework if requested.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I'm a firm believer in student-focused learning. In the beginning we will discuss your goals and learning style, then go from there. You can decide at what pace you'd like to go and how much correction you'd want from me.

exp_info.description: I work as a full time ESL teacher in a brick-and-mortar classroom. My students are multi-national. Most of the classes follow the Cambridge curriculum, but I've also had the opportunity to create and lead my own conversation classes.

I have taught over 4000 25-minute classes on this platform. All of the classes are 1-on-1 with young students from China. We do a mix of conversation and reading comprehension practice. I've also helped students with exam prep (KET/PET) and competitions.

cert_info.description: This is proof that I finished my CELTA. I currently requested a copy of the official certificate and will send it to you as soon as I receive it in the mail.

course_info.trial_description:
This is an introduction class to discuss your learning goals and style. I'd like to get to know you as a student and you can ask anything about me. We can also work together to make a plan.

**I do not teach young children.**
**If you are interested in specific proofreading/editing help or exam prep assistance, please book the appropriate class. This trial is meant for those who are looking for a long-term teacher.**

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Class (Free Talk & Discussion)
pro_course_detail.description:
Are you looking to build your confidence and become a conversationalist?

In this class, we will work on achieving your goals through natural and free conversation and/or in a more structured discussion. The discussion can be your choice or I can provide my own topic for us along with a couple brief videos/articles before class (Please give me 2 days notice for the latter).

I will guide you and provide corrections/feedback in a way that doesn't ruin the flow of the conversation, but still leaves you with some points to review after class. I can also type quickly while talking, so there will be no long awkward pauses. 
This class aims to improve your speaking and listening comprehension through constructive feedback and error correction. We can focus on pronunciation, grammar and/or pronunciation.

*POLICY NOTE: As my schedule is limited these days, reschedules and cancellations within 24 hours are LIMITED ONLY TO EMERGENCY SITUATIONS (meetings do not count). *

** Strictly 17 & older for this class. No children. **

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS / Exam Prep / Homework
pro_course_detail.description:
** Strictly 17 & older for this class. No children. ** 

Need help with your English homework? Planning on taking IELTS this year? I'm here to help!

You can bring your homework to class, which we will go over together. As for IELTS, I can provide you mock exams, teach you test-taking strategies, and help you improve your language to get you to your desired band.

*POLICY NOTE: As my schedule is limited these days, reschedules and cancellations within 24 hours are LIMITED ONLY TO EMERGENCY SITUATIONS (meetings do not count). *

pro_course_detail.title: Proofreading / Revising / Writing Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
** Strictly 17 & older for this class. No children. ** 

Do you have an English document that needs some revising? We will revise and discuss it together in class. Types of writing include essays, resumes, and personal statements.

(Class revisions can be sent as a document after the class.)

*POLICY NOTE: As my schedule is limited these days, reschedules and cancellations within 24 hours are LIMITED ONLY TO EMERGENCY SITUATIONS (meetings do not count). *

pro_course_detail.title: Pronunciation Training (American Accent)
pro_course_detail.description:
** This class is for adults only. **

This class is dedicated entirely to improving your pronunciation and sounding more like an American. In this class, we will do various drills that concentrate on areas such as short vowel sounds, the rhotic R, word and sentence stress, connected speech and intonation.

*POLICY NOTE: As my schedule is limited these days, reschedules and cancellations within 24 hours are LIMITED ONLY TO EMERGENCY SITUATIONS (meetings do not count). *

teacher_info.intro:
はじめまして 日本で生まれ育ったMadoka です。英語と韓国語も話せます。2017年より英語の初級文法から学び直して様々なツールで勉強してきました。4000時間かけて会話できるようになったので、みなさんの日本語習得の大変さがよく分かります。

Hi, I am Madoka from Japan. I speak English (B2-C1)and Korean (A2) without Japanese. I have practiced English again since 2017. That’s almost all by my operation with YouTube, Netflix, Podcasts, Radio, Textbooks, Novels, Songs, News, Writing essay and more from the beginners grammar. 
Sometimes I have talked with natives because my English had not worked at all. With the many experiences forced 4,000 hours to talk smoothly after graduated the comprehensive school as a young, I really know how hard you get Japanese skills : Reading, Writing, Listening and Speaking.
teacher_info.short_signature: Pitch Accent✅an English speaker✅초급 한국어 화자✅

はじめまして 日本で生まれ育ったMadoka です。英語と韓国語も話せます。2017年より英語の初級文法から学び直して様々なツールで勉強してきました。4000時間かけて会話できるようになったので、みなさんの日本語習得の大変さがよく分かります。

Hi, I am Madoka from Japan. I speak English (B2-C1)and Korean (A2) without Japanese. I have practiced English again since 2017. That’s almost all by my operation with YouTube, Netflix, Podcasts, Radio, Textbooks, Novels, Songs, News, Writing essay and more from the beginners grammar.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
みなさんのニーズに合わせて実用的な日本語を教えるチューターです。
日本語を学んでいるみなさんは、一般的に母語の影響による言葉の選択や発音の問題があります。私はそれらを自然な日本語へ訂正します。特に、英語ニュアンスで訳した日本語を見つけるのが得意です。

I am a practical tutor for your needs. Learners generally have the weakness such as word-choice, pronunciation coming from your mother tongue. I will correct into native-used Japanese. Particularly I am good at checking Japanese translated from English which isn’t included Japanese feelings in.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
- Free Conversational class for CEFR A2 or higher
- Informal tutoring for intermediate and advanced
- Pitch accent lesson for upper intermediate and advanced 

We are able to talk / read / write (making senses)/ pitch accent. I will correct /revise on chat box while tutoring expressions, synonyms, pronunciation and more! 

自由に会話して、読んで、文章を作りましょう。自然な日本語の表現や、言葉の言い換えなどが学べます。ピッチアクセントで発音も学べます。チャットボックスへ訂正や修正をします。

ゆったりとリラックスして、レッスンを楽しみましょう！

course_info.trial_description:
Here is a short Free Conversation lesson of the lesson program. I can speak English but  will explain in Japanese. You need the skills that you understand hiragana, katakana ,kanji and grammar to take the lesson. 

Free Conversation lessonの３０分クラスです。会話をします。ひらがな・カタカナ・漢字・文法を理解している人が対象です。

Notes: I don´t currently teach kids.

pro_course_detail.title: Free Conversation for CEFR A2 beginner, intermediate and advanced
pro_course_detail.description:
We will talk in Japanese. You need at least the skills of A2 (N4) which you understand hiragana, katakana, kanji and grammar to take this lesson. If you need to correct your Japanese, check in the Informal Tutoring. 

日本語で会話します。CEFRＡ2 以上（日本語能力試験Ｎ４ 以上）がレッスン対象者です。自然な日本語へ訂正するレッスンは Informal Tutoringを予約してください。

Notes: I don´t currently teach kids.

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring for intermediate and advanced
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson will give you how to use Japanese expressions. This class suits for intermediate and advanced level. I will offer you corrected words and teaching expressions in Japanese　or English. You can choose between three lesson styles:
1. Me correcting your mistakes of the talking one by one
2. Reading 
3. Writing

自然な日本語で表現するスキルを身につけましょう。中級から上級向けクラスです。１～３の中から選んでください。自然な日本語に訂正したり、似た表現や言葉のニュアンスを日本語または英語で説明します。
１．一つ一つ言葉を訂正する会話
２．読むこと
３．書くこと

Notes: I don´t currently teach kids.

pro_course_detail.title: Pitch Accent for upper intermediate and advanced
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson will help your Japanese speaking and listening. You will get to know the differences of the pitch accent's 端・箸・橋 , the accent such as natives and more. I went to school to be a newscaster or a reporter. I have worked a little as a reporter before. I will teach you how to fix your accent, how to speak with good timing, and how to practice. 　

このレッスンでは、端・箸・橋 のようなアクセントの違いを学んだり、あなたが話す日本語をネイティブが話すような日本語へと変えていきます。過去なのですが…アナウンス学校へ通い、その方面の仕事を少しほど経験致しました。その経験を生かして、アクセントの修正、間の取り方、練習方法をご提案します。
　
＜こんな方に おすすめ＞
・自分のアクセントはネイティブと違うのは分かるけど、直す箇所・方法が分からない
・スピーキングとヒヤリングを強化して、日常会話のストレスを少なくしたい 
・音読しながら、ネイティブが話すような日本語の練習もしたい

＜レッスン方法＞ 
１．あなたが書いて添削してもらった文章や、読みたいサイトやテキストを画面シェア
２．あなたが *音読  　　*音読   to read aloud    
３．私がアクセントの違うところを 訂正しながら音読、あなたが真似て音読

Notes: I don´t currently teach kids.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone! 
My name is Salomé Dueñas, I'm 23 years old. I'm from Ecuador (yes, Galapagos' Islands country) and my native language is spanish. I currently live in Argentina and I study biology at Buenos Aires University. I'm passionate about teaching and learning languages. I also love art, science, books and culture. I've been teaching english to kids and adults for more than five years and now I teach spanish to english speakers. This year my goal is to get the ELE certificate to be a professional spanish teacher! Would you like to have fun while learning spanish? Then my classes and method are the ones for you!
teacher_info.short_signature: Bilingual English & Spanish Tutor with 5 years of teaching experience
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello everyone! 
My name is Salomé Dueñas, I'm 23 years old. I'm from Ecuador (yes, Galapagos' Islands country) and my native language is spanish. I currently live in Argentina and I study biology at Buenos Aires University. I'm passionate about teaching and learning languages. I also love art, science, books and culture. I've been teaching english to kids and adults for more than five years and now I teach spanish to english speakers. This year my goal is to get the ELE certificate to be a professional spanish teacher! Would you like to have fun while learning spanish? Then my classes and method are the ones for you!
teacher_info.about_teacher: I like to be the balance between easy-going and straight-forward kind of teacher. I like to adapt my classes for your learning style and your personal goals. I love to have fun while learning so that is what I also want in my classes. Respectful, passionate and committed are the words that identify me as a person and teacher.
teacher_info.teaching_style: "Listen, understand, comprehend and produce" this is the fundamental basis of my classes. I like my classes to be fun, dynamic and easy-going. My main goal is to help you communicate your ideas, feelings and thoughts, so my classes are intented for you to develop your communication skills: listen, talk and write as much as you can. I always try to have some material: audiovisual stimulation, music, stories, games, work sheets, visual vocabulary and entertainment. I think we learn better when we have fun. I also like to use different books and guides to complement our classes, but of course, we can adapt everything to your own special way of learning! Hope to see you soon!

course_info.trial_description:
On this trial lesson we'll introduce ourselves. We're going to talk about your goals, your motivation to learn a new language, and what do you expect from this course and from me as your teacher. We'll also learn a little bit of vocabulary and expressions for getting to know someone as an introduction to your love story with spanish. See you soon! 

En esta lección de prueba nos vamos a conocer. Vamos a hablar sobre tus metas, sobre tu motivación para estudiar un nuevo idioma y sobre lo que esperas de este curso y de mí como tu profesora. También vamos a aprender un poco de vocabulario y expresiones para conocer a alguien y de esta manera introducirte a tu historia de amor con el español. Te espero!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversación entre amigos (Conversation between friends)
pro_course_detail.description:
This class is made for students who want to improve their communication skills with natives. This is a great lesson to try if you are planning to move to a spanish-speaking country as this class is more fun, friendly and relaxed. The main goal is for you to learn how to express yourself, your feelings, thoughts and ideas in spanish. For this class, we can choose a topic to talk about if you want or we can bring a cup of tea/coffe and simply talk about life.  From this lesson you can expect to learn casual vocabulary of our every day routine, feelings, and life in general. As you can imagine, you'll listen and speak a lot. This will help you to gain confidence and to lose your fear to make mistakes and talk. Let's make them with courage! Hope to see you there! 

Esta clase está diseñada para estudiantes que quieran incrementar sus habilidades de comunicación. Es perfecta para ti si estás planeando mudarte a un país hispanohablante ya que esta clase es muy divertida, relajada y amigable. La meta principal de este curso es que aprendas a expresar tus ideas, tus pensamientos y emociones en español. Para esta clase, podemos escoger un tema de conversación que sea de tu agrado o podemos traer una taza de té/café a clase y simplemente hablar de la vida. De esta lección puedes esperar aprender vocabulario de nuestra rutina diaria, de nuestras emociones cotidianas y de la vida en general. Como te puedes imaginar, vamos a hablar y escuchar muchísimo. Esto te va a ayudar a ganar confianza y perder el miedo a cometer errores y hablar. ¡Cometámoslos con valentía! ¡Espero verte ahí!

pro_course_detail.title: Español para principiantes e intermedios / Spanish for beginners and intermediates
pro_course_detail.description: This course is made for both students starting from scratch with spanish or student who already have some kind of knowledge. The goal of this class is to help you understand basic spanish, learn how to introduce yourself, and to interact in typical scenarios of everyday life, to learn vocabulary, practice grammar, speaking, listening, writting and reading. This is lesson is perfect for you if you want to speak spanish like a native! We'll use reading material (tales, stories, newspaper, etc), writting prompts and excercises, speaking and conversation and a lot of listening (music, videos, conversation, audios, etc). Give it a try! Hope to see you there!

pro_course_detail.title: Club de Lectura en Español
pro_course_detail.description: Esta lección es perfecta para los amantes de la literatura y cultura latinoamericana/hispana. Para esta lección elegiremos un texto que sea de tu interés, puede ser ficción, no ficción, poemas, ensayos, libros, artículos, etc. El cual leeremos antes de la clase. La clase estará diseñada para conversar sobre la lectura, dar opiniones, hacer preguntas, aprender sobre la cultura latinoamericana y vocabulario. Esta lección es para estudiantes intermedios-avanzados, ya que  nos enfocaremos en la lectura, comprensión y expresión del idioma.
